His eyes were hidden in shadows cast by his fearsome brow, but she could tell that their eyes had met, not that his cold facial features changed at all as a result. "Dr. Zaus is a liar. Whatever he tells you is not the truth. He and the other great ape scholars, they know things that even you do not know, ancient secrets hidden in ancient texts. I am not from your time, but that is not what Zaus would have you believe. He will tell you that I'm a freak, a mutant human one that needs to be studied by the right people... his people. Don't fall for it. I have nothing to hide and nothing to lose. I don't know how I got here and I have no way of getting home. If you listen to me, I'll tell you anything you want to know."

"Outrageous!" Zaus shouted. He had his vest on, but had frozen stiff while getting his pants straightened out. He thought he had Pepper all figured out and mentally whipped. He hadn't expected her to pull something like this at all, and it was time to do some damage control. "Clearly the human is trying to sow mistrust and confusion among us with wild lies and accusations. Patently pathetic. Time travel? Secret texts? I believe she simply needs to be taught who the superior beings are. Once she accepts her place in the great chain of being, she will be much easier to deal with."

"Yes." The Ape Priest replies nodding. "Peace can only come through accepting one's place in the great chain of being. Her's are the ramblings of a madwoman. In an ape, they would be madness, but in a human, they are clearly the efforts of the devil."

"Enough of this!" The Gorilla General shouts. "Why all of this fuss over a single human? If she's a demon, then by God, we have to kill her! If she's a mutant human, kill her before she breeds more monster spawn! I don't know why we're even debating this!"

"Gentleapes." The Emperor quiets the room with but a single word. "I believe that discovering the truth of this matter should be our main concern. Dr. Zaus, you do of course have this office and this council’s full trust. However, I have decided to submit Freckle's to a lie detector test. If her story checks out, then you, Zaus, will have to account for yourself under similar circumstances. The truth will be found out. That is of the utmost importance."

A murmur of agreement rumbled through the chamber as Zaus' eyes darted around nervously. A smile came to Pepper's face. Zaus had been caught with his pants down, both figuratively and literally. His attempts to appeal to the baser instincts in his comrades were successful, but the Emperor seemed wise to his act. She began to hope for a moment that she just might get out of this alive.

Her hope was to be short lived. Sensing that he was trapped, Zaus looked over in Igor's direction and shouted "Igor! Escape protocol: Zodiac, Gemini, Phoenix!" At his master's command, Igor's pupils shrank as his conscious mind submerged, replaced instead with a blood red cloud of unthinking rage that drove him into a berserker fury! Zaus, one of the few apes aware of his species origins had long ago begun to use this knowledge in his work. Igor was a Sasquatch, and below his more or less civilized exterior, lies the savage nature of his ancestors. Through post hypnotic suggestion, Zaus had trained Igor to release all of his repressed bloodlust when activated by key trigger words. As a Sasquatch, Igor was huge, bigger even than the Gorilla guards and military personnel, and his sudden attack was more than enough to throw the council chamber into chaos.

After pulling out a concealed gun, Zaus drops his pants and grabs Pepper roughly by the arm, pulling her instantly to her feet. "That, my dear, is our cue to leave." Though Pepper struggled, the doctor was too strong. After shooting a guard, Dr. Zaus made his way out of the chamber as the other apes struggled to contain Igor and stop his mindless assault. When dragging Pepper seemed to be taking too much time, Zaus angrily scooped her up under his arm and began sprinting down the halls of the building back towards his lab. Staring down at the moving ground once more with her uncovered butt sticking up in the air immediately brought back memories of her initial abduction.

When Zaus reached the lab, he spat out another activation code word and an entire steel wall slid away to reveal what appeared to be a small, one man stealth jet, obviously some kind of escape vehicle the not so good doctor had stashed away for just such an occasion. "I hope you realize that you've ruined me, girl." The Orangutan said, "This time at least. There is only one hope for me now."

With that, the doctor climbed into the cockpit and forced Pepper to follow him at gunpoint. Since there was only one seat, Pepper found herself awkwardly sitting on the professor's lap as the glass canopy slid closed over her head. Zaus buckled himself into the crash webbing, binding Pepper's body to his and activated the engines before streaking off into the clear blue sky.

Pepper spent several moments in frightened silence, (trying to ignore the feeling of Zaus' phallus against her back, and of his hairy legs against her bare butt cheeks) so that she could gather her thoughts and figure out what her next move would be. When she finally managed to gather up the courage to speak, she asked, "Where are we going?" The Doctor smiled and replied "Where it all began my dear. Where it all began."
111211111211221111111112112.title: Disorder in the court of the monkey king

1112111112112211111111121121.content:
Peppers mind was racing, unable to comprehend the series of bizarre events that had happened to her over the last few hours.
At least nothing more will surprise me. She thought bitterly.
As if tempting fate something suddenly flew past the jet.
"What was-" Pepper began but the Doctor cut her off.
"Not no! Damn lizards!" Zaus screamed.
He attempted to maneuver the jet but as he was more of a scientist than a pilot, the two other jets that were outside were more than a match. Soon Pepper felt something it the back end of the plane, and saw that they were losing altitude.
"It's been a pleasure knowing you my dear but I'd rather not die with a human." Dr. Zaus pressed a button on the controls and suddenly the jet canopy, along with Dr. Zaus flew upwards. Leaving Pepper to frantically search for something...anything in the plane that could help her, eventually she found..a buckle? Of course! That's what pilots use to eject themselves! Wasting no time Pepper pulled the buckle and...
Found herself falling through the air after accidentally taking off her seatbelt. It wasn't a completely bad idea, the Jet fell full speed toward the ground and Pepper saw it crash in a fireball. At least her death would be delayed for a few minutes.
Pepper could feel the air rushing past her naked form. Admittedly falling several hundred feet while completely bare-assed wasn't on her list of way to die, but admittedly it was original. She closed her eyes and the ground rushing toward her, the poor naked teen was ready for the impact, to finally end this nightmare.
Or at least she would have been had she not suddenly felt something grab her under the arms and slow her descent. Pepper opened her eyes to see the ground still coming toward her but at a much slower rate. Pepper had no idea who had grabbed her, the first thought was Dr. Zaus but that theory was expelled when she saw a humanoid shape and what looked like seat fall past her in the distance and land on the ground below. Good riddance as far as she was concerned.
Pepper had seemed to have lost her voice and didn't say anything in the two minutes it took her and her rescuer to reach the ground. Almost as soon as they did a Van pulled up next to them and Pepper felt a hard, scaly hand grab her around the face. She struggled for a bit, but it was futile as she felt herself get thrown into the van, and subsequently felt the van start to drive.
Pepper could finally look up and saw her rescuers/captors. They were human shaped, wearing what looked like police riot gear and black helmets with a visor that obscured their features. The only part of them uncovered were their hands which were most certainly not human or ape, they were green, covered in scales and had long fingers. One of them removed his helmet and Pepper gasped.
It was a Chupacabra, or...something like it. It was a reptilian face to be sure, but their also seemed to be...human features. Whoever it was had short dark hair, large black eyes, a nose, ears, and a mouth that seemed to be halfway between a lizard and a human. It spoke.
"You are Hew-Mon." He said in a silky reptilian tone.
"Y-yes." Pepper said quietly. "W-who are you?"
The figures eyes went wide. "It can speak! The story is true!"
"Who are you?" Pepper repeated, gaining some courage but still confused.
"Sargent Zach'Nor, North cell first division." He replied with a salute.
"Are you a Chupacabra?" Pepper asked.
She heard some quiet laughs from the other two soldiers but Zach'Nor silenced them.
"We are hybrids of pure Chupacabra and old Hew-Mons." he said stiffly. "When apes began to take over, Hew-Mons and Chupacabra allied, Sasquatch ancient enemies of Chupacabra and Hew-Mon numbers fell. Our species interbreed, now we few Hybrids remain, fighting guerrilla war against apes, wanting to avenge legacies of both ancestors.
"S-so." Pepper said slowly. "Does that mean we're friends...or enemies?"
Zach'Nor leaned in closer and spoke.
1112111112112211111111121121.title: Spend some more time in the jet

choices: Go back in time and kill Big Foot
Go back to the ape capital and kill the council.
11121111121122111111111211211.content:
"We...friends." Zach'Nor hissed, his fork tongue flickering in and out.
Pepper breathed a sigh of relief. Things were looking up after all.
"So...I am sorry." Zach'Nor said. His eyes narrowing.
Before Pepper could ask what he meant, she felt a small poke in the back of her neck and the world around her soon blurred and turned to black...

Pepper woke up up again, no longer feeling the vibration of metal but instead a soft material, she groaned and opened her eyes. She was on the floor of what looked like a living room, still butt naked. The room was old, she herself was on a collapsed, moth-eaten sofa. Above her was a damaged wife that used to hold a light fixture, the walls were peeling and moldy, the ceiling in just as bad shape, the wood floor was covered in dust and grime. Some old objects still remained, a dis-repaired TV set, several picture frames, the pictures within them were either obscured by the dusted glass or simply so worn and faded that they couldn't be made out.
Pepper was not alone in the room. At each entrance stood a Lizard man guard with a rifle and standing next to her was another, this one with a grey hair and what looked like wrinkled scales. He was wearing an old, wrinkled suit and over it had a bullet-proof vest.
"Greetings." The older lizard man hissed. "I am Miket'Nor, Representative of Homosaurus government and father to Zach'Nor, whom you have already met. He nodded at his son who was standing behind him. "You are the Hew-Mon from times long past."
Peppers eyes went wide. "Y-yeah, how did you know?"
"We have allies in Ape government, traitors to their kind, hated by us but they do not know that. We knew Dr. Zaus was escaping, but were unaware you were with him. Fortunate for both of us my men did not accidentally shoot you down. " Miket gave a small chuckle. "It is true, you come from genesis of Gorilla war?"
Pepper nodded slowly. Still not sure what to make of this and even forgetting her own nudity.
"Apes hide details of that time, but we Homosaurs embrace it! Your actions first step in hybrid creation. We know you shot BigFoots son, but could have killed the Chupacabra instead, you did not. You saved the Chupacabra, even if you did not mean too. That event caused the Chupacabra to rethink Hew-Mons, helped forge alliance between the two races to fight the ever growing apes. Also helps that Chupacabra found Hew-Mon females to be...very attractive."
His eyes glinted as he studied Peppers body. The teenage girl blushed and wrapped her arms around herself.
"So now here we are." Miket continued. "Apes may have driven pure Chupacabra to extinction, and and pure Hew-Mons stupid animals, but we hybrids, we Homosaurus live...for now."
Mikets face suddenly turned angry.
"But we are losing the Gorilla War. Our numbers are falling, and our race is on the brink of extinction...we must win...we have to win for the glory of the Chupacabra, and the legacy of the Hew-Mons."
Pepper suddenly found her voice again. "Does it uh...involve me?"
Miket smiled. "Yes, and once you do as we ask we will let you return home to your time...although you're halfway there already."
Peppers eyes narrowed. "What do you mean?"
"Look around. Don't you recognize his house?"
Pepper scanned the room again and suddenly realized where she was.
"This is...my friend Liz's house." She said slowly, but Pepper suddenly felt a pang of guilt. About Liz and all her friends.
"I can see you miss your home dearly." Miket said gently. "This place has been our home of centuries, it is here our ancestors made their last stand against the Apes, they drove them out of this region and we have held it ever since. It was only recently we found and repaired the Time Machine in this area. I promise we'll get you home."
Pepper gulped, and fought back tears. "What do I have to do?"
Miket nodded to Zach who stepped forward. "I'll tell you..."
11121111121122111111111211211.title: Friends

1112111112112211111111121122.content:
The rest of the trip is spent in silence. Zaus lands the jet on the outskirts of the woods and Pepper immediately realizes where he's taken here. "Where it all began..." She whispers. "Quite right." Zaus replies before opening the canopy and ushering Pepper out of the Vehicle.

"This is where it all began." The doctor continued. "The twilight of man, and the dawn of the apes. The very air is charged with the power of time and historical significance. Can you feel it?"

All Pepper could feel was the cold wind that chilled her bare, freckled skin. Zaus had let go of her hand, so she was now covering her breasts with her arms, more for the sake of keeping warm than the sake of modesty. In response to the Doctor's question, Pepper simply looks down at her bare toes.

"I do hope you have more energy in you than that. We may have a long journey ahead of us, and one that must be made quickly. It will not be long before the hunter/killers find us, and then, it will all be over. We must retrace the steps you made the night of your abduction. We must find the stone structure that you ran against before being consumed by the bright light. I must learn the secret of the light! With it, I need fear nothing, least of all the Emperor and his thugs."

Pepper looked at him with a mixture of fear and disbelief. She had been virtually blind before being transported here from the past. There was no way to tell exactly where the light had struck... but she couldn't tell Doctor Zaus that. If he felt he didn't need her anymore, there was no doubt in her mind that he would use the gun in his hand to be well rid of her. Keeping silent, Pepper turned around and began to lead the Doctor on an aimless march through the woods.

As they travel, they come first upon the camp grounds, which, despite being centuries, perhaps even millenia old, seemed fantastically well preserved. At the center of the camp, Pepper could see a large golden statue. Convincing Zaus that there was a shortcut through the camp grounds, Pepper lead the way, wanting to get a better look at the monument.

The golden statue depicted a Sasquatch, one that Pepper could recognize as one of her three abductors. Over his shoulder, the great ape carried a naked and screaming teenage girl. When she realized who it was, Pepper couldn't help but gasp. It was Liz, the richest and most popular girl she had ever met, and this is how history remembered her, capturing her humiliating downfall in solid gold. Pepper had to admit, whoever had made the statue had been extremely talented. Every detail of Liz's anguished face and nude figure was captured exactly as it was, right down to the cute little dimples on her naked ass.

It was just about this time that Pepper felt something pressing against her own ass, the cold steel of Dr. Zaus' gun. Not needing any further encouragement, Pepper continued to march, leading the Doctor once again into the woods. Pepper walked until her bare feet were black and sore, and the doctor began to lose his patience. Just as Zaus was about to take Pepper to task for leading him on a wild goose chase, the condemned pair found themselves interrupted by...
1112111112112211111111121122.title: Back to the beginning of the end

111211111211221111111112112221.content:
Originally authored by Sandman)

Centuries earlier in the human controlled past, and less then a few seconds after Pepper escapes from the young bigfoot, Crystal begins to awaken. The first thing Crystal saw as she awoke, was the fuzzy image of her friend Pepper’s bare butt, moving away from her. Crystal almost laughed at the sight of Pepper clumsily running naked threw the forest, when it suddenly dawned on Crystal that she too could get away. As crystal looked down, and around she saw this things butt, it was furry, and very muscular. As she obverted her eyes from it in shame, she could see two more creatures several yards ahead of her abductor. The two larger creatures appeared to be carrying the remainder of her friends on their shoulders. As Crystal tried to figure out how to escape from this small Bigfoot, opportunity presented it’s self.

The young Bigfoot finally notices that Pepper is gone, sniffs the air, and lays in a pursuit course. Not wanting his father, and older brother to think that he was an idiot, he doesn’t inform them that he is going into the woods, with poor Crystal, and another girl on his shoulder. This other girl is still unconscious, however, she is starting to awaken too. Crystal could not see who this third girl was, except that her skin was soft and fair. The trees brush past Crystal and the other girl too, as the Bigfoot runs after poor Pepper. That’s when something else jumps out them, and attacks the Bigfoot. As Crystal hits the ground, she sees what looks like a small lizard man, attacking the young Bigfoot. She also discovers that the unidentified girl next to her was Rebecca, also naked as a jaybird. As Rebecca looks around, and screams in a panic, she runs over to Crystal for comfort. The two naked girls see with great alarm that both of these beasts have fully erect penises, and they are both glancing at them, with lust and hunger in their eyes.

Then they hear a gun shot, followed by another, and another. As the two beasts fall to the ground, they both look around to see a naked girl holding a gun, and to their relief, it was Pepper. Before they could thank Pepper, they watched as their naked and nearly blind friend runs off, into the woods. They also hear angry howls in the woods in try to follow Pepper. As they do, several dozen Chupacabras leap down at them from the trees, each one was fully erected, looking Crystal and Rebecca over. Scared they both try to cover their private areas in shame. The two girls watched as the young male Bigfoot continues to breath slowly, his gun shot wounds were not life threatening. However, with the dead Chupacabra near by, these remaining Chupacabras wanted revenge. So, they encircled the young Bigfoot and prepared to kill him.


When all of the sudden, two large male Bigfoot’s came crashing threw the trees at them. Just to let you know, they left the remaining girls in the caves storage area for safekeeping, and came looking for the little Bigfoot. The two larger Bigfoot’s immediately engaged the Chupacabras in a fierce battle. As the monster mash continued, Crystal and Rebecca ran for their lives, in Peppers direction. As they ran threw the woods naked, they came across what looked like a castle in the woods. They also saw a door near by, and tracks of bare human feet walking towards it. They figured that Pepper somehow found her way inside, and they were going to follow. As they both hear the fighting simmering down, they try the door, and to their surprise, they manage to open it. They walk threw the door, and quickly close it behind them.
As they look around this dimly lighted castle, a sudden shock suddenly hits them both. They realize that they are now safe from those horny beasts outside. However, they also know that they are in a strange eerie home, and buck-naked. They both try to look around desperately for something to wear, but they find nothing. Scared, they try to cover their private areas with their hands, as they explore the castle together. A minute later, they see a strange bright light emanating from one of the rooms. They decide to investigate it, and walk into the room. Crystal is the first to entire, followed by Rebecca. The two girls eyes pop wide open as they see what looks like a star-gate before them. Liquid light dances over the event horizon, as they watch Pepper walking naked threw it. Not thinking, Crystal runs after as a creepy old man yells “Stop!”

Crystal ignores the old man and runs into the vortex completely naked too, after her friend. However, Rebecca suddenly stops. She is now standing there, naked before him, with her hands trying desperately to cover her large breasts and her nearly hairless crotch from his admiring view. As Rebecca stands nude before the mad doctor, we follow whom?

111211111211221111111112112222.content:
As Zaus and Pepper both shield their eyes from the blinding light, it is Pepper who first makes out the familiar sight before her. Standing there in the steadily dimming light was a petite Native American girl, with long dark hair, shining dark eyes and smooth, flawless tan skin. Bereft of even the skimpy derogatory loincloth that had once hidden her shame, Ayita was as naked as the day she was born.

Before Zaus could even react, Pepper shouted the girl's name before rushing forward to embrace her. Though normally a curious and inquisitive girl, at this moment, the how's and why's of Ayita's arrival didn't seem too terribly important to poor Pep. Rather, she was just happy that she was no longer alone.

"Ahem!" The doctor grunted as the two girls embraced before him. After exchanging worried glances, the two naked girls separated and regarded the gun toting orangutan side by side. The Doctor continued. "Ayita, I believe. Did I hear correctly?"

The girls nodded.

"Excellent." The doctor said. "And who, may I ask, is Ayita?"

"She's--" Pepper began, her mind scrambling for assemble the best possible way to introduce her friend to her enemy, preferably a way which wouldn't get the poor girl killed. But Ayita, it seemed had plans of her own.

"I'm a friend of Pepper's from the past." The girl began, cooly. "The white light that brought me here comes from a time machine created by a human scientist from our time. We've been watching Pepper the entire time she's been here."

Pepper's jaw dropped. A mad scientist? With a time machine? Living out in the woods not even a mile from her friends summer home? Somehow a random temporal event just seemed more realistic. Then again, that wouldn't necessarily be the weirdest thing she'd seen today. "Wow, real life time travel!" Pepper thought. At least thats the first thing she thought. The second thing she thought was that some pervy old man had been watching her this whole time. Appropriately, her expression changed from jaw dropped, to face blushed.

"Have you now?" The ape replied, leveling his gun at the new nude arrival.

Raising her hands in the classic "Don't shoot me!" gesture. Ayita replies quickly and as reassuringly as she can manage "You have nothing to fear from me! I'm here to help! The scientist wants you to find his machine. He sent me here to help you."

"And why should he do that?" Zaus asked, incredulously.

"I don't know." Ayita answered honestly. "He seems like a pretty strange guy. I should maybe tell you that I'm not really here of my own free will. He forced me into the machine and told me he wouldn't bring me back until I did as I was told."

"Back? BACK!?" Pepper thought. Deliverance from this nightmare almost seemed too good to be true at this point. She wanted to scream and jump for joy, but the utter tension in the air between Ayita and Zaus prevented such elation from taking flight. She tried to steady herself within. She wasn't out of trouble yet, not by a long shot, but now, at the very least she knew there was a way out, and that made all the difference.

"Very well." Zaus said at last. "We won't disappoint your scientist friend then. Take me to his device at once!"

There was a brief pause, as Ayita hesitated before making her next move. Reading Zaus' impatience and becoming nervous herself, Pepper whispered "Ayita--?"

Letting out a sigh, Ayita turned around to reveal a strange new tattoo adorning her left butt cheek. Pepper was momentarily confused (Ayita certainly didn't have THAT at the party) but only momentarily. Upon closer inspection, Pepper realized that the tattoo was in fact a map, leading, no doubt to the Mad Doctor's time machine. Whoever the this scientist was, it seemed to Pepper that "weird" and "pervy" were both apt adjectives as far as he was concerned.

And so they were off again, the two bare naked beauties leading the pant less ape man through the woods towards their randezvous with destiny. Along the way, Ayita got Pepper up to speed, told her how she and Crystal had gotten free and witnessed her escape, the battle between the young sasquatch and the Chupacabra and Pepper's apparent murder of the former. She told of how they followed Pepper on her blind and feverish flight through these selfsame woods and of their encounter with the Mad doctor, who was now holding poor Crystal hostage to ensure their compliance. Ayita also explained that only living things could pass through the portal, making clear the reason for her current state of undress.

"Ah." Pepper said. "Like in the Terminator."

"Huh?" Ayita exclaimed.

"Like in the Terminator movies, only living things could pass through, so if you went back in time, you arrived naked. It's why John Conner's father couldn't bring back future weapons to fight Arnold with."

Ayita paused for a minute, experiencing a paralyzing moment of fridge logic. "Wait... that doesn't make any sense! The Terminator IS a weapon from the future! He's a robot!"

"Yeah, but he's covered in artificial bio-flesh!" Pepper exclaimed.

"So they, what, smuggled a robot through by hiding it inside a naked Arnold Schwarzenegger?"

"Basically." Pepper replied.

"That's kind of a stretch." Ayita returned.

"Says the girl with the totally artificial tattoo smuggled FORWARD in time inside her butt."

"Touche."

"I don't know anything about bio-flesh, or what a Terminator is, or what in the Great Ape's name a Schwarzenegger is, but I do know that we're wasting time!" Zaus growled, gesturing with his gun. "Get a move on!"

"I wish I could, but it looks like we've run out of map!" Pepper exclaimed.

"For your sake I hope not." Zaus replied, a low and murderous anger rumbling in the subtext of his voice. "If there is a problem, solve it quickly before I decide I have no further use for you!"

Pepper thought for a moment before the answer struck her. "Ahem... Ayita could you umm... bend over?"

"What!? Why...? Ayita began before realizing her situation and acquiescing.

"Err... could you umm... spread your cheeks a bit?" Pepper asked, reluctantly.

Rolling her eyes, Ayita once again did as she was told. Pepper studied the inner contents of her friends ass for a few moments before realizing what the marker was for their destination. "Oh, there it is!" Pepper announced. "X marks the spot! This way!"

Soon enough, the unlikely threesome found themselves standing in what appeared to be the ruins of the old Franklin place, now little more than a pile of ancient crumbling stones.

"This had better not be all there is..." Zaus said, his patience close to its end.

"No no, follow me!" Ayita exclaimed before dashing ahead into the rubble. Uncovering a long hidden door, she lead Zaus and Pepper down a flight of stairs and into the not so good doctor's cobwebbed laboratory. There, before their very eyes was the time machine. Pepper couldn't believe it. This was the machine that had started her on this insane adventure (well, alright, her night wasn't exactly proceeding as normal before that, but it did turn things up a notch) and now it was her only hope of getting home. Behind her, Zaus smiled, his hairy mitts still holding the gun...
111211111211221111111112112222.title: Ayita

1112111112112211111111121122222.content:
"Great Raven's Juggs!" Zaus exclaimed, unable to put his amazement in any other words. "This machine... with this machine, I will control the destiny of the world!"

As he reveled in his monetary mania, Pepper and Ayita conspired behind him, looking around the lab for anything that could be used as a weapon. What none of them noticed however, was the corpse. See, lying on the floor somewhere off to the side of the room was an ancient skeleton dressed in a lab coat and a further coat of dust and cobwebs. If anyone present would have taken the time to notice the thing, they'd have realized that whoever the corpse had been in life had not died a natural death, for where his skull should be was instead a large and heavy looking rock lying in a bed of shattered bone. No one present had noticed it of course... but perhaps... someone past?

Without warning, light once again began to pour out of nowhere, filling the room with energy and howling winds. Whirling and aiming his gun, Zaus was quickly overtaken by what appeared to be a Gillman accompanied by a strange bird creature, both servants of Dr. Franklin who was clearly not happy with what this vision of the future said about his eventual fate. Pepper and Ayita watched in fear as the monsters grappled with the ape man. The gun went off, the bullet ricochetting off the walls, causing the girls to scream and hide beneath a table for all the good it would do, but in moments Dr. Zaus was subdued and dragged through the portal. Not requiring a hint the two girls quickly followed suit, leaving this horrible future behind... or rather in front of them, as they traveled back in time to the present.

choices: Dr. Zaus changed history! The apes rule Earth.
The world is still the same, stop Bigfoot!
11121111121122111111111211222221.content:
A flash of light, and sickening sensation of being flung backward in time both hit the girls hard but as quickly as it had happened, it was over and now the two naked teens were sitting on the hard stone floor of the castle. In front of them The Gillman and Bird creature held the prone form of Dr. Zaus in front of Dr. Franklin. A large grin on the mad mans face.
"I welcome you to the past." He said, his vocie a mix of glee and insanity. "You will be a great asset in my experiments Dr. Zaus."
"Not in my lifetime you hairless slime ball!"
With great strength Dr. Zaus pulled his right arm out of the Birdmans grip and struck the scientist with his fist, enraged, the Birdman tried to stab Dr. Zaus with his massive beak but the naked ape doctor dodged the act, causing the beak to drive itself directly in the Gillmans head.
With the Bird stuck in his companions head, Dr. Zaus ran after the scientist. The two girls meanwhile ducked out of the way and into a corner.
Dr. Franklin had tried to go for a gun but Dr. Zaus had stopped him. Now the two insane doctors struggled, Franklin showing a surprising amount of strength against the much larger and stronger foe, however the Ape-doctor was still more power and quickly pushed dr. Franklin into one of the walls, his hands gripped over the humans doctors throat.
"For the glory of the apes!"
However, a blood-curdling screech suddenly distracted him as the enraged Birdman, now free from its co-works flesh grabbed Zaus from behind and spun him around. Dr. Franklin quickly recovered and grabbed his gun...

In the corner Pepper and Ayita were frozen. Whoever won this would come after both of them. it was then Pepper noticed a rock, probably part of the castle that had fallen off over the years...she also remembered what she saw in the future...
Without a second thought Pepper grabbed the rock and charged forward pure rage flowing through the nerdy nude teen. Rage at Dr. Franklin for putting her through hell, rage at Dr. Zaus for the things he did to her rage and everything else...
The rock crashed through Dr. Franklins skull with more force than Pepper realized she could muster. His head exploded into pieces of blood, bone, and brain. Some of it landing on Pepper.
Meanwhile Dr. Zaus had overpowered the Birdman and once again sent it crashing forward into something...this time the primary controls for the time machine. As the hybrid creature smashed into the equipment, it caused the Time Machine to suddenly turn on, sparks and temporal energy flashed around the room as the device was sent into overload.
Dr. Zaus then turned his attention to Pepper. His eyes filled with anger he lunged forward and pinned the nude teen on the ground. His penis hardening and his hands wrapped around her throat.
"I will take over this time with my superior ape skills, but first you miserable little cunt I will rob your of your dignity...and your life."
The Doctor smiled as he prepared to enter Peppers moist nether regions but...
"GET YOUR FILTHY PAWS OFF HER YOU DAMN DIRTY APE!"
The last thing Dr. Zaus saw was a large metal pipe swing into his face, stringing his nose and eyes. The ape-man stumbled backwards, clutching his face.
"You bitch! You'll pay for that you little..."
However the good doctor did not notice where he was going, and suddenly found himself falling into the time machine. Seconds later a bright flash engulfed the room, and the damaged time machine shut itself down. Permanently.

Ayita lowered her hands from over her eyes and looked at the trashed lab. The bodies of Dr. Franklin and the Gillman were lying on the floor, while the burnt corpse of the Birdman was jammed into the time machines controls. Lying in the middle of the floor was Pepper, and above her holding a metal pipe, naked and bruised was Crystal.
The nude Asian dropped the pipe and pulled Pepper to her feet.
"You all right Pep?"
"Crystal..." Pepper choked out, Ayita had found enough courage to stand up and join them. "What the..."
"I was in the back of the room the whole time." Crystal explained. "Once you guys and the ape were brought in the scientist lost interest in me and stopped paying attention. I was scared for most of it but when I saw that ape attacking you I just kinda...snapped."
"Where do you think he ended up?" Ayita asked.
"Somewhere unpleasant I hope." Pepper said bitterly. "What that asshole and his friends did to me..."
"Friends!" Ayita said suddenly. "Bigfoot still has Liz and everybody else!"
Pepper eyes widened. "How long was I gone for?"
"In our time? About three hours. The Doctor fast forwarded through a lot of your adventure."
Pepper blinked in confusion. "He had a fast forward feature? How the hell does that work?" Before waiting for an answer Pepper continued. "We have to contact the authorities before Big Foot can organize an army! Come on!"
Pepper began to leave but Crystal stopped her, her arms across her chest.
"I know this is a bad time to ask but can we get some clothes first?"
"No time for that!" Ayita said, grabbing Crystals arm. "We have to stop those Gorillas from commingling genocide on your species. Modesty can wait."
With Crystal grumbling about stubborn initiation rituals, the three naked teens made their way to the outside. But none of them considered where Dr. Zaus had ended up or how he could have changed things...
11121111121122111111111211222221.title: They arrive back in Dr. Franklin's lab

111211111211221111111112112222212.content:
the first light of dawn was starting to creep over the horizon. Across the still-dark forests, blue and red lights blared all around. As police now combed through the woods in search of the missing girls. After Angie failed to return Sara to the nudist camp, Miss Stack had called in the big guns. In no time at all the police had found the remains of the Deputies uniform, as well as the now empty house which once held a slumber party.

However, even deeper int he woods, far from the noise and guns of the humans was a clearing just outside a large cave. Standing at the mouth of the cave was Big Foot, his large tribe surrounding him in a circle. In the centre of that circle was Big Foots dead son atop a pile of twigs and dry grass., and around the clearing were several crude structures of wood and stone. Wrapped around the structures, tied by thick rope were the female captives. Liz, Rebecca, Carmen, Alison. Veronica, Jackie, Sara, and Angie. Naked, beaten and stained with the jizz of Big Foots tribe. All alive, all wishing otherwise.
The only one who was not tired to a pole was the busty raven. Instead she had been put crude leash, forced onto her hands and knees and now sat next to Big Foot, her head bowed in defeat and several hours of torture and rape. Big Foot himself held the leash in one hand and a torch in the other. Then in his own language began to speak (heard only as grunts to the humans):
"Tribesman!" He thundered. "This night we have suffered a great tragedy, as the life of my son Redfoot and cruelly ended by the kin of these hairless apes! The one who took his life, instead of facing us cowardly took flight and we have not found her since!"
There was a chorus of angry roars and bellows which chilled the captive humans to their bones.
"But fear not my tribesman, for our vengeance against these weak humans will soon be realized. Already I ave sent scouts to the other tribes of this land, within seven moons we will strike against their pitiful settlement and reclaim the land that is rightfully ours!"
There was another chorus of bellows, this time of approval and bloodlust.
"But for now we will put my son to rest, and while we cannot kill the brown-spotted redhead who took his life, we can still burn her her kin! Prepare to throw the females into the pit!"
Big Foot slowly lowered the torch on the makeshift pyre. As he did so the rest of the Big Feet pulled all the girls except Raven off their prison poles. Many screamed and tried to struggle, but the nights events had left them weak, and their protests were no heard.
The tribes pushed the girls forward, ready to throw them into the fire until...
"UNHAND THEM YOU FILTHY ANIMALS!"
There were several growls of confusion at the sound of their language being spoken by such a weak, high pitched voice. The source soon revealed itself, as Pepper, flanked by Ayita and Crystal soon appeared before the Big Foot tribe. All three still completely naked.
"I command you release my friends!" She growled.
Crystal leaned towards Ayita. "How does Pepper know how to speak ape?"
"Dunno, side effect of the time machine maybe?"
"That makes no sense."
Pepper held up a hand to silence them as Big Foot stepped forward.
"You are the one who murdered my son!"
"I killed him out of self-defense!"
"Excuses do not matter! You are a sniveling, hairless, slimy human who does not deserve the life of privilege your kind gives you! Soon our kind will rule this planet and you will be exterminated."
Naturally Liz and the other captives were utterly baffled at what was going on, still held by their captors the nude teens and the lone Deputy had more or less resigned themselves to their fate until now. Could they be rescued?
"I've seen what will happen if you stay alive!" Pepper shouted. "But no more Big Foot. We will kill you now!"
A large chorus of what could only be called the ape equivalent of laughter echoed throughout the clearing.
"What could three, small, unclothed humans possibly do to us?"
Pepper smiled, gesturing toward the sky. "This!"
The sound of helicopters and cars suddenly filled the air the National Gaurd and police swamped into the area. Within seconds guns started going off, the group of captives were thrown to the ground, either by the apes or by their won will. Big Foot himself roared and yanked on ravens leash.
"You will come with me!"
Raven however, had enough. Acting fast she grabbed one of the lit pyre branches and plunged it into Big Foots side. The massive ape roared in pain as his fur lit up like a Christmas tree. The burning Big Foot let go of ravens leash and fell across the burning pyre with his son. His thrashing continued for many minutes before dying down.
As this happened the remaining Big Feet scattered into the forest. Many killed in the chaos of the attack. As they were pursued by the relentless police and guardsmen, medical teams swept in to attend to the former captives. At last many of them received blankets and robes to cover themselves. At last...it was over.

Half an hour later all the girls were sitting in a circle wearing their makeshift clothes and being attended to by doctors. They had sat in silence until this point, when Liz finally spoke up.
"Pepper, what the hell happened to you? When did you become a bad ass who stood up to large ape-men?"
Pepper gave a weak smile. Weariness and exhaustion had completely overtaken her. "Believe me Liz, it's a long story."
Liz glanced at Ayita who nodded her approval then at Crystal, wrapped in a thick blanket.
"Sorry to say you failed your initiation Crystal."
At this Crystal blinked in confusion. "What? Why?"
"You're wearing a blanket."
"It's 4:30 AM! The Sun is coming up! I was naked the whole time."
"I said you had to stay naked until I said you could wear clothes. I never gave you permission to wear a blanket."
Pepper couldn't believe what she was hearing. Even after a night of rape and torture, Liz could still find ways to be a stuck-up bitch.
"Lay off her Liz." She said sternly. "Crystal saved my life and by proxy yours. She deserves to be in the group."
"I don't recall asking for a vote." Liz scoffed. "She didn't...
"Do anything wrong!" Ayita finished for her. "Get your head out your ass and just let her into the group! Crystal deserves it!"
Lizs mouth opened wide. "How dare you talk to me that way! Listen you little in-jun bitch..."
"Liz!" Crystal suddenly stood up and walked over to Liz.
"What?" Liz sneered. "You gonna cry at me? Little weak-minded bitch I don't know why I even..."
Liz was cut off as Crystal hand flung forward and collided with the rich girls cheek.
"You and your stupid, stuck up, smug bitch club can go to hell! Go fuck yourself Ms. Blueblood!"
Throwing her nose up, Crystal walked over to nearby police officer to ask about her parents picking her up.
Laughter broke out among the girls group. Drawing the attention of Angie who was giving her report to the police, and Sara and Raven who were talking to the recently arrived Miss Stack.
"She bitch slapped yo ass!" Jackie shouted in laughter.
"Way to take control Liz!"
"Shut up! I'm in charge your all fired from the group!" Liz spluttered in anger and embarrassment but she wasn't heeded. Crystal had just done something all of them wanted to do at one point or another.
Pepper and Ayita exchanged looks as they laughed. It was good to laugh again, and to them Liz having a monkey made out of her was all worth it.
111211111211221111111112112222212.title: The world is still the same, stop Bigfoot!

1112111112112211111111121122222121.content:
In later years Pepper would look back at that long, confusing night with a mixture of regret, horror, and small excitement. Raven and Sara decided to quit the nudist lifestyle because of it, and Lizs group would fall apart.
The story of Big Foot would spread across the world, within Texas itself many stories would come of it, some believed it to be an elaborate hoax, others claim it was a government conspiracy, while many more just treated it as a story. But for the Town of New Bern and the ones who lived through it, it was more than just a story, it was real and they would never look at the world the same again.
It was, simply the story of Big Foot.

Pepper awoke in a cramped cage with a sore throat and pounding headache. While she rubbed her throat absently, she observed that the cage was enclosed on three sides by metal walls, while the fourth side was composed of metal bars. She slid her feet across the cold floor, conscious of its chill temperatures stinging her bare butt. Suddenly her finger traced the ridges of stitches on the outside of her throat and she screamed.

Or she tried to, but no sound came out. Eyes widened in terror, she grasped the bars of the cage and opened her mouth wide, trying to shout something, anything. But no words came out of her mouth and she felt no vibrations in her throat.

“Is this one ready for adoption?” a voice said. A tall ape stepped in front of the cage. He wore a button-down shirt and jeans. Pepper would have thought his wardrobe was bizarre and amusing, if her circumstances had been completely different.

“Yes,” said another ape. This one looked more like a chimpanzee as it sauntered into view beside the first ape. Pepper guessed from its delicate facial features that it was a female. She wore a lab coat and white shirt and pants. “She has been microchipped and devoiced.”

[Devoiced!] Pepper thought with horror. [Does that mean…?] She grasped her throat with both hands. [Nooooo!]

“Devoiced? I thought we waited to perform that procedure until the new owners ask for it?” the taller ape said.

“New city code regulations. The city council thinks humans make too much noise at night hours,” the female chimp responded, looking in at Pepper unconcernedly. “They aren’t capable of true speech anyway. Just noisy grunts and shrieks.”

“Y’know, the animal control officer said he could have sworn she said something before he clubbed her. I mean like real words.”

“Probably imagined it,” retorted the chimp. Looking at Pepper again, she said, “Still, she is a very pretty animal.”

“Hmm, well devoicing doesn’t sit too well with me, but I guess we have no choice, do we?” the tall ape said. “Erm, did you, uh, fix her?”

Pepper’s blood ran chill.

“No, no,” the chimp said with a shake of her head. “That’s still up to the new owners.”

The tall ape nodded his understanding. “Very well. We have our first visitors for the day. I’ll let them in.”

Pepper grasped the bars and pulled on them, but they didn’t budge and made no sound. She wanted to scream at the two apes walking away from her; She wanted to swear at them, curse them, and tell them they had no right to imprison her and take out her vocal cords. But she couldn’t, and she knew it.

It was then that she saw that the walls of the room were lined with cages, and the cages were filled with humans. With disgust she observed that they were all naked, with dirty, uncut hair and yellow teeth. There were humans of all ages in the cramped cages. Seeing the naked young men and women, children and teenagers was bad enough, but seeing the nude, wrinkly skin of elderly people gave Pepper the urge to vomit. The women and young girls were all rather ugly, she noticed. Also, just as the chimpanzee had said, those humans that made noise didn’t say anything; They merely growled and howled like, well like animals, Pepper thought with continued disgust. Many of them appeared to have been ‘devoiced’ as well, because they could only pound on the floors of their cages and stretched their mouths wide open as if to cry out, but no sound came out.

[It’s just like in all those scifi movies,] Pepper thought. [The human raced must have regrssed over time, which means I was transported to the future, or to some alternate dimension.]

After observing the other caged humans, Pepper was not surprised when she soon became the center of attention. Adult apes and their children crowded around her cage to peer in at her. She pressed herself against the back of her cage and hugged her knees to her chest, shivering in terror.

Tens of requests to adopt Pepper came in all at once, so the animal shelter staff were forced to draw numbers out of a bucket to see who would get her.

“YES!” a towering gorilla shouted when his number was drawn. Smiling ferociously, he lumbered along behind two chimpanzee staff members as they approached Pepper’s cage. The other apes sighed and grumbled their disappointment.

Pepper’s heart pounded in her chest when she saw the gorilla. He reminded her eerily of the Bigfoot creatures that had attacked her. Then the cage was unlocked, the door swung open, and his large, meaty hands reached in and yanked her out of the cage.

With his hands around her waist he held her up for admiration. Her red hair flailed around with each twist of her neck, and like Anne Darrow in the hand of King Kong she twisted in the gorilla’s grasp and thrashed her legs helplessly. Unlike the typical damsel in distress, however, she couldn’t even scream.

Tucking Pepper under one arm, the gorilla loped back to the counter and paid her adoption fee. More chimpanzees fastened a collar and leash around her neck, and the gorilla dragged her out of the building and into his pickup truck.

“These are perfect,’ his rumbling voice sighed while his thick black fingers squeezed Pepper’s big boobs. The thirteen-year-old teenage girl was nowhere near strong enough to resist him. All she could do was struggle in the passengers seat. “So lovely and so big.”

Unfortunately for Pepper, the gorilla had not ‘adopted’ her out of the kindness of his heart. He intended to use her as a...

1112111112112211111122.content:
The sudden sound of the engine starting up made Pepper jump. Her nerves were shot. It seemed like everything in this godforsaken world was out to get her. Danger, indignity, madness, pain and suffering not only lurked around every corner, but seemed to float freely in the air, surrounding her at all times. Thoughts like these ran through her head as the pickup truck lumbered its way out of the parking lot and out onto the road. She thought about struggling, maybe trying to fight or escape her captor while he was distracted by the task of driving, but she quickly gave up on that. Even if she could escape from him, where would she go? She wasn't even sure of where she was. The only thing that seemed apparent was that home was far far away.

Home. Even if she made it back somehow, some way, she'd never be the same again. Those fucking bastards took her voice from her. Animals! Monsters! She started to cry. Head in her hands, she wept like a lost and injured child, all of her confusion and anger and despair flowing out of her in the form of bitter, desperate tears.

Pepper was so involved in her emotional breakdown that it took her a few moments to feel the powerful fingers gently scratching and rubbing the back of her head. Pulling her head up from her hands, Pepper looks to her side to see her captor was watching the road and steering with his left hand, while seemingly trying to comfort her with his right. Pepper leaned back in her seat and the gorilla returned his right hand to the steering wheel. Pepper sniffled. Tears were still running down her face. They fell from her chin like tiny drops of rain, making soft predictable impacts on her bare, heaving chest. Nothing could change the way she felt right now, but she knew that she couldn't afford to wallow in self pity. Her eyes were now fixed on the world outside her window. She had to keep her wits about her, and figure this world out. It was her only hope.

It all looked so similar to her time that she thought (hoped) that it was all some sort of dream. It was so surreal! Everything, the architecture, the cars, the clothing, everything was made in the exact same style as her own time and place. The signs and advertisements were even printed in English! It seemed the only difference was that apes were in charge and humans had devolved to the level of lower primates... perhaps even less than that judging by what she saw at the "shelter." She had to be in another time, or another dimension, a sort of "What if apes ruled the world?" dimension. Those were the only things that made any sense. Unless this was some alien world that, by design or chance, seemed to mimic the Earth in every detail save for its choice of dominant species. Or maybe this was all some kind of magic spell. Or maybe it was a bad dream. She really hoped that it was a bad dream.

As she was trying to read a distant sign (she may have lost her voice, but her eyesight was better than it ever had been before) an suv pulled up right next to the pickup truck, blocking her view. Instead of looking at the sign, Pepper found herself staring at two ape children, chimps, by the looks of them, literally bouncing up and down in the backseat as their parents argued in the front. They must have caught her watching them, because the chimp kids quickly stopped their bouncing and crowded around the driver's side window to stare right back at her. Feeling a sudden stab of self consciousness, Pepper covered her breasts with her hands and slid down in her seat so that her tits were no longer visible to outsiders. Unperturbed, the little ape kids just seemed to laugh and began making ludicrous faces at her. Becoming angry and annoyed, Pepper decides to indulge herself by sticking her tongue out at the apes and making a face of her own. That seemed to shock them for a moment, but once that moment had passed, it seemed to just act as motivation for further shenanigans. It seemed as though she'd started a little silent war.

Pepper could no longer talk, but it made her feel good to be able to express herself somewhat, even if it was in such a ridiculous way. Still, it was a relief to her when the pickup truck pulled away and traveled down another path. The ape kids seemed disappointed to see her go, but honestly she would just as soon never see them again. The big apes were bad, but something about the kids just creeped her out.

After some more driving, the speed of the pickup finally began to slow, coming to a stop outside of what looked like a small suburban farm. Looking up at the sign above the entrance, Pepper's jaw dropped. "Gus's Petting Zoo. $5 to see, $6 to touch, and $10 to ride. Bring the kids! Fun for the whole family!" It was like somebody was deliberately going out of their way to torment her.

Before letting Pepper out however, he was met by a smaller, more feminine looking ape with golden hair, wearing a tight top and daisy duke jean shorts. With that, she took hold of the leash and gently but sternly guided Pepper out of the car and onto her knees. Pepper could tell that she had a lot of experience with animals. "Oh my god, look at these!" Pepper's eyes opened wide as Elly grabbed a hold of her ass cheeks with both hands. “She's got cute little spots on her tushy!" Pepper was mortified. All she could do was kneel there on her hands and knees while little miss animal lover treated her behind like a squeeze toy.

"They're called freckles sweetie. They're pretty rare in humans now a days, but I read about them back when I was studying to be a vet."

"Take her into the stables and get her cleaned up. Somethin tells me this little red head is going to be a fan favorite."

"Sure thing, dad!" Elly replied, getting back up onto her feet and leading Pepper back towards what looked like stables. Pepper couldn't believe that she was being led around like this on her hands and knees, but she was being pulled along too fast, and wasn't being given enough slack to rise up onto her feet. It really was a humiliating position to be in. It left none of her limbs free to provide any modesty, her beautiful tits swung loose and free beneath her, and her naked butt was sticking out like she was about to take it doggy style at any moment. On top of that, she was sure that anybody looking at her from behind would have a clear and unencumbered view of her coochie. Humans seemed to be expected to crawl around like this all the time in this strange place, and the very thought reminded Pepper that she was in for a long and humiliating ordeal.

When they reached the stable, Pepper noticed that most of the stalls were empty. What few animals remained appeared to be of your regular barnyard variety, a sickly looking goat, a sleeping pig, that sort of thing. Pepper thought to herself, [The other animals are either on display right now, or this is the most rundown petting zoo I've ever seen...]

After tying Pepper to a post, Elly brought out a large wooden bucket and filled it with water from a hose. After adding some kind of soap, the ape girl stirred it around until the water was a bubbling brew. After grabbing a sponge and a scrub brush, she marched on over to Pepper and unclipped her collar. "I bet you’re glad to get that nasty thing off your neck. If it were up to me, you wouldn't even have to wear it. I think all animals should be allowed to run around naked and free! Don't you think so, Freckles?" "Freckles" naturally didn't answer, but she did glower at Elly pretty visibly. Naked and free. Yeah, right. Normally, Pepper wouldn't be caught dead wearing the kind of short shorts Elly was running around in, but right now, she'd kill for them.

Noticing that Pepper was getting skittish, Elly decided to work some of her magic. Placing a firm paw on Pepper's bare shoulder, she whispered into the girls ear words of comfort as she slowly started to run her hand down the naked teen's bare back spending far too much time than Pepper would have liked caressing her vulnerable behind.

"Come on Freckles, bath time! Who's a good girl? Who's a good girl?"

115332212.content:
(Originally authored by faith)

Angie Summers made her rounds through the small backwoods of her town. The deputy looked at the moon riding high in the sky, and turned the brights of her small patrol pickup on once more. A thin layer of mist coming off the old creek gave the woods a creepy feeling, as it obscured everything at ground level. Angie muttered to herself, lamenting having pulled this duty shift on a night like this.

The town cemetery was a ramshackle, spawling affair easily as old as the town itself. The walls were high and topped with iron spikes, but they were old and crumbling in places. The old gates were rust covered monstrosities the town really needed to replace but never seemed to devote the budget to. The cemetery was a favorite haunt (okay, bad choice of words) for stray cats and wilder things sneaking in out of the wood. Occasionally, some local kids would sneak in and deface one of the tombstones. Angie's job was to patrol the area, make sure nothing untoward was happening and that no one was there.

Frankly, Angie couldn't think of a creepier place along her entire route.

As she stopped in front of the imposing wrought iron gates, Angie stood in awe a moment. That moment lasted long enough to notice the pad lock was lying on the ground, sheered cleanly through. Angie glared. Well, there was one way out of this cemetery, and that was through this narrow road. She turned her patrol car around, backed it up so that it was right against the gate, and turned off the engine. Now anyone who arrived by car couldn't easily get out with a giant obstruction blocking their way through the narrow gate. Angie took out her flashlight and crept inside the cemetery. She kept a hand near her fire arm, but her training said never to remove her weapon until she was certain there was a clear threat.

The night was still except for a faint wind coming up the hill. She could hear the far off noises of the town if she concentrated, and the closer at hand but still distant calls of birds and insects in the woods. But the graveyard had high walls, and while things from either of those worlds could occasionally intrude, it belonged to an alltogether different place. There was a silence here altogether perfect.

Except she could here something. A scraping sound, something metallic crunching against rock and dust. It came irregularly, first a soft grinding across the ground, then a louder thump. Then the grinding again, followed quickly by the thump. Angie turned her light off and let her eyes adjust to the dark. The noise was coming from her left. In the direction of the newest part of the cemetery. Angie caught the faintest hint of movement.

She made her way gingerly along the tombstones. The last thing she needed was to give herself away by crashing into something. She started at each shadow, having to consciously remind herself there was nothing there. Except her and this intruder.

She hid behind a tomb, and made out a shadow standing over a grave. Close by, a white van with a corporate logo could be seen, the name Falkenstein Institute emblazoned on the side. Angie realized, with a sickening feeling, that the sound she'd been listening to was the rise and fall of a shovel. Someone was digging up graves...

"POLICE! STAY WHERE YOU ARE!" Angie cried, clicking the flashlight on and unbuckling the restraint on her holster, resting one hand on her sidearm while keeping it in the belt. The light revealed a shapely figure in a lab coat and black heels, raven black hair tumbling over a pretty face with a thick pair of glasses in small frames. The woman appeared to be caucasian, curvy with shapely breasts. The woman was easily a foot shorter than the sheriff. The woman paused, holding the shovel in her hands.

"Put the shovel on the ground a turn around slowly. Keep your hands where I can see them." Angie ordered.

"This is a bad idea, officer." The woman noted in a nuetral tone.

"Yes, graverobbing tend to be a pretty terrible idea. Turn around. What's your name?" Angie demanded.

"Dr. M. Lovell Bombarell." The woman identified. "Or doctor lovebomb, if your one of those apes from my home office."

"Well, doctor, exactly what do you think your doing here tonight?" Angie demanded.

"Finishing something I started, Officer." Bombarell said. "Please, let me finish. I'll be happy to submit to any questions or be taken in as you feel appropriate, but we need to hurry! They could rise at any moment!"

"What are you-" Angie began, only to feel her foot seized by a thick hand. A hand, protruding from the ground, its skin a pale gray and its grip vice like.

The hand kept its tight grip as she pounded on it mercilessly, filling the air with squishing sounds, as her makeshift weapon was tenderizing her attackers hand. "Help me!" she yelled to the doctor, as she kept up her assault. The hand loosened a bit, but another hand burst out of the ground and made a grabbing motion towards her. 1153322121.title: Shaking Hands

11533221211.content:
Though the doctor was nowhere in sight, that didn't bother Angie very much. She knew where the woman was going. She just had the follow the sound of the rumbling engine and the muffled cursing. Sure enough, Dr. Bombarell was exactly where Angie expected her to be: in her van, parked by the entrance and unable to pass thanks to the old police vehicle blocking the closed iron gates.

Angie waited until the not so good doctor opened the door of her van, getting out of the vehicle to see if she couldn't figure some way past short of crashing her van through the gate and hoping she doesn't kill herself in the process. As soon as she had both feet on the ground, Dr. Bombarell had the unpleasant experience of feeling them swept out from underneath her as the dutiful deputy sent her to the ground with practiced skill.

"Stand up, hands where I can see them!" Angie commanded. The doctor did as she was told, rising from the ground with her hands up. Though initially stunned, she now seemed to have regained her composure. Once she was back on her feet, she regarded the deputy with bemusement written on her face. Deadpan, the doctor opined "I don't mean to tell you how to do your job officer, but this strikes me as a rather awkward time to be making an arrest."

"Oh, don't worry" Angie replied "we'll be out of here soon enough. And It'll go much faster if you answer me straight. What the hell was that back there?" Without any change at all in her facial expression, the doctor replied "An accident I'm afraid. The product of a chemical spill."

"What kind of chemical?" the deputy prodded, suspiciously. Not missing a beat, the doctor continued, "2-4-5 Trioxin. A defoliant commissioned by the US Army and developed by the now defunct Darrow Chemical Company. It was initially designed to be sprayed on marijuana plants in the 60's, part of the ever expanding war on drugs. It would have worked perfectly if not for the unforeseen side effects. This wonderful and woefully misunderstood chemical can reanimate necrotic cells. In laymen's terms, it has the power to bring the dead back to life."

The doctor couldn't help but smile after finishing that last sentence, and if the black sky overhead were not still clear as a bell, Angie would have expected her little speech to be punctuated by a flash of lightning. "You mean that thing back there... that was a...a Zombie?"

The doctor's smile faded as she formulated her answer, "That is an extremely unhelpful and uncharitable way of putting it, officer. Zombie is such a... such a... derogatory term. It conjures up images of brainless victims of primitive voodoo mind control or shambling hordes of the cannibalistic undead. Can't you see how that kind of attitude can only hinder scientific progress? The work that I'm doing..."

Angie cut her off, mid ramble, sparing a moment to look behind her and check on the progress the creature was making in escaping it's grave "What exactly are you doing out here Dr.? And make it fast, that thing is almost out of the ground..."

"I was conducting an experiment. In the wake of the isolated disasters caused by the trioxin in Pennsylvania and Kentucky, the government closed down the Darrow Chemical Company and took possession of all of their research. It sat in the backrooms of one military installation or another, collecting dust as fear and ignorance kept it locked away for years. Finally, someone at the Pentagon grew a pair and decided it was time to dust off the old research and see if modern science could make those amazing chemicals a benefit to mankind. That’s when they sent them to us, the Falkenstein Institute. Unfortunately, the small minded idiots I work with didn't have the stomach for the job. The results we got scared the pants off of them, and they sent the information back to the Pentagon, washing their hands of it forever... but I wasn't ready to give up. I kept samples of the trioxin, and made copies of all the notes... it was painstaking work, but it's all worth it. I've made such progress... but I'm only one woman officer. One woman shouldering such a herculean task... well, accidents are bound to happen. While acquiring a test subject for tonight's experiment, I failed to properly secure the barrel of Trioxin I was carrying in the back of my van. The chemicals spilled out and seeped into the earth and there was nothing I could do about it. Nothing except to proceed as planned."

"You were going to dig up a body, load it into your van and drive away like nothing happened?" Angie angrily finished the doctor's thought for her. "What else was I supposed to do? That fellow who grabbed your leg is only the beginning. If you listen closely now, you can hear the others clawing their way to the surface."

Lovell was right, Angie could hear it now. The scratching, the clawing, the sifting dirt, the low, muffled moaning. In a few moments, the entire graveyard would be up and about and this field of tombstones would become the last place on earth any living person would want to be. It was about this time that Angie noticed that her grabby friend from before had freed himself totally from the ground. He was a real wreck. His skin was greenish and missing patches here and there. It clung tight to his bones, and this combined with his missing nose gave him the undeniable look of something that was once human, but now human no more. The top of his head was bald and wrinkled with a scraggly ring of filthy white hair trailing down his shoulders from the sides of his head. His fingernails were long and clawed and his left leg was rotted and broken, hindering his progress as he dragged it along on his slow but relentless march towards the two living breathing females loitering about the entrance way. As Angie reaches for her gun, the creature reaches out with its near pulverized hand. It opens its rotting jaw and calls out...
11533221211.title: She looks for the doctor

choices: Climb the fence and get the hell out of there!
115332212111.content:
"BRAAAAAAAAINSSSSSS!"

Pulling her gun out of its holster, Angie takes aim, lining up a head shot as the creature continues to lumber forward heedlessly. Before she waists a bullet, she calls back over her shoulder "Can it be killed?"

"No." The doctor replies, seemingly unworried. "But you're welcome to try. I have a better solution in hand." Her attention now fully on the doctor, Angie watches as the dark haired mad scientist pulls a strange looking gun out of her white lab coat. Taking aim at the creature, she fires, and in a flash a large dart lodges itself in the creature's neck. The Zombie's head snaps back as the dart empties its chemical contents into the walking corpse. The monster's eyes roll up into the back of its head and the beast collapses into a peaceful looking heap on the floor.

Stunned, Angie turns to Lovell and asks the obvious question. Smiling smugly, the doctor explains "The Trioxin affected bodies are animated, but not physically regenerated. Though they can move around, think and feel, their bodies are still quite dead, and, as you can imagine, that is an incredibly painful state to exist in. Amazingly however, the poor creatures know exactly how to soothe their pain. The chemicals contained within the human brain act as a kind of narcotic to them. It takes away the pain of being dead, but only temporarily. It took me months to discover which particular chemicals the creatures crave, and in what dosage, but with that knowledge in mind, I have essentially created a Zombie tranquilizer.
