One look in the deputy’s direction confirmed what the doctor had surmised: The vibrations were getting to her too. Unfortunately, this wasn’t their stop. Saying her goodbyes, Emily rose from the flatbed and hopped off. As she did, the back of her skirt flew up behind her, briefly exposing her ass. When she hit the ground, she pushed the back of her skirt down and blushed before running to the driver’s side door and thanking Gus for all of his help. Emily waved goodbye as the truck pulled away before heading to the front door of her house.
1153322121112121221221.title: The Long Ride Home

11533221211121212212211.content:
Standing in the light of the porch lamp, Emily straightened her outfit out and made sure her lack of underwear wouldn’t be too apparent. She would certainly have a hard time explaining that one to her mom. When the door before her opened, Emily was greeted by the sight of her mother, wearing a short white bathrobe and nothing else. That would have been bad enough (Her mom wasn’t really the type to walk around the house like that, let alone answer the door in that condition) but her hair was an utter wreck, and she had a faraway look in her eyes that Emily had never seen before. Without uttering a word, Mrs. Nurrelli led her daughter inside and closed the door behind her.

Inside, Emily was greeted by yet another strange sight. The living room was filled with ugly men in old, dusty suits some shambling about, a few going through drawers, and others still simply lying about and looking utterly stoned. Two among them however grabbed her attention. One was seated on the loveseat, typing away on a laptop, and the other was sitting on the couch with his feet up on the coffee table. What attracted her attention to these two in particular was the fact that they were both looking right at her.

“Mom, whats…” But, before Emily could finish her sentence, the old, disfigured man on the couch stood up and began to approach her. Emily felt her mother’s hands close on her shoulders from behind, an act meant to comfort, but also to discourage escape. As Mrs. Nurrelli reached out, a single drop of green slime began to fall within her robe. The green droplet broke away from the slimy gob that the woman held between her breasts. It slithered down her chest and stomach before landing in her thick patch of pubic hair. The droplet made its way through her dark bush before dribbling out and falling away from her body and slipping out from under her robe. At last the green droplet made a tiny splash on the hardwood floor, unnoticed by all.

“What—who--!?” Emily questioned, squirming within her mother’s grasp as the walking horror approached her, becoming more gruesome and repugnant with each step. “Emily, sweet cheeks, what’s wrong? Is that any way to greet your ol’ grand dad?” As Emily’s brow crinkled in confusion, the old man seized her by the hand. “Grand dad? You’re not my grandpa! And Grandpa Nurrelli died…” The rot withered wreck just smiled as a spider crawled out from under his sleeve and alighted on his granddaughter’s hand. If any of the neighbors heard her scream, nobody called the cops.
11533221211121212212211.title: Emily

115332212111212122122111.content:
Once again the truck and trailer pulled to a stop, this time, just outside the Summers home. Unlike the scattered cluster of homes deeper in the woods, the Summer’s home was located in a more suburban area, with several houses in plain sight of one another. Angie and Jennifer both knew that if they were going to avoid being seen by their neighbors, they were going to have to be fast. As soon as the truck came to a stop, Angie took Jennifer by the hand and leaped from the vehicle, making a mad dash for their front door. Jennifer barely had time to give Adam a passing glance before her bare feet hit the pavement, and the truck rumbled on down the road. Choosing speed over modesty, neither girl bothered to cover up. Hand in hand, they ran from the sidewalk to the front door, breasts flopping and butts bouncing every step of the way.

All in all, they made it to the door in record time, and they both hoped that nobody had noticed their midnight streak. Unfortunately for them, the rumbling of the truck and trailer did not go unnoticed. As the vehicle passed through the neighborhood, more than one bedroom light came on in response as the occupants were raised from their sleep, not used to loud noises in their quiet little neighborhood at this time of the night. More than one nosy neighbor managed to catch a glimpse of their fast flesh as they ran by, but the really lucky customer was Mrs. Cragg, the old widow who lives across the street. A gossip monger and all around busy body, Mrs. Cragg made it her business to keep tabs on the whole neighborhood, and part of that meant always having a pair of binoculars handy. Leaning on her windowsill, old Craggy watched in stunned silence as Angie and Jennifer made it to their front door, bouncing up and down with adrenaline (and much more in Angie’s case) coursing through their veins.

Mrs. Cragg tried to rationalize it. This couldn’t be what it appeared. Well, maybe it could be with Jennifer. Mrs. Cragg had always been of the opinion that most young girls in this day and age are sluts who’d just love to prance around with their dirty pillows hanging out, if given the opportunity, but Angie was an upstanding member of the community, and an officer of the law to boot! What could possess her to venture out into the night wearing nothing but a smile, endangering not only her good name, but her job as well? There had to be another explanation. After all, her eyesight wasn’t the best. Maybe she was just wearing a flesh colored bikini, or one of those ‘thongs’ she’d heard about on TV. As if in answer to her question, Angie waved a hand towards her little sis, a silent order to step aside as she bent over to retrieve the spare key she kept under the welcome mat. As she did, old Craggy zoomed in with her binoculars, and soon it became very apparent to her that Angie was indeed totally bottomless. As the two naked Summers girls disappeared into the house, Mrs. Craggs put her binoculars down and tried to figure out her next move. This was huge news. She couldn’t wait until tomorrow to tell someone. But who amongst her gossip circle would be up at this hour? It was then that she remembered the Laptop computer her little niece had gotten her for Christmas last year. It had been collecting dust in her basement for months, but if ever there was a better reason for instant communication, old Craggy couldn’t imagine it.

After slamming the door shut behind her, Angie put her hand to her head and collapsed limply onto the couch. She was exhausted, and horny, and relieved and terrified all at the same time. Jennifer, quite a bit more composed, but still panting and even a little turned on, sat herself down beside her sister and placed a warm hand on her shoulder. This was it. This was what she had stripped for in the first place, to help her sister through this rough patch and get her life back on track. They sat there for a few long moments, silent, before Angie looked her little sister in the eyes and said “You should probably start getting ready for bed, you have school tomorrow.”

Jennifer was a little taken aback by that. The thought of having to face all of her fellow students tomorrow was something she hadn’t thought of until just now. So many of them had seen her naked body, and so many more would see it once the pictures began to circulate via the internet. Feeling a growing sense of apprehension, Jennifer barely mumbled “Do I have to?”

Putting an arm around her little sister and looking sympathetically into her eyes, Angie replied “I’m afraid so. This whole thing is pretty big, and tonight was… well, tonight was a mess. But we can’t just put our lives on hold because of it. Believe me, I’d like to, but it’s not an option. We’re just going to have to grin and bare it.” This drew a tiny, sad smile from Jen, and soon she was on her feet. “Now, go on up stairs and get ready for bed. Believe me, I’m not looking forward to tomorrow anymore than you are.

The two sister’s shared an awkward, but meaningful hug, and then Jennifer disappeared up stairs. It was only thoughts of tomorrow that got Angie off of her bare buns and into the kitchen. Work! They’d be wondering what had happened to her. At least they would if Bob and his undead goons hadn’t gotten to them already. Bob had threatened the sheriff pretty blatantly, and Angie just hoped that the little detour at the school had been enough to set their plans back for the night.

Snatching the phone from its resting place on the wall, Angie quickly dialed in the number for the station house. The phone rang for only a few moments before a vaguely familiar male voice answered. “Sheriff’s office, what seems to be the problem?”
115332212111212122122111.title: Angie and Jenny

1153322121112121221221111.content:
“Chief?” Came Angie’s response.

“Sorry, the Chief’s not available right now. This wouldn’t happen to be Deputy Angie now would it?”

Angie went silent for a moment. She had an idea of who was on the phone now, and it wasn’t a cop. “Yes, it’s me. Who is this?”

“Names’ Stan. You may remember me from such films as ‘The Doctor and the Deputy Go to the Grave Yard’ and ‘Dawn of the Dead II: The Butt Fucking of Angie Summers!’ Believe it or not, I got a nomination for best supporting member for that last one.”

“Not from what I remember…” Angie blurted out, angrily remembering the vicious treatment the Zombies had submitted her too earlier in the night.

“Oh! A smart ass huh? Well, we’ll see how smart you look tomorrow when—“

“What have you done with the Sheriff!?” Angie asked, finally losing her patience.

“Nothing yet.” Stan replied, honestly. “Waiting for a call from headquarters on that one. The boss isn’t sure whether he wants him killed, controlled, or made into one of us. For right now, he’s a little less than conscious, but he’s still in one piece. Oh, and speaking of calls from the boss, I heard all about the way you weaseled out of that whole school thing. My sincerest congrats on that amazing bit of bullshitting.”

“Uhm… thanks. It was mostly Monica’s idea.”

“Well, bully for her. I still can’t believe those saps actually believed that load of crap! I mean, how dumb are the people in this town? If they believe a weird story like that, then the boss is right, we’re gonna take this town for all it’s worth.”

Angie thought to herself “Not if I can help it.” But her mouth said “What do you want from me?”

“For now, not much. Just show up for work tomorrow bright and early. Make sure you bring your, gun belt, your boots, your hat and your badge… and nothing else.”

“…You can’t be serious…”

“Sure I am. Dead serious. Little Zombie humor there… anyway, yeah, I am. See, me and the boys have been looking over a lot of the records over here at the station house, locals laws and what not. The boss’s tech monkey Kyle’s been doing the same back at HQ. You are aware that there’s a nudist colony nearby, aren’t you?”

“Yes…” Angie answered, slowly, cautiously.

“Well, they had to get zoning for that shit. You can’t just build a cabin out in the woods and let a bunch of naked teenagers have the run of the place. When the camp was first set up, the nudies lobbied hard for a big long stretch of land where they could be one with the earth or whatever. You know, so they could wander off the campgrounds and not get hassled by the local authorities. So, technically, within your precincts whole jurisdiction, public nudity is totally legal. Which is great for you, because we got a whole bunch of calls a few minutes ago regarding a couple of hot chicks streaking around your neighborhood. You wouldn’t believe the shocked responses we got when we told them it was legal. I swear, the level of ignorance in this town is just… refreshing.”

Stan followed up his last observation with an unsettling 15 seconds of dark chuckling. When he was through, Angie responded. “Be that as it may, I’m still an officer of the law. The department has a strict dress code, and what you’re asking me to do would be a pretty clear violation. Not to mention the fact that I’d be causing a major public disturbance anyplace I went. And how do you expect me to get any respect out of criminals if I’m walking around with my hooters hanging out!?”

After another bout of dark laughter, Stan answered, “Well, the last two things are your problems. As far as the first goes, turns out, the way the law is written, the Sheriff decides what the dress code is. All those rules and regs can be changed at the drop of a big comically stereotypical cowboy hat. And one way or another, we figure the Sheriff is going to see things our way. Anymore dumb questions?”

“…My sister, and Bombarell’s boy. I can’t speak for Monica, but I promise I’ll cooperate fully if you just promise to leave them alone. They’ve already suffered too much as it is.”

“Heh heh. Something tells me you’ll cooperate fully whether you want to or not, but, for your own momentary comfort, there are no immediate plans to hurt your little sis or the Bombarell kid. On the other hand, they will be seeing a friend tomorrow with whom we’ve had a word or two. See, there’s really no way to put a lid on what happened outside that school tonight, but we’ve got a few plans to capitalize on it, and your little sis is going to help.”

“If you hurt one hair on her head you--!”

“Relax babe! Don’t get your panties in a twist! Oh, that’s right, you can’t wear panties anymore, my mistake. Like I said, we aint going to hurt the kids, at least so long as you cooperate. We’re just going to be having a little fun with them… and advancing the gang’s agenda.”

“What are you going to do to my sister!?”

“That’s for me to know, and you to think about all night. Sleep tight Angie, and don’t forget to wake up bright and early tomorrow. It’s gonna be one hell of a day!”

With that, the phone clicked shut and Angie found herself listening to the dial tone. After hanging up the phone, she wondered out of the kitchen and into the living room, her thoughts consumed with worry. Looking up, she took note of the two identical urns located on a shelf upon the wall. The urns contained the ashes of her parents, killed only a few short years go in a head on collision. The toxicology report on the man in the other car was a mess. Not only was he blind stinking drunk, he had a number of illegal narcotics in his system. It would have been a miracle if he had gotten home without having an accident, but in the course of his self destruction, he managed to take two innocent people with him. That above all things had motivated Angie to become a cop. She had always taken such pride in her job, and in the inspiring effect it had on her little sister, but now all of that was in jeopardy because of a pack of crude, monstrous ghouls, and a stupid, spiteful lie. As she tore her eyes away from the urns, she could think of only one consolation. At least her parents had been cremated. Seeing them transformed into one of those… things… that would be a whole other level of horror that she wasn’t sure she would be able to bear.

Ascending the stairs, Angie noticed that the light was on in Jennifer’s room. Walking down the hallway, her bare feet pushing down on the cushy carpet that covered the floor, Angie wondered what she was still doing up. When she reached the door, she got her answer. Jennifer was asleep. From the looks of things, she had passed out face first into a text book, no doubt trying to finish up some last minute homework assignment that had been lost in the shuffle of the night’s events. Angie felt sorry for the poor girl. She didn’t deserve to get in trouble in class tomorrow, and she also didn’t deserve this new burden she had taken on. But she was certainly sticking with it, Angie could tell that immediately. Jennifer was still naked from head to toe, and as she had fallen asleep above the covers, Angie could see bare butt clear as the full moon in a clear night sky. Angie briefly thought about waking her to finish her homework, or at least get her covered up, but, in the end, she decided it was best to just let her sleep. She’d had a busy night, and she was sure to have a busy day tomorrow.

Thoughts about her little sister’s fate filled Angie’s mind as she made her way back down the hall to her own room. As she collapsed onto the bed, she didn’t bother to pull the covers up over her nude form. She was suddenly feeling oh so very hot, and all of the feelings she had been suppressing since her little ride on the flatbed were coming to the surface full steam ahead. As Angie closed her eyes, she felt her hands wandering down her body as her mind seemed fixated upon what might happen to her dear sweet sister tomorrow at school. The thought of Jennifer and the Bombarell boy standing naked before the assembled masses of the school sent jolts of pleasurable electricity through her body. The image remained stuck in her head despite her best efforts to banish it from her mind. That was insane! There was no way the Zombies could pull off a stunt like that! Where had she even gotten such a crazy idea? None the less, as the long dark night faded into cool dawn, the Deputy found herself dreaming about one thing and one thing only: Adam and Jennifer, naked in school. And in her dreams, she was right beside them, naked as the day she was born, with Dr. Bombarell close at hand, hot, horny, humiliated, and yet, somehow desperate for more.
1153322121112121221221111.title: It's not who she expected

11533221211121212212211111.content:
Meanwhile, further into town, two nude figures, mother and son, made their way quietly through the darkened streets of their quiet suburban neighborhood. Being the observant creature that she was, Dr. Lovebomb had noticed all of the attention Angie and Jennifer had attracted with their mad dash. Correctly deducing that it was the sound of the truck that attracted all the lookie Louse, Monica had requested that Gus drop her and her son off in the woods near their home. They’d have to go a decent distance before reaching their destination, but at the very least they’d avoid waking up the whole neighborhood.

Finally, after dodging from tree to tree and car to car, they reached the last leg of their journey, and the only thing standing between them and sanctuary was the chain link fence that surrounded their own backyard. So far, Monica and Adam had managed to keep their privates hidden from one another for most of the trip. Darkness and well placed hands saw to that. Unfortunately there was very little tree cover around their yard, and the light of the full moon bore down on the two of them, driving away the darkness around them like a street lamp and leaving them totally illuminated and exposed. And of course, the task before them now, climbing a fence, simply could not be accomplished unless both parties, at least temporarily, abandoned their modesty. Nodding to her son, Monica decided to go first.

The bookish scientist had actually never had to climb a fence before in her life, but, she was confident that it would be no big deal. Just put one foot over the other, cling to the rings with her toes, up and over, simple as that. Taking a few steps back, she ran forward, determined to get it over with as quickly as possible. Leaping from the ground, her hands flew up from their covering positions and grasped at the fence, her feet scrambling to get a hold of something, fully aware that every second she struggled was another second that her son had to watch her naked ass shaking back and forth in the cool night air.

At length, she failed, losing her grip on the fence and falling flat on her butt. Her son offered to help her up, but she scrambled quickly to her feet, covering herself back up in the process. She said, “It… it must be that my nerves are shot from all of this… excitement. This really shouldn’t be any problem.” Nodding sympathetically, Adam replied, “its okay mom. Watch me.” With that, Monica watched as her young, athletic son swiftly and easily surmounted the obstacle before him, every muscle in his body working together like a well oiled machine. It was enough to make her blush. In no time at all, he was on the other side, coaxing his mother to follow his lead. “See mom, it’s simple, just think about what you want to do before you do it.”

Nodding, Monica prepared herself for a second run. Had Adam been anyone else, his simplistic encouragement would probably have been met with scorn from the doctor, but she was his son, and that meant he got a pass. Proceeding carefully this time, Monica successfully climbed the fence, acutely aware that Adam was seeing every inch of her bare breasts and bush… what was left of it. Due to the chemical’s effects, she had been slowly shedding pubic hair all night, and her breasts were now practically the size of melons. That might have had something to do with lack of coordination. She was quickly becoming rather top heavy. Fortunately however, the rest of her body was feeling lighter and more fit.

At length, she finally managed to get herself over the fence. After straightening her glasses and acting as if it was no big thing, she proceeded to her back door and punched in the security code on her digital lock. She didn’t trust normal locking mechanisms, they were far too easily picked with rudimentary tools, and even credit cards by brainless dolts lacking even a high school education. With this electronic lock, of her own design, she felt much safer. Plus, it meant she didn’t have to carry keys around wherever she went.

Entering her house, Monica let out a sigh of relief, allowed Adam to pass and closed the door behind her. She just stood there for a few long moments trying to get her head straight. “Mom, are you okay?” Adam said, concerned. “I’m fine sweetheart.” Came Monica’s reply. Crossing her arms over her massive mammaries, she gave her son a look she reserved for occasions that called for immediate compliance or discipline “Now why don’t you go upstairs and… take care of yourself.”

“Uhm… mom, what are you…”

“You know what I’m talking about Adam, please don’t make me spell it out for you. All of this… excitement has gotten to you as well. It’s not healthy for you to walk around like that all night. Now please, go up stairs and take care of yourself quickly. And let me know when you’re done, I am in DESPERATE need of a bath.”

Looking down at his hand covered crotch, Adam blushed and made his way upstairs. Monica found that she couldn’t help but stair at his taught little behind as he went. She had to literally smack herself to shake her mind from what she knew were horrible thoughts. “It’s those blasted chemicals!” She thought “They’re playing games with my mind. First thing tomorrow morning, I need to get to work on an antidote.” This of course would be no easy task. In all the years of dedicated research, no one had ever generated an antidote for Trioxin poisoning, whether it was for the living or the dead. This new chemical the zombies spewed from their mouths seemed to be something slightly different however. While the chemical seemed similar in function to Trioxin, at least as far as its rejuvenation effects are concerned, the mind control function was something new to her. If only she could find an opportunity to analyze the green slime. There just might be a way!

It didn’t take long for Adam to finish, and soon Monica was upstairs in the bathroom filling her tub up with warm water. She couldn’t wait to be alone with herself. Then she could finally take care of her… needs… in peace. As she was bending over to test the water, she heard a knock on the door. Opening it slowly, she saw Adam standing there with his hand over his eyes. “I’m hungry mom, and there’s nothing in the fridge…” At the end of her patience, Monica replied with frustration “So order a pizza like I told you to, now leave me in peace!” Slamming the door shut, Monica instantly regretted snapping at her son, but she simply couldn’t wait anymore. She locked the door behind her, leaving Adam to puzzle over the pros and cons of ordering a pizza if he had to answer the door with his favorite topping out in the open and swinging between his legs.
11533221211121212212211111.title: Adam and Dr. Lovebomb

choices: The further nocturnal adventures of Dr. Lovebomb and the Zombie gang
115332212111212122122111111.content:
Slipping into the tub, she felt the warm water engulf her body, and as her hand drifted south of the equator, a cold shock ran through her body as she heard the phone. “Goddamnit!” She cried aloud splashing the water with her fists. Another knock on the door prompted her to rise from the tub. Opening the door once more, she saw that it was Adam again, still covering his eyes, and holding out the cordless phone for his mother to take. With an angry growl, Monica took the phone from her son and closed the door again. Sinking back into the tub for the warmth, she answered curtly, hoping to move the call along and get back to business.

“What!?”

“Come now, is that any way to talk to your main man?”

Monica froze up at the sound of his voice. It was Bob Nurrelli, no doubt about it. Gathering herself quickly, Monica replied. “What do you want?”

“Again with the mouth! What have I done to deserve such heinous disrespect? But don’t worry about it baby, I kinda like that mouth of yours. So I’ll let you use it how you like for a while, you know, let you get away with some backtalk until it starts to get on my nerves. When that day comes, and it will, I’ll have no trouble shutting you up. As permanently as necessary. Got it?”

Suppressing her anger, Monica replied “Got it.”

“Good.” The Zombie boss replied. “I heard about the whopper you told to explain away that mess me and the gang left you in. I’ve gotta say, I liked it a lot. I was talking with the boys, and we think it’d be great if you kept the story going indefinitely.”

Feeling cornered, nervous, horny and frustrated, Monica began to verbally stumble a bit “W-well, I was going to keep the story going, you know, as much as I possibly could, around the home and such, but realistically speaking…”

“Shut it. Your reality is what I tell you it is got it? Now, keep it buttoned for five minutes, so I can explain your situation to you.”

And so he did. He told her what he knew of the lies she told, wanting every detail confirmed, and he told her the plan for tomorrow.

“Okay, here’s the way it’s gonna go down tomorrow. Your gonna get up at your normal time, send your boy off to school, and then you’re gonna get ready for work. What’s the dress code like at your job?”

“Well, in the lab, safety goggles are to be worn at all times. Gloves and masks are to be worn when handling dangerous or volatile substances. Dangling sleeves and clothing made of highly flammable material are banned. While at work, a lab coat or work apron is to be worn at all times over your normal clothes.”

“So, you’re free to wear anything you want underneath?”

“Well, theoretically, yes I suppose, but the spirit of the rules…”

“Fuck the spirit of the rules. Here’s your uniform for tomorrow: You wear your glasses, and your goggles or whatever. You wear that work apron and… you got a pair of high heels?”

“Yes…”

“Red ones?”

“Yes…”

“Good. Wear em. I always had a thing for red heels. So that’s, glasses, goggles, apron and red heels, and that’s it, that’s your uniform for tomorrow, nothing else, got it?”

“Bu—bu what!?” The doctor was flabbergasted. Despite everything that had happened today, she had hoped that work would at least be a kind of sanctuary for her. “I can’t! You don’t understand, the apron only covers my front! If I wear that to work, my entire back side will be uncovered! And even from the front and sides it would be painfully obvious that I wasn’t wearing anything underneath! I’d be fired in a…”

“Hold on a sec.” Bob interrupted “This place, this lab where you work, the other scientists there, I gather they’re mostly male?”

“Yes…” Monica responded, trying to calm herself.

“And from what you said the last time I brought up your job, they’ve all got the hots for you. Something tells me nobody’s would complain too hard if you showed up in your birthday suit. If you need an explanation, just tell them what you and the deputy told the kids at the school. Tell them you’re going as naked as you can get without violating the safety codes. Or tell them you’re hot and you just couldn’t wait to take your clothes off. I really don’t care. Just be there on time, wearing what I told you to wear, and be ready to let me and the gang into the building when we show up with your van. We need more of that chemical stuff. We’re barely through the night and the supply in your truck is running dry. We may even need to grab some real brains to take the edge off before dawn.”
“So… that’s it? I wear that… that humiliating outfit, suffer the humiliation of being exposed to my co-workers, supply you with your drugs, and then you’ll be on your way?”

“Well, actually, we do have another project we’d like you to get cracking on, but we’ll tell you more about it tomorrow. What’s the rush doc? You got something better to do with your time than talk to me?”

Dr. Bombarell didn’t know what the safe answer would be, so she remained silent. In time, Bob continued “Where are you right now? And don’t try to lie; the chemicals in your veins should still be working their magic.”

“…I’m in the bath.” Monica replied, hesitantly.

“Naked?” Said Bob, lasciviously.

“No, I like to take my baths in a raincoat and goulashes, OF COURSE I’M NAKED!”

“Ha ha! There’s that mouth again! Well, good, stay that way, until tomorrow at least. Wouldn’t want to look like a liar in front of your boy, wouldja? Nah, that’d be a real shame. Okay, I’ll let you go. I think I’ve got an idea about how you would rather be spending your time…”

And with that, the prime ghoul hung up, leaving Monica at last alone. Exhaling forcefully, Monica sets the phone aside and returns to the very important work she had intended to start the moment she walked in the door. Once again, her hand drifted below the surface of the water. Her eyes closed and her head rolled back on her shoulders in anticipation of the relief that was soon to come… and then she stopped.

Eyes springing open, she looked down at her spread legs and her hand hovering over her open, waiting pussy. She couldn’t do it. No matter how badly she wanted to, the Zombie’s commands held her against her will. Dr. Lovebomb gritted her teeth and tried with all her might to do what she so savagely wanted to do… but, alas, her effort was for nothing. The chemicals coursing through her veins held her fast. Unless Bob gave her permission, she was destined to languish in unrequited sexual torment until the accursed gunk wore off… or she found some other way to satisfy her needs.

Sitting there in the tub, stewing in her own juices, Monica fairly sprang from the water at the sound of the doorbell. She didn’t know who it could be at this hour, and she didn’t care. She had obviously forgotten about the Joey’s All Night Pizza Delivery.
115332212111212122122111111.title: Dial Z for Zombie!

1153322121112121221221111111.content:
(Originally authored by faith)

Emily's alarm rang like a banshee that morning. She somehow found herself getting up, getting dressed and making her way downstairs despite the unholy hour of the morning. The way she moved and felt right now put her much closer to the state of mind of the zombies she was familiar with than the chatty, sadistic things she'd been talking to last night. Emily figured when she set her alarm, it was a much better idea to keep her Grandpa happy and on her good side. Now that five oclock had come and she actually had to get up, she couldn't help but wonder if brain eating would be any worse than this....

Somewhere over the United States, a small private aircraft made its way swiftly and gracefully through the vast blue skies. Inside, two beautiful women sat side by side pouring over several folders worth of information, virtually every note gathered by Division 13 on the arcane and twisted Trioxin project. Located directly in front of them, separated from their seats by spacious leg room, was a flatscreen monitor of respectable size. When the time was right, this would be the method by which their commander would contact them, and issue them their marching orders. For now, they knew only that their mission concerned those old barrels of vile chemicals and the fiendish ghouls they spawned, so they contented themselves with studying up on the accursed history associated with that accursed name.

Jessica Drew (or so she was called now) had heard of the Trioxin project before. It was the kind of thing that got whispered about, even in an organization as airtight and secretive as Division 13. Nobody expected those chemicals to do what they did, but when the truth came out, the shadier parts of the American Military Industrial Complex began to drool. Unfortunately, attempts to harness Trioxin, even in the name of national security, have lead to nothing but disaster after disaster. First Pittsburg Pennsylvania, then Louisville Kentucky felt the ravages of Zombie outbreaks, as accidents happened and civilians paid the price. There were several, smaller outbreaks after those two, but every time it was covered up and explained away to the public, no matter how big, no matter how small. In her time with Division 13, Jessica had seen and done strange, strange things, but this was without a doubt the creepiest thing she had ever gotten herself into. Just reading about it made her skin crawl.

Tearing her studious eyes away from the papers, Jessica took a moment to sneak a peek at her partner. As she expected, Sharon was going over the notes, calmly and dispassionately. She looked relaxed, bored even, though it was hard to tell as Jessica only very rarely caught a glimpse of the woman’s eyes. Sharon almost always wore a pair of sleek black sunglasses, and while her official codename was “the Star” her unofficial nickname around the office was “the Terminator.” Sharon had long, curly blond hair that she wore in a bun or ponytail while in the field. At present, she was wearing it long, allowing it to fall gracefully upon the shoulders of the steel grey suit jacket she wore over a fine white blouse with a matching steel gray skirt beneath. Sharon had been in the game far longer than Jessica, and her reputation as a professional soldier was infamous. When they were first assigned to be partners, Miss Tome had taken time out to impress upon Jessica how lucky she was to be partnered with one of the organization’s finest. Jessica would never forget what her boss told her when pressed for more info.

“If we had Sharon back in 68, we could have dropped her out of a helicopter behind enemy lines, buck naked with a checklist and a stick, and the Tet Offensive would never have happened.”

When she said that, Jessica had laughed politely, but after working with the Star for a short while, she was beginning to believe that her CO wasn’t kidding. Clearly, Sharon was the muscle of the operation. Jessica on the other hand… well, Jessica was special.

Jessica had long black hair, brown eyes and a slight frame. At present she was wearing a black suit jacket and skirt combo, not unlike the gray one Sharon was wearing, over a gray blouse. While Sharon was a trained killer of the commando variety, Jessica’s practical skills lay in infiltration, getting into places and getting out with vital information. In addition to stunning agility and a contortionist’s ability to squeeze into and crawl through tight spaces (earning her her code name) she was also a cunning linguist, and mistress of disguise. Now, those were her practical skills, and they were fine enough. But what really set her apart, and got her her job, and her place beside the Star, where her… special abilities.

Jessica was what you might call a “sensitive.” She had a sixth sense that manifested in the form of various seemingly psychic abilities, empathic psychometry chief among them. See, places and objects pick up a kind of psychic residue as they move through time and interact with people, and a person like Jessica can feel that energy, good or bad, and develop an impression. Most of the time, this amounts to “bad things happened here” “good things happened here” “this object was important” “this was a murder weapon” or “This is the file with all of the nasty secrets inside.” But sometimes, when a place was downright saturated with emotional energy, she could see images, visions, or specters of things that happened in the past. Her ability to see future events was limited, but when danger was imminent and certain, you could count on Jessica to develop “a bad feeling about this.”

Nodding her head as she took notes, Jessica queried, “Any particular reason you think he’s gone to ground with his family, or is it simply a logical possibility?”

Part of it involves going public with all of the details about last night's post-game incident, part of it is handing out literature and putting up posters, but the most important part, the part we're here to discuss, is the part where Jennifer, Adam and Emily pledge to raise awareness about the drug by forgoing any and all clothing for an entire year. To quote the letter itself: 'We three agree to abstain from all forms of clothing, at all times and in all places for exactly one years time. Our naked bodies will be a constant and public reminder of last night's events, and the horrible and serious consequences of drug abuse in our times. Though this may seem shocking, we hope to be an inspirational example for our community.' There's more of course, but I think you get the message. Again, my initial instinct was to reject the notion out of hand, but Miss Nurelli has informed me, and my hasty research has confirmed that public nudity is not illegal in our area. Therefore the only thing standing in the way of this idea reaching fruition, is the question of permission, mine and yours. After some deliberation, I've decided to grant mine. Now, Miss Bombarell, Miss Summers, the question falls to you. While I urge you to no particular decision, I will say that if this plan doesn't go through, I will be forced to take my initial course of action, expelling Adam and Jennifer, and petitioning that they be removed from your care. I'm sorry, but, politically speaking, I can't afford to be neutral on this issue. I must either embrace you, or reject you. There is no middle ground."

That last part didn't sound like Wormkins. It didn't sound like Emily either. Even after such a brief exchange, Monica hypothesized that Mrs. Soffen must have put it in his head. At that moment, Monica wasn't sure if she hated that woman, or admired her.

Angie turned her head and looked towards her little sister, standing behind her in a tiny pink tube top and a brief white skirt, silent and looking nervous and scared. She had already decided to give up so much to keep this horrible farce going. Could she ask her to do more? Unfortunately, there was no doubt.

She asked the question, knowing what the answer would be. "Jennifer, is this really what you want to do?"

Following Angie's lead Monica added simply, "Adam?"

Jennifer and Adam paused for a few moments to really think it through. This was a big decision, a decision they'd not even imagined until a short while ago. They'd thought about it non stop since the notion entered their brains, and now the time had come to make a decision. If they said yes, the consequences would be monumental. Last night, they'd gotten naked in front of the entire school, but they were only exposed for 5, maybe 10 minutes tops. Now, they'd be agreeing to live a total nudist lifestyle, 24/7 for an entire year. 12 months. 52 weeks. 365 days. 8,760 hours. 525,600 minutes. 52,560 times as long as they'd been exposed last night. And they thought their lives were ruined before! There would be no peace for them now. Every hour not spent locked up in their houses would be a public spectacle. Teenage life was hard enough without this kind of pressure! And yet, what was the alternative? Face expulsion? Get torn away from their loving legal guardians and leave them all alone in their hour of need? No. Adam and Jennifer exchange sympathetic glances, and made their decision.

"I want to do it Angie... If you let me." Jennifer said, shoring up her courage. "I want to help make this whole thing right, and I-I won't be alone."

"That's right." Adam followed. "And what she said goes double for me."

Monica turned towards the Principal, and in a toneless voice, said, "Then you have our answer."

"Is that right Miss Summers?" Wormkins asked.

"Yes, you have our blessings, or our consent, or whatever it is you need."

"Alright..." Wormkins said, producing two sheets from atop his desk and placing them in front of Angie and Monica along with two pens to sign. "Just sign these permission slips, and everything can be underway."

Neither woman wanted to sign away the dignity of their closest loved ones, but they did it anyway. When they were through, Wormkins tucked the slips away in his drawer, and stood up from his seat, placing the letter that started all of this strategically over his crotch to hide his embarrassing bulge. "Alright then, as Emily's mother already signed her consent away on the letter itself, everything is in readiness. I think we'd better get this whole thing started as soon as possible before the story goes beyond our control. I'm going to call for an assembly. Miss Summers, Miss Bombarell, would you like to join us?"

1153322121112121221221111111111112121112.content:
It was all coming back to her. The musty smell of the old stage curtains, the muted commotion of the distant students as they piled into the room, the creaking and slamming of cheap wooden auditorium seats as they filled with occupants, the dim glare of the florescent lights above, seeping in through the cracks in between the curtains. Yes, Angie Summers was back in school; and, aside from her hat, her boots and her belt, she was naked. She had had dreams like this when the situation was contemporary, right before a big test, or when she was worried about fitting in, but she had long since moved on to bigger and better things. At least she thought she had. Last night, she had one of those dreams again, and now, that dream was coming true. It was a most... unsettling feeling... but not the worst she had experienced since last night. The only thing that worried her was the fate of her little sister.

Jennifer stood only a few feet away from her big sister, with Adam Bombarell and Emily Nurelli to her left. The three were all still clothed, at least for the moment. To Angie's right stood Monica Bombarell, Adam's mother, who was wearing even less than Angie; just a pair of tasteful red high heels, and her own feature defining glasses. Like Angie, she was doing her best to keep herself covered up using only her hands, and no doubt running through exactly what she was going to say to the assembled masses of hormones she would be expected to address momentarily.

Principal Wormkins was standing in front of Angie and Monica, closest to the curtain which stood between the whole group and the rest of the auditorium. He was going over the notes he'd written for his opening speech, silently moving his lips along with the words, little bits of sweat beading up on his upper lip. "What's he worried about!?" Angie found herself wondering. Angie had never been one of those people who found public speaking emotionally difficult, but even she had to admit, given the choice of being in a sticky life or death situation out on the street, with her clothes and gun intact, versus the stress and embarrassment of preaching to an entire school of rowdy teenagers about the evils of drugs in her birthday suit... She'd take her chances on the street.

Other than the above, the only other person behind the curtain was Gus the Janitor, who disapeared as soon as he had finished setting up the mikes. He'd be back momentarily (somebody had to work the curtain winch) but before he left, he spared a tip of his hat to the kids, and a knowing wink aimed at the two naked adults. He had rescued the whole group from the grubby hands of the student body just last night, but now, it seemed it would be his job to serve them up to their hungry eyes, live on stage.

When Gus left, there was a tense silence, broken at last by Principal Wormkins. "Don't worry everyone. Everything's going to be just fine. Trust me, this is the best of all possible scenarios, and it'll all work out in the end." While they thought on these "words of wisdom" all eyes turned to the left side of the stage as a click clacking of heels announced the presence of Vice Principal Vicky Soffen.

"Ahh, Vicky! Good to have you here. I thought you'd gotten so caught up with your paper work that you might have missed the.. uh... the show!"

"I wouldn't think of it, Paul." Vicky answered the Principal. "I do wish you would have consulted me before calling the assembly. This entire thing is so wild and so sudden; I don't think you could possibly have thought out all of the ramifications."

Wormkins didn't seem to like that. A look of worry on his face, he asked his Vice Principal what she had on her mind.

"Well, first of all, there are issues of safety to consider. Close examination of the letter seems to indicate that the students are vowing to forsake all forms of clothing for the next year, and I must say that, without certain provisions made for safety, that is an incredibly poorly thought out idea."

Everyone behind the curtain was getting a little nervous at that point. All except Dr. Lovebomb. Angie could tell by the smile on her face exactly what she was thinking. "Finally, someone with some common sense to put an end to this farce!" But she said nothing. Instead, Wormkins croaked out "Err.. uhm... what kind of provisions do you have in mind?"

"Well, for example, total nudity, I imagine would preclude ALL forms of clothing, shoes included, and yet, Miss Summers and Miss Bombarell both appear to be wearing footwear as we speak. I don't know what the students intended, but I believe that shoes should be required for all three students for safety reasons, at least while on school ground. I also think it's highly unrealistic to expect them to whether the elements without protection when the weather gets rough. Provisions must be made for warmth during the winter months, and sufficient rain gear for when the weather turns ugly. Compromises are possible of course, I do believe that translucent raincoats are available for example..."

Monica's smile quickly faded. It was heartening to know that someone was looking out for the safety of their kids (even if for potentially selfish reasons) but this woman wasn't here to rescue them at all. Just to make their humiliating fate run just a little bit more smoothly.

"Yeah, yeah that makes a lot of sense." Wormkins admitted.

"Thank you, sir." Vicky replied. "But there's something else I'd like to point out to you. Have you thought about the effect this whole affair might have on the rest of the student body? I know that you mean to inspire them to reject drugs, and think progressively, but I think you may not have thought about how other students might be inspired to more... negative behavior."

"I'm... I'm not sure I catch your drift... Miss Soffen..."

"Well, the essential question is, does this whole affair represent a general change in the dress code, or are we making special exceptions for these three students? In either case we could be in trouble. On the one hand, a general change in the dress code would mean that ANY student, at any time, could decide to expose themselves on school grounds, or simply start coming to school in the nude. Maybe some of our students are closeted nudists, or exhibitionists? If not, I'm certain that a few might try it just to be daring, or to get a laugh, and that's exactly the kind of disorderly chaotic image we're trying to avoid. On the other hand, if we maintain that only these three students are allowed to violate the existing dress code, it may be seen as an example of unfairness. How could we enforce dress code violations in the future, knowing that any student caught is likely to point out this very glaring oversight on our part, and ask for similar pardon? Essentially, we'd be in the same position, but in the later case, we're likely to deal with outraged parents, and potential law suits, just for trying to do our job."

Wormkins looked flushed. He was wiping his forehead with a napkin now. "What do you propose we do about that?"

"I'm glad you asked!" Vicky replied, smiling. "I think it's important that we make it clear that attending classes in the nude is a privilege that we allow, and not a right that we guarantee. Jennifer, Adam and Emily are all on the honor roll, all three excel in their respective after school activities, and possess near perfect discipline records. In light of that, we are extending to them this privilege, but we must be clear that this privilege comes with certain conditions. In order to maintain their privilege, these three students must continue to perform to the highest levels of academic achievement, and maintain clean disciplinary records for the remainder of their time here."

"And if they don't?"

"Well, the obvious thing to do would be to revoke their privilege, but if that happens, our little social experiment is a failure, and we're right back where we started, with a tarnished school image, expulsions and child protective services. I think we need a punishment buffer zone, one that would deter anyone from attempting to follow in the footsteps of our three special students here..."

"Mhmmm...." Wormkins wasn't liking where this was going.

"Well, back in the old days, the school system had ways of keeping students in line, through humiliation and corporal punishment. I think if Jennifer, Adam and Emily wish to go through with this whole thing, they're going to have to agree to receive such punishments, should they ever fail to live up to the high standards we require of them. These punishments would have be public I'm afraid, in order for them to mean anything. It would also behoove us to appoint a monitor, an upper classman in good standing who knows both students who can look out for them, and make sure that they are living up to the faith we’ve placed in them. I don’t have anyone in mind just now, but it’s something to think about for later. All of this may sound harsh now, but I'm being very honest when I tell you that it's the only way any of this is going to work, and not explode right in all of our faces."

It sounded kind of crazy, but so did everything else, and the woman made some very fair points. Once again, everyone present had a decision to make.
1153322121112121221221111111111112121112.title: Angie and Monica attend the Assembly

The students had all just about settled into the auditorium. Max Powers sat next to a very pretty blond girl, one hand around her shoulder, and the other rubbing his face. Jennifer Summers had scratched him up pretty bad. The marks weren't very noticeable, but they still stung. He knew that Jennifer and Adam had been called up to the Principal's office shortly before he arrived at the school. He figured this assembly was about them. Part of him wanted them to get expelled. That would teach them. But another part of him hoped they stayed so he could torture them. He had so many nasty ideas, he hardly knew where to begin.

Lost in these thoughts, he hardly noticed the camera crew setting themselves up in the back of the room. He'd probably have recognized local Channel 6 reporter Sandra Cardinalis, but not her two person support team, Ralph and Meg. If he had, he'd probably have realized that this was going to be much bigger and better than he could possibly have imagined.

"Thanks, Vicky, I don't know what I'd do without you. I should never have called for the assembly without talking to you first." "That's alright, Paul." Vicky replied. "The important thing is that we got everything worked out before you made your speech."

"Yeah, that was a real relief..." Jennifer thought. Thanks to Vicky, she and her two closest friends had been forced to agree to yet another set of insane rules they'd have to live by for the next year. If she wasn't worried before, she was now. She wondered who they'd pick to be their "monitor." She didn't wonder long. Soon, Principal Wormkins was walking through the curtain and taking his place at the podium on the right hand side of the stage. As one, Jenny, Adam and Emily all snuck over to the curtain and peaked through a crack. They didn't want to miss a thing.

"Ahem... ahem!" Wormkins began. "Alright everybody, settle down, settle down." When the students finally fell silent, the Principal continued. "Good morning everyone. As I'm sure most of you have heard by now, there was a... ahem... well, let’s call it an, incident. There was an incident. This incident occurred last night, on school property shortly after the big game. Many of you were there, and many more of you have probably heard about it already, but for the benefit of anyone who has not yet been made aware, I shall relate the details of the incident as they have been related to me.

The root of the story is one Miss Angie Summers, a decorated and respected police officer, older sister and legal guardian to our own Jennifer Summers and a graduate of our fair school. During an undercover operation, Miss Summers was exposed to a new kind of designer drug called Z, to which she has unfortunately become addicted. The effects of the drug are as strange as they are mysterious. According to all of the sources I have consulted, the drug causes lasting cosmetic effects on the human body and produces a continuous and unrelenting state of uncontrollable sexual arousal."

The Principal had to break here for assorted giggles and whispering. "Aaaalright, simmer down, everybody, simmer down. Let’s all try to act like adults about this, alright? In any case, this drug exists, and through no fault of her own, Deputy Summers was forced to partake in it, resulting in her unfortunate addiction. For some time, Angie struggled with her addiction all by herself, before finally seeking out Dr. Monica Lovell Bombarell, a renowned scientist, and the mother of Adam Bombarell, a friend of Angie's little sister, and another member of our student body. After studying the drug from samples given to her by Angie, Dr. Bombarell decided that the only way to truly wean Deputy Summers off of this horrible drug, was through extreme aversion therapy, in this case, she intended to force Angie to face the exhibitionist tendencies the drug had awakened in her by making her pledge to abandon all clothing for an extended period of time. The shame and humiliation this situation would inevitably produce would be enough, the doctor hoped, to drive Angie away from the drug.

Feeling extreme compassion for her friend and patient, Dr. Bombarell chose to partake in the drug herself in addition to joining Angie in her nudist pledge. Noble efforts to be sure, if somewhat unorthodox, but last night, things spun out of their control. Influenced by the drug, Angie and Monica exposed themselves to the student body after the game last night, engaging in very public lewd conduct. Making matters even worse, their closest living relatives, Jennifer and Adam were present to see their shame, and, like Dr. Bombarell, they were moved by compassion to share that suffering with them. Before the no doubt stunned mass of fellow students, Adam and Jennifer removed their clothes before disappearing into the night with their guardians.

Now, there are those among you who expect these four individuals to be punished. Suspensions and Expulsions, police and courts for the lot of them. Surely that will be the knee jerk reaction from our society, and not without reason. But I think, if we look at this carefully, with an open mind and an open heart, we can all agree that that is precisely the wrong thing to do. Angie Summers did not choose to become addicted to Z. She is merely an innocent victim of a drug she never chose to take of her own free will! And Dr. Bombarell? A Good Samaritan, who has chosen to suffer along with the victim she seeks to help. And the Children, Adam and Jennifer? Seeing the hardship that had fallen upon the shoulders of their elders, they chose to bear the burden along with them! How many in this auditorium could say they would have done the same?

It's easy to look at their actions and say that they were foolish, but we can all agree that they were courageous, and history is full of stories about people doing seemingly foolish, courageous things for noble reasons! When patriotic colonists threw British tea into Boston Harbor, while dressed as Native Americans, was it a foolish act of defiance? Perhaps. But it was also brave, and symbolic. When Martin Luther nailed his 95 theses on the door of a Catholic Church, was it a foolish act? A scandalous one? Yes most definitely. And when Lady Godiva rode naked through the streets on horseback for the good of the people, was it foolish, and scandalous and obscene? Perhaps, but it was also brave and noble, and done for the good of her community. With these examples in mind, I would like you all to listen carefully as I explain the next part of this story, the part no one seated in this auditorium knows quite yet.

This morning, I called Adam and Jennifer down to my office. To my surprise they came accompanied by another student who had been with them during last night's incident, one Miss Emily Nurelli. As a part of the crowd, Emily had cheered Adam and Jennifer on as they stripped in support of their family members, and so she felt responsible for their well being in the aftermath. A true friend if ever there was one! I was fully prepared to exact punishment on all parties involved, that is until the three students told me the story I have told you, from their perspective, along with their plan to make all of this right. You see, I fully believe that what they did last night was an act of bravery and courage. More than that, it was a shining example to the community, both of love and compassion, and of the harsh consequences of drug abuse. This morning, Jennifer, Adam and Emily, have all decided to continue to live up to that example for an entire year, starting today!"

A rumble of murmurs and whispers rose up from the crowd. What did he mean by that? He doesn't mean...

"In more explicit terms..." The Principal continued "Jennifer Summers, Adam Bombarell and Emily Nurelli have all agreed to adopt a total nudist lifestyle for an entire year, starting today!"

Jennifer nodded. That much was obvious. “Maybe they all went inside to get changed without us…”

That wasn’t a good sign. Coach Temis was a demanding taskmaster, and the one thing she emphasized over all else was teamwork. All the girls on the team were encouraged to spend as much time together as possible, to get to know each other in intimate (okay, maybe not THAT intimate… though maybe sometimes…) detail and to conduct themselves as a team in all regards, with unity being the watchword of the day, all day, every day. To that effect, the girls usually met up in the gym before practice, entered the locker room together and exited together, dressed in their uniforms, looking like, and acting like a team. Everybody knew Jennifer and Emily were present today (it would be hard to have missed them) and the fact that the team hadn’t waited for them could mean only one thing: they were being cast out.

“Do you think we should go in?” Jennifer asked her friend, not sure what to do herself.

“I don’t think so.” Emily answered without much hesitation. “They know what they’re doing. I think we should wait here. It’s pretty clear we’re being given the cold shoulder by the team, so instead of walking into the lion’s den, let’s just wait right here for the coach to show up. Either Miss Temis will straighten everything out, or we’ll know where we stand. Besides, it’s not like we really have to change or anything.”

“True.” Jennifer said, nodding. “Maybe the girls just figured we wouldn’t show up. I mean, it’s not much of a stretch to think that this whole nudity thing would bring an end to our cheerleading days... and we ARE late.”

“Not that late.” Emily replied, grimly, checking the clock that hung on the wall. “We’ve waited longer for stragglers before, and besides, I saw Kelly after my last period class, and I told her we’d show up and see what happened. I know Kelly can be a little ditzy sometimes, but she wouldn’t forget something like that.”

“Hmm… nope.” Jennifer agreed. “Amber.”

“Yup, got to be.” Emily replied. “So much for teamwork and unity, huh?”

“Yeah. Hey, speak of the devil…”

Despite arguing (the others would argue preaching) at length about such matters, Dawn never seemed to be able to accomplish anything aside from earning herself the nickname “Thinks-too-much.” When Amber declared Jennifer and Emily both persona non grata, Dawn had made some noise in the locker room about going easy on them, and even finding a new place for them on the team, but Amber nipped that thought in the bud by telling the petite over achiever, in no uncertain terms, that if she stepped out of line on this one, she wasn’t a cheerleader anymore. 1153322121112121221221111111111112121112.content:
Rounding out the group were the Jr. Cheerleaders, Cindy, Becky and Amy. The three girls were too young and inexperienced to be on the main squad, but they followed the older girls around and attended practice with the hopes of making the team eventually. The three trainees mainly kept to themselves and didn’t say much, preferring to observe and learn. Because they weren’t fully fledged cheerleaders, the three girls walked in the back of the line, which was among the least objectionable indignities visited upon them by the squad. In addition to being ordered around like second class citizens, the girls were also subject to all manner of hazing rituals and rules of conduct meant to hammer home their status on the team. For example, even though there were plenty of spare lockers in the changing room, Cindy, Becky and Amy weren’t allowed to have one because “they weren’t real cheerleaders yet.” This meant that when they changed into their uniforms, they had to leave their clothes out in the open, folded neatly on the bench. From time to time, they’d return to the locker room after practice to find bits of clothing missing (usually underwear) and giggling older girls fixing knowing nods. All things considered, the three girls seemed to take it all with remarkable aplomb. Even after practice, when Cindy, Becky and Amy changed out of their uniforms and weren’t allowed to shower, or get dressed until all of the other girls were done, it didn’t seem to bother them in the least. In fact, it’s almost as if they actually liked hanging out in the nude. When Dawn spoke up about showing mercy to Jen and Emily, the three Jr. Cheerleaders nearly backed her up, but when Amber rebuked the older girl, the three recruits fell instantly silent. Now they marched behind the other girls, lock step, with sad, hesitant looks upon their faces.

As the pom pom mob approached, Emily and Jennifer stood their ground and did their best not to look intimidated, even though, to be honest, they were. These were their friends. Their BEST friends, and now they were marching towards them like an enemy army. Despite their extremely vulnerable position, neither girl flinched. They shook a little, but they didn’t flinch.

Amber came to a stop about a foot away from the naked girls, and all the other girls stopped in time. The opposing groups faced each other in silence for a few tense moments, standing before the bleachers in the empty gym, with the light of the sun pouring over them through the wide windows overhead. Jennifer and Emily had been mentally preparing themselves for anything, any insult, any outburst, any act of verbal violence, but the silence was simply torture. Amber just stood there, eying them up and down with an inscrutable passive look on her face. As the moments passed, Jennifer and Emily began to squirm, each one trying to come up with the best words to break the silence, knowing that the wrong words could destroy their social futures at the school. Drinking in their confusion and uncertainty, a small smile came into bloom on Amber’s face. Just as Emily was about to say something, Amber broke the silence herself.

“Well, what a sad sight you two are! You know, I sat there and watched the assembly along with everybody else, and I still couldn’t believe it. Now, seeing the two of you right here, right now, covering yourselves up like you’ve got some right to modesty after taking your clothes off in front of EVERYBODY, well… I’m embarrassed for you girls. And you’re an embarrassment to this team.”

“Is that why you didn’t wait for us?” Emily shot back. “You’re all so embarrassed that you’re kicking us to the curb? So much for all that talk about teamwork and sisterhood and all that bullsh—“

“Oh, there is NO WAY the two of you can still be cheerleaders now!” Amber declared. “What did you think was going to happen, seriously? That we’d let you go out there on Sundays and cheer buck naked in front of God and everybody?”

Kelly just about doubled over laughing, and, as with her enthusiasm, her laughter was infectious and soon, the whole team was cackling like hyenas. Amber had to pause for a few moments as the laughter died down, and with a final uncontrolled snort, Kelly was quiet again, and hiding her smile behind her hand. Amber continued.

“No, when you stripped down at that assembly, you turned your backs on us, turned your backs on this team. I still don’t know what on EARTH you two are thinking!”

“Yeah, like anybody wants to look at your stupid butts all day!” Maria shouted with a strange mixture of laughter and indignation in her voice.

Jennifer had heard about enough. “Hey, wait a minute! Weren’t you paying attention during the assembly? My big sister is in a jam, and we’re all just trying to help in any way we can! It’s not like we decided to do this for fun!”

But Amber was unmoved. “Yes, I was paying attention during the assembly. I learned that your big sister, miss high and mighty super cop is a low life druggy, and that Adam Bombarell’s mom is a total psycho! Honestly, your sister is on drugs, and THIS is the way you decide to help? By getting naked in school? By transforming into some kind of freaky nudist? “

Cindy, Becky and Amy seemed to cringe at that last remark, but they said nothing. Their eyes lit up a bit however, when Dawn moved to speak. “Well, actually Amber…” Dawn began, nervously. “What they’re doing could actually be considered politically and psychologically sound. After all, one of the most important parts of communicating a message to the public is getting and holding their attention, and I honestly can’t think of a better way to…”

“Dawn…” Amber said, without even turning around. “I told you before. Not another word. Not one more, and I’m serious. Make me repeat myself on this again, and you’re off the team, got it?”

Dawn went a bit white, shrank behind the other girls and fell silent as Maria looked in her direction and smiled. The three Jr. Cheerleaders looked down at their toes with sad expressions back upon their faces.

“Communicating with the public....” Amber continued, fixing her gaze on Jennifer. “I don’t think so. You’re getting off on this, and so is your sick sister, you’re sick boyfriend and his sick mom!”

“You take that back!” Jennifer shouted, leaping forward before Emily pulled her back with a hand upon her shoulder.

“Take it easy, Jen, take it easy!” Emily whispered urgently, ignoring the fact that her moist pussy was now on full display to the other girls as she held her friend back. “This isn’t a good idea…”

Amber just smiled. “You’re right, it wouldn’t be a good idea. And besides, everything I said was true, whether you want to admit it or not.”

“Actually, I don’t think Jen and Adam are boyfriend and girlfriend or anything are they?” Kelly staid confused, and somewhat missing the point. Never the less, Julie C was quick to pick up on it.

“Really?” Julie began. “Well if he’s available, maybe I’ll give him a shot…”

“JULIE!” Maria shouted.

“What?” The girl replied.

“Sure, why not?”

“That’s just… that’s just gross!”

Julie smiled fiendishly “You wouldn’t say that if you saw him in art class today… and I know for a FACT that he likes me back!”

Now it was Jennifer’s turn to look crestfallen. As Amber turned to quiet the other girls down, she found herself wondering what had gone on between Julie and Adam in art class. 1153322121112121221221111111111112121112.content:
All of the cheerleaders, Jr. Cheerleaders and fully nude former cheerleaders immediately snapped to attention and turned to watch as Miss Rita Temis entered the room. For a woman who paid very little attention to her looks, Rita was stunning. She was a tall woman, with short, dark hair, green eyes and lightly tanned skin. Her entire body was toned, with only just enough fat on her bones to give her sexy curves in all the right places. As was customary for her while coaching, Rita was wearing a grey sports bra, a pair of white sneakers, and a pair of skin tight blue running shorts that clung almost magically to her muscular glutes. Miss Temis was always something of a tomboy. Over the years she’d bounced around sampling every sport she even took a passing interest in, and always, she excelled. She’d played basketball, run track and played girls softball in high school, and in college she took up gymnastics as well just for kicks. In fact the only sport she never excelled at was swimming, which she loved, but unfortunately, her large breasts just seemed to create too much drag. Strangely enough, she had never actually been a cheerleader herself. After getting a degree in physical education, she came to this school with the nominal intention of being a gym teacher, but harboring every intention of taking over every girls sport in the school. As far as the cheer squad goes, she’d surprised even herself. In the past, she had always dismissed cheerleading as a lesser extracurricular activity, but after studying it for a while; she came to the conclusion that there was a certain art to it, a strong focus on teamwork and coordination unlike anything she had seen in other sports. Intrigued, she had set about transforming her squad into a perfect, well oiled machine. And, with Amber as her prototype “perfect cheerleader” and second in command, she had largely succeeded. Now she stood between the two groups of girls, one large and fully clothed, the other small and naked.

“Emily, Jennifer… what can I say.” The coach began. “I’m very very disappointed in the two of you. I don’t know what you’re trying to do here, but I’ll have no part of it, and neither will any of the cheerleaders under my watch. I’m sorry girls, you were a credit to the squad, but you’re off the team.”

Jennifer was crestfallen. She had always done her best on the squad. Coach Temis had pushed her, and she’d always risen to the challenge. She respected this woman, and now she was joining all of her ex friends in ostracizing her. “But… but coach, I know this is a strange situation, but there has to be something we can do! Maybe…”

“No.” The coach cut her off. “You’re right, it is a strange situation. Honestly, I don’t think anyone’s heard the full story. If I could jump hurdles the way you girls take leaps in logic, I’d have made it to the Olympics. I don’t know what your game is, and I don’t want to know. On top of that, I don’t want to sit here and have to wrack my brain thinking about what to do with two naked cheerleaders. I’m sorry girls, but you’re out.”

“What about Principal Wormkins?” Emily snapped angrily.

“What about him?” Rita replied, in the confident and superior tone she always used when challenged.
Undaunted, Emily continued. “We have the full support of the Principal for this whole thing. We’ve done NOTHING wrong. You can’t just throw us off the squad!”

“I’m the coach young lady, I can and I will. If the Principal has a problem with that, he can come and tell me himself. And while he’s at it, he can explain to me exactly what I’m supposed to do with you girls for away games, where this town’s crazy laws wouldn’t apply. He can also explain to me who’s going to deal with the angry parents who don’t want to see a couple of naked girls flashing their who-has’ when they just want to see their kids play ball.”

“Maybe I will talk to the Principal!” Emily said, forcefully. Miss Temis just nodded, completely sure that she’d win this one if it came to that. Wormkins was a pushover in her eyes. Emily saw that look, and read it well, but she wasn’t deterred either. Yes, she’d talk to Wormkins… and she’d talk to Grandpa Nurelli too.

“So that’s it then?” Jennifer said with resentment in her voice. “After all of the hard work and sacrifice, after all of that talk about teamwork, commitment and friendship…”

“Don’t give me that Jennifer,” The coach insisted. “You turned your back on this team the minute you made your decision to swear off clothing for the next year.” Boy, were she and Amber on the same page. God, it was like a broken record! “How many times do I have to tell you girls, cheerleading is about unity and teamwork. That’s the whole point of the uniform. That’s why the uniform is CENTRAL to the very idea of the squad. When you foreswore clothes, you foreswore your uniform, and the squad. THAT’S why you’re not a cheerleader anymore. Come back to me when you can wear the uniform, and then we’ll talk. Until then, get out of my gym.”

Not seeing any other course of action, Jennifer and Emily turned around and walked out of the gym together. The cheersquad took several moments to watch their naked asses as they made their way to the doors, and exited out into the bright sunlight. After that, Coach Temis blew her whistle, and the squad formed up to start their drills as normal.

Jennifer looked glum and depressed. Emily on the other hand looked grim, angry and determined, regarding her saddened friend with pity. She couldn’t blame Jen for feeling down. She was having a rough time adjusting to being a social outcast, and she was totally powerless to do anything about it. Emily wasn’t though. She had her Granddad and a whole gang of monsters back home to tip the odds in her favor if need be. She was beginning to see the allure of the kind of power her Grandpa wielded: the power of fear, intimidation, and coercion. When life is unfair, when things don’t go your way, it’s nice to have the power to change things… to grab life by the throat and make it give you what you want…even if it means being a little rough. But you have to be tough… that’s what Grandpa said. You had to eat a little shit and prove you’re worth a damn to get that kind of power. That was the Nurelli legacy. Yes, she was beginning to see the allure…

Lisa’s eyes fluttered as she woke up for the second time today. This time, she was much more refreshed. Feeling great all over, she closed her eyes and stretched out on the soft towel, her fingers interlocking, her arms extending up above her head, and her naked legs curling up and then stretching out together. She let out a soft, gentle sigh and turned to check the time again, only to find that her clock was gone, and so were her clothes. It didn’t take long for the implications to occur to her, and when they did, Lisa sat up with a sudden start, with one hand quickly leaping to protect her exposed breasts. A quick scan of the camp area confirmed her suspicions. Someone had been here while she slept, and they had taken everything that wasn’t nailed down, quite literally. Of all the supplies she had brought with her, only her tent (held down by stakes in the ground) and the beach blanket (held down by her nude body) remained. Resolving not to panic, Lisa looked around to make sure she hadn’t missed any important details. It wasn’t till she looked over her shoulder however, that things began to look even stranger.

Behind Lisa’s back was a trail of items she recognized from her camp, forming a straight line that lead right into the woods. From where she sat, she could see her alarm clock, her flashlight, her fishing rod, and finally her trusty hunting knife. After that, the trail was swallowed up by the forest. Lisa stared into the cavernous darkness, wondering what could lie within. Still looking over her shoulder, she became acutely aware that, even as she gazed into the shadows, something inside those shadows could be staring back at her, taking in the image of her strawberry blond hair as it fell over her smooth shoulders, and the elegant curve of her naked back leading all the way down to the perfectly proportioned bare buns resting atop the soft towel on which she sat.
