She was squirming in her seat (Angie would have to invest in seat cushions in the near future) playing with her food and all in all looking much more down and out than usual. Generally, Jennifer was such an energetic, happy young girl. She hadn't looked this morose since the sting of her parents death receded into the back of her mind years ago.

"Today's going to be a rough day for you, huh?" Angie began, getting the unavoidable conversation started. "Yeah" was Jennifer's unenthusiastic reply. "I guess it didn't really occur to me last night... everything was happening so fast, and most of it seemed so unreal... but, just... so many people saw me naked. And all of those pictures... yeah... today's going to be hell."

Rising up out of her seat, Angie pulled her chair over so she could sit next to her little sister. After Angie put her arm over her shoulder, Jenn found herself resting her head on her older sister's naked breast. Stroking Jennifer's hair, Angie asked "Why did you do... what you did last night?" Jennifer sighed heavily and thought about it for a few moments. She wasn't really sure herself. Eventually, she settled on an answer that made some sense. "I was just worried about you so much...I wanted to help you, but I didn't know how. Then Emily made that crazy suggestion and I just... I just wanted to help..!" Jennifer sounded like she was going to cry. Angie did her best to comfort her. "Jennifer, look at me." Tearing herself away from her sister's chest, Jenn looked Angie in the eyes. "You have nothing to be ashamed of. What you did last night... that was an act of courage. You did something most girls would never even dream of doing, and you did it for a good reason. Some people might tease you for that...they might call you names and make insinuations, but you'll know they're not true. You’re a smart, beautiful, popular girl, with a whole bunch of friends. If anybody can get through this, you can. And I know you will."

The two girls shared a hug, and then Jennifer left to get dressed for school. By the time Angie had finished the dishes, Jenn was ready to go. Dressed in a pink tube top, a white skirt and sandals, it really seemed as if Jenn was taking Emily's ideas seriously. As she dried her hands, a thought occurred to Angie as Jenn prepared to walk out the door. Rushing to stop her, Angie inquired, "Jenn, wait! You're not... I mean... are you wearing anything under that skirt?"

Blushing a bit, Jennifer shook her head no. "You really don't need to do that you know." Angie said, sadly. "I do appreciate the thought, but this isn't your problem. You don't need to keep putting yourself out there on my account." "No," Jennifer replied "But I want to. You're right about what I did last night. It was the right thing to do. Angie, you've always been a good role model for me. Back when... when mom and dad died, I don't know how I would have gotten through that without you. Now, it's my turn to be strong for both of us." Before Angie could reply, Jennifer gave her a peck on the cheek and darted out the door.
115332212111212122122111111121.title: Angie's Morning Part 2

1153322121112121221221111111211.content:
The orange painted sun had just begun to rise up over tree tops of the distant woods, tingeing the sky with burnt colors as Jennifer waited on the corner for the almost matching orange bus to roll on by and take her where she did not want to go. Jennifer stood there all alone, her hair pulled back in a pony tail and tied with a pink scrunchy. She wore a blue book bag, a small pink tube top, a short white skirt, sandals, and nothing more. The top was a little number she picked up at the mall on a whim. Until today, she had never had an opportunity to wear anything like this. It showed off her taught little tummy, and a daring amount of cleavage, surely enough to turn heads in any environment, but at school, it would be downright scandalous. The top alone would probably be enough to get her into trouble on any other day, but it definitely wasn't her primary concern today. No, her primary concern was located quite a bit further south.

The white skirt Jennifer wore was actually an old one. It had been short and daring when she had first purchased it, but she had grown since then. Now it fell quite a bit short of mid thigh, showing off a tantalizing amount of her bare, shapely legs, but again, that still wasn't her primary concern. Her primary concern was her complete lack of underwear. A short skirt would be bad enough. Jennifer wasn't the kind of girl who would be comfortable with anybody catching a glimpse of her panties underneath her skirt. But now, with absolutely NOTHING under her skirt, a single lapse in attention, a single wrong movement, and it would mean instant humiliation. She had never felt so naked before, even last night, with the pounding of her pulse and the roar of the crowd in her ears, it had all been too much to take in until it was all over. This on the other hand, was like slow death. It was pretty warm out still, like last night, but when the tepid wind blew upon her exposed flesh, she shuddered anyway.

Even disregarding the possible (okay, almost certain) indecent exposure she might face as a result of her choice of skirt, there was simply no way to avoid humiliation and mortification. Half the school had seen her naked last night, and half of those who had seen her were also filming her with a dazzling array of camera phones. By the end of the day, the other half of the school would most assuredly have seen her also (if they hadn't already.) It was enough to sink her into despair.

Fortunately, there was no time for further reflection. The school bus came rumbling down the road with all the subtlety of an avalanche, and in an instant, her feelings of despair were transformed into fear and anxiety. As the bus grew larger and larger in her vision, she began to squirm where she stood, shifting her weight from one leg to the other, back and forth, causing the beautifully formed globes of her ass to rise and fall, tighten and untighten beneath her flimsy skirt. She was terrified. In a few moments the bus would stop, and she'd have to enter of her own free will, knowing full well that she'd be walking right into a veritable shooting gallery of insults and jeers. She wanted very much to turn tail and run, run all the way home, slam the door behind her, tear off these whore's clothes, crawl under the covers and call in sick. But that simply wouldn't do. Angie had an even worse day ahead of her, and if Jen gave up now, how would that make her older sister feel? No, Jennifer would have to stick it out for her sister. So, instead of running, she closed her eyes, took a deep breath and steeled herself.

With her eyes still closed, Jennifer didn't see the bus pull up. Instead, she heard it as it rumbled to a stop in front of her and hissed as the hydraulics lowered it closer to the ground. She also felt it, as the air of its motion and mechanisms washed over her rustling her skirt and bringing her close to exposure. Luckily, she had the presence of mind to keep a hand delicately placed over her crotch, keeping the front of her skirt from blowing up. The back was another story. The hem flew high and wide, leaving her bare butt naked in the breeze for only a few short seconds. It brought a blush to her face, but she told herself that the streets were empty, the homes quiet. Nobody was watching her, so no one had seen. No one would know aside from herself and God. Well, and Mrs. Cragg of course. Mrs. Cragg who had been watching her all morning with her binoculars, but she had no way of knowing that. As Jennifer climbed the stairs onto the bus, the back end of her skirt rose up, allowing the bottom parts of her butt cheeks to escape into view, but again, it was merely a secret between herself, the almighty and the nosey old biddy who lives down the street.

The bus driver smiled at Jen as he always did. He raised a bit of an eyebrow when he saw what she was wearing, but she detected nothing too unusual from his reaction. From the way he shook his head, he seemed to be saying "You crazy kids today..." making no further judgments than that as he closed the door behind her and prepared to pull away. Jennifer's hands were again down around her skirt, minding the sides to keep them in place as she prepared to walk the narrow black path between the two rows of brown seats. When she saw who was on the bus, she breathed a hesitant sigh of relief.

It was only the boonies. The O'Conner kids (Julie, Jason and Kevin) The Collins kids (Sara, David and Julie) and the Smiths (Christina and Jimmy.) They all lived out in the middle of nowhere, beyond the woods in isolated houses accessible by dirt roads. She didn't remember seeing any of them at the game last night, so it was unlikely that any of them had even heard about her little escapade yet. As she walked past, she saw some jaws drop certainly. Sara, Christina and Kevin looked shocked, Julie Collins giggled, Julie O'Conner looked somewhere between contemptuous and fascinated and the rest of the boys simply drooled wolfishly. In short order, Jennifer rushed passed them and took a seat at the back of the bus, content to hide herself away and hope to be forgotten. In an outfit like this, it wasn't likely, but still, she held out hope.

As the bus continued along its path, more and more passengers climbed aboard. Peeking out from behind the seat occasionally, Jennifer watched them as they came. Jessica and Shauna, the two basketball players, Jake and Josh, Christina's boyfriend Teddy, and Buzz Krampus, official bully to the underclass. As the bus filled up with people, it also filled up with noise. Whispers, giggles, shouts, incessant chatter; it was all difficult to figure out, but Jennifer strained her ears to hear if any of the clamor might be about her. She heard her name whispered more than a dozen times, and she wondered how long it would be before one of the boonies mentioned that she was hiding in the back.

The bus stopped again, as it had many times before, but this time, Jennifer actually cared about the person who came on board. Jennifer watched in utter silence as Adam Bombarell ascended the stairs and stepped into the view of his fellow passengers. He was wearing a flimsy tank top and a pair of short, tight running shorts, and it was clear, at least to Jennifer’s attentive eye, that he wasn’t wearing anything underneath. For a moment there was silence, and then the storm began. It was Josh who spoke up first, asking Adam where his girlfriend was. His girlfriend, Shauna, punched him in the arm and asked Adam if he'd like to put on a repeat performance. Somebody yelled out, asking for his mom's phone number. The word "MILF" was used at least once. This kind of razzing went on and on until Jennifer burst from her seat and called Adam to the back. The poor boy had been standing there like a deer caught in the headlights, but the sound of his friend's voice was enough to snap him out of it, and in a flash he was sitting down next to Jennifer at the back of the bus. The damage had been done however. Now everyone on the bus was talking about last night's real main event. The story was spreading like wildfire, just as it would throughout the school. By the end of the day, they'd be social pariahs, Jen just knew it.

"Thanks for sticking your neck out like that..." Adam said, breaking the short silence. "I was kind of in over my head."

"Don't mention it." came Jennifer's reply. She smiled warmly. Though she was dreading the rest of the day, having Adam by her side right now somehow made it possible to smile again. Maybe misery loves company. Or maybe something else.

There was another uncomfortable silence, but this time it was Jennifer who broke it. "So, what do you think of my outfit? I think it makes a statement, don't you?"

Blushing, Adam replied "Well, your outfit's uhm... wow. I don't even know what to say..."

Laughing, Jennifer responded "That's alright, I'll take wow for an answer!"

From there they got each other caught up to speed on what had happened last night after they had both went their separate ways. Jennifer told Adam how she had spent the night naked, and fallen asleep before finishing her English homework (Miss Truth was going to kill her!) and how sad Angie had been this morning. Adam in turn told Jennifer all about his mother's frustration and the precarious nature of ordering a late night pizza and answering the door in your birthday suit.

As the two laughed over the last nights embarrassments, it seemed as if things might end up being okay after all, at least that is, until a shadow fell over both of them. As they looked up in unison, they both immediately recognized the face of the one who had intruded on their privacy.
1153322121112121221221111111211.title: Follow Jennifer to School

choices: Not really, but what choice to they have?
11533221211121212212211111112111.content:
It was Max Powers, captain of the football team and all around big man on campus, and he was grinning like a shark.

"Adam, my man!" Max began, "I heard you had some fun after the game last night. And you too Miss Summers!"

Adam and Jennifer both squirmed a little and blushed under his gaze. As captain of the football team, Max knew both Jennifer and Adam pretty well. It was all but his job to keep track of all the players on the team, and the members of the cheer squad, and reign over them like a king. Judging by his predatory smile, it didn't look like he was here for their benefit. He sat down in the seat across from theirs and continued.

"Like, I said, I HEARD you had some fun last night. I skipped off right after the game, to fuck my fine ass girlfriend, so I missed the whole show! Can you believe that? I mean, jeez, what a wild story! Your mom and your big sis going at it like bitches in heat, all out in public like that, and then the two of you stripping off in front of everybody, I mean, holy shit did I miss out, or what?"

"Look, lay off Max, okay? We both.." Adam began, but Max cut him off. "Oh, hey, hold on now; don't make me out to be the bad guy! I didn't tell you two to take your clothes off! I'm just poking a little fun, that’s all. Can't blame me for that, now can you? In fact, I'm here to help you out. You’re not just anybody you know. Your Adam Bombarell, and Jennifer Summers! You’re both important parts of the school community, and we look out for each other, don't we?"

Before either flabbergasted and underdressed teen could answer, Max snapped his finger, and a small, nervous looking form shuffled up next to him. The form belonged to a girl, Penny Worth. She was a short girl, with short hair dyed black with a single purple streak in it. She had pasty white skin, scattered pimples, and a round shape that hadn't even had the benefit of blessing her with significant boobs. She wore thick, black glasses, a black hooded sweatshirt, baggy jeans and army boots. She stood there, as if at attention, waiting for orders from Max.

"You both know Penny right? Ahh, I still remember the first day she showed up at school, all mousey and reclusive, but a big enough target to attract the wrong kind of attention anyway. Remember how everybody used to pick on you Penny?"

Penny couldn't look him in the eye, but she nodded in the affirmative.

"Fortunately for her though, Penny's a credit to the community. See, she might not be much to look at, but she's got quite a brain on her. Lords knows I wouldn't have made it through Math class without her."

It was true. Penny was a transfer student from another school, and when she had first showed up, she had been picked on mercilessly. Her awkward looks, withdrawn attitude and somewhat gothic fashion sense made her an irresistible target, until Max had stepped in to rescue her. Together, they formed a kind of strange symbiotic relationship, whereby Max offered the girl his protection, in exchange for unlimited access to her many skills. She did all of his homework, wrote all of his papers, came up with the most ingenious ways for him to cheat on tests, and whenever he needed a little blackmail, or just wanted to mess with somebody, Penny was there to make it all happen with her considerable hacking skills. With Max looking out for her, she was officially off limits for teasing, and anyone who chose to ignore that fact, paid for it dearly. What Max didn't know, was that Penny had long since developed a huge crush on him, one that she knew would never be realized. Max went through girlfriends like most guys go through underwear, but none of them looked anything like Penny, much to her sorrow.

Max continued, "Anyway, if I can keep a charity case like Penny here above the water line, it shouldn't take much effort to put a lid on this whole school yard strip show you guys got yourself into last night. Oh, people will talk and whisper, but I can get them to shut up about it in public. Given enough time, the whole thing might just fade away, know what I mean?"

Adam wasn't so sure. "I don't know Max. I mean, we'd be grateful for your help of course, but, I mean you'd do all of that just because I'm on the football team, and Jennifer's a cheerleader?"

"Well... that would be an awfully big favor to ask of me, wouldn't it?" Max said, his shark's grin showing again. "Like Penny here, you'd be obligated to do little favors for me from time to time, you know, little things, just to show how much you appreciate my protection. Of course it's all for the benefit of the community in the end, and I know you two care deeply about our community."

It was Jennifer who spoke up now. Jennifer was no stranger to sniffing out bullshit, and this guy absolutely reeked of it. "Yeah, what kind of favors?"

Smiling like the devil, Max replied "Well, for starters, I didn't get to see the show last night. I've seen the videos and some of the pictures already of course, thanks to Penny, but it's not the same as seeing it live, now is it? How about the two of you get naked right here, and hand over all of your clothes to me, and we'll consider it a down payment?"

Adam and Jennifer both sat there, simply stunned, unable to believe what they had just heard. Max was unperturbed. "Come on guys, it's no big deal! I've seen Adam in the locker room before, and as for Jen, well, you seen one cheerleader, you've seen em all, right?" This was especially true of Max, who actually had seen most of the Cheerleaders at their school. Not Jenny though. At least, not yet. "We're all the way in the back of the bus, and nobody can see you behind the seat. Nobody will see either of you, besides me and Penny, and when I've had my fun, I'll give you your clothes back, and you can both be on your way like nothing happened. It's just a matter of trust. A test, kind of. You do both trust me right?"
11533221211121212212211111112111.title: Meeting Max Powers

115332212111212122122111111121112.content:
The answer to Max's question was of course, emphatically no. Adam and Jennifer exchanged glances and they were both practiced enough at reading one another's emotions to realize that they were of one mind on the issue. It was Adam who spoke however. "We appreciate the offer Max, but I think we'd both be better off toughing it out for ourselves, right Jen?" Jen nodded in agreement.

Max just smiled. "You sure?" He said. "Last chance to be on the winning team here. No? Okay, Penny, you know what to do."

With that, Penny sat down at in the seat next to Max and opened up her laptop. In moments she was typing away feverishly. It took only moments, and in moments it was done. Turning to Max, Penny smiled, a look of accomplishment on her face. "It's done!" She said, her face beaming and expectant, waiting to receive a commendation for her good work. Instead, Max rose up out of his seat and let out a piercing whistle that got the attention of everyone on the bus. "Hey, listen up everybody! Your rich uncle Max, is about to share something really special with all of you. Before we start, anybody see the game last night?"

A roar of a response erupted from the seats up ahead. Max laughed and continued "Yeah, I know, we kicked the Tiger's asses, (and we're going to be even better next week) but that wasn't exactly a big shock. I mean, we beat their asses every year! What WAS shocking though was what happened AFTER the game, am I right?" A chorus of laughter rang out through the rows of seats. By now, if everyone hadn't been brought up to speed, they were about to be. "Well, for those of you who, like me, didn't get to see the post game show, I now present for your viewing pleasure: The Summers and Bombarell Family Fun Show!"

With that, Max grabbed Penny's laptop and propped it up on top of the seat in front of him. Those who had cell phones with video playing capabilities had already had the video files sent to them, and were instructed to follow along and share with their neighbor. For everyone else, all eyes were on Penny's laptop as Max hit the play button and the whole sordid event played out all over again.

At the sound of his mother's voice, Adam immediately sprang from his seat, but Max was older, and much bigger, and a simple one handed push was all it took to send the young lad reeling back into his seat, colliding with Jen. "Nice try, shorty." Max sneered, "but nothing’s going to interrupt the show this time!"

Penny giggled to herself. She had cut together a pretty nice little video from the scattered footage she collected from various online sources. It was amazing how fast things like that spread on the internet. In just one night, it was everywhere, and she had taken all of the best shots and made one hell of a show out of them, and that was working with one hell of a deadline! If she was allowed to take her time, she could make a masterpiece! "Maybe a project for the weekend…" she thought to herself.

"Turn it off! Turn it off you son of a bitch!" Adam yelled as he wrestled with Max's arm. Adam normally didn't curse (his mother detested vulgar language) but in Max's case, he was willing to make an exception. Jen was joining in on the struggle too. She had tried to slip past Max and snatch up the computer, but Penny pulled it just out of reach. Then, all Max had to do was lean back and pin Jen to the back of the bus with his significant body weight, laughing all the time.

The bus driver yelled for the kids to settle down, but he was busy driving, and nobody was listening. On the contrary, if anything, things got louder. The kids on the bus made the rudest comments. Nobody could believe the sheer size of Angie and Monica's boobs, which quickly became the subject of crude and childish rhymes. Somebody yelled "Jennifer and Adam's got two mommies!" Somebody was ranting on and on about something called "motorboating" that neither Adam nor Jennifer was familiar with. The two desperate kids fought valiantly, but it was futile in the end. Even if they could bring an end to this public spectacle, the genie was already out of the bottle, and there was nothing they could do about it.

When it came time for Jennifer and Adam to begin their own show, Max took special care to introduce the issue. "Okay now everybody, I know we all liked the first act, but now this is where it really gets good! Why's that you say? Well, because we have the stars of the show right here with us! Let’s give em a round of applause folks!" The crowd did exactly as it was told, pointing and laughing at Adam and Jennifer as their digital images took off all of their clothes for the digital crowd in the digital night.

"Jenny's got some nice titties on her doesn't she?" Max said as the digital Jenny removed her bra. "Not as big as her sister's, but, maybe she'll grow into em huh?" Jenny spit a curse as she struggled to free herself from Max's weight. It was around this time that she realized that her skirt had been pulled up in the struggle. She could feel the cold glass window at the back of the bus up against her ass cheeks and as the blood drained from her face she wondered if there was any traffic piled up behind the vehicle. If there was, she'd be mooning every last one of them, on display in the back as surely as she was in the front. And she was on display in the front, that much she knew. The front of her skirt was hiked up, and pinned between her body and Max's, leaving her pussy out in the open, exposed to anyone who cared to look. It was only the struggle, the confusion, and Max's moving body that obscured the view, but Jen swore she heard muttered, uncertain talk about her lack of underwear. Making a snap decision, she ceased her struggle against Max, and instead devoted her efforts to pulling the front of her skirt back down to avoid further embarrassment.

It was about this time that Max turned his commentary towards Adam. "And here's little Adam getting in on the act! If you look very carefully, you just might be able to make out the image of his shrinky dink. If anybody wears glasses, now would be the time to put them on. What was the matter Adam, I don't remember it being that cold last night..."

"Look who's talking, Max!" Adam shouted as he struggled. "I've seen you in the locker room too, and you've got nothing to brag about!" Immediately, all of the fun left Max's face for the first time, replaced by barely restrained boiling rage. Adam wouldn't dare. It was a well kept secret, an extremely well kept secret, that Max, self proclaimed super stud and man of all men, had a package smaller than that of most freshmen. Some said steroid use was to blame, but nobody had any proof for the matter. The fact remained however that he had a teeny weeny weenie, and he was not proud of it. A girl he once dated had the audacity to laugh at him when he pulled it out in his car after a date. In less than a week, she was fleeing the state in shame, her computer ripped open, and every secret within spilled out, and every friend she had turned against her by the jockockracy that ruled the school. It was a well known fact that you don't cross Max Powers, and it was that fact that kept his secret safe all of these years. So, naturally, Adam wouldn't dare. Unless of course, Max had pushed him too far.

Seeing that he had Max off balance, Adam whispered, "Turn it off, Max. Turn it off now, or I'll tell everybody!" Max's face turned red with anger as he gripped Adam by the shirt. "Not a chance... you wouldn't dare! You'll sit there and take it like the little shit you are or..." but it was too late, Adam was going to do it. As Max's hand crawled up his shirt towards his throat, Adam cried out "MAX POWER'S GOT A ONE INCH WEENER!"

"I'LL FUCKING KILL YOU!" Max screamed as he lunged forward, both of his hands around Adam's throat. Jenny, now free, wasted no time in jumping on Max's back, pulling at his hair and scratching at his face in an attempt to pull him off of his intended victim. She succeeded in loosening his grip, but, as if part of a chain reaction, Penny leapt from her seat and grabbed Jen by her pony tail, pulling mercilessly to get her off of Max. The rest of the bus didn't have much time to gasp at Adam's stunning revelation before they all began to chant "FIGHT! FIGHT! FIGHT! FIGHT!" At the top of their lungs.

In mere moments, the bus came to a screeching halt, and the driver was up out of his seat and heading towards the back. "Okay you kids, that’s enough! That’s enough! Break it up!" he shouted as he reached the back in just enough time to pull the mad football captain off of his prey. Luckily for everybody, the driver was an ex-marine who kept in good shape. In short order, Max was expelled from the bus and forced to walk the rest of the way to school, Penny following closely after, clutching her Laptop to her chest and worrying over Max's safety.

The rest of the bus ride was fairly uneventful. Without Max to stir the pot, the driver was able to calm things down and return some semblance of order. Still, Adam and Jennifer had to endure the whispers and the giggling of their fellow students the whole rest of the way, knowing that this is what school would be like for the both of them for the foreseeable future.
115332212111212122122111111121112.title: Not by a longshot

1153322121112121221221111111211121.content:
By the time they arrived at school, Adam's throat was feeling a lot better, but it was still a bit marked up. They waited for everyone else to empty out before disembarking, and when they did, Emily was right there waiting for them. She was smiling at first, but as soon as she saw the looks on their faces, her countenance shifted to concern. "What happened?" She asked.

"We had a bit of a disagreement with Max Powers." Jen answered. "He started showing the other kids on the bus video footage from last night, so Adam told everybody about his one in wang. That kinda pissed him off."

Emily couldn't help but giggle. She had heard rumors about Max's quarter inch killer from some of her fellow cheerleaders who had dated him in the past. She had always wondered if they were true, and Adam wasn't a liar, so that settled that issue. She offered Adam a high five. "Way to go, man! Max is an asshole anyway, don't worry about him." Adam reluctantly gave Emily a high five, but his outlook wasn't exactly rosy. "It was the only thing I could think of to get him to stop... and I was just so mad! But it might have been a mistake. Max is not a person you want to mess with."

Emily grinned sinisterly, "Well, neither am I, and I've got your backs, you can count on that." In an instant her grin turned mischievous. "Speaking of backs, I noticed you’re both dressed to impress! I wonder..." Sneaking up behind Jen, Emily grabbed the back of her friend's skirt and lifted it up, taking a peak underneath and finding nothing but bare buns. "EMILEEEE!" Jen squealed as she pulled away and straightened out her skirt. "DON'T DO THAT!"

Doubled over with laughter, Emily apologized profusely. "I'm sorry, really! I just had to see for myself! Wow your actually doing it huh?"

"Yeah, I guess so..." Jennifer said, blushing. It was funny, as much as Emily's antics were frustrating (not to mention embarrassing) it actually had taken some of the edge off, and Jennifer had to admit that she was feeling a lot better than she was a few moments ago.

The three chatted briefly, exchanging information about the last night and the early morning. Jennifer had asked in passing why Emily hadn't taken the bus this morning, and Emily replied what she had gotten a ride, before quickly changing the subject. Her ride, in fact was still parked outside the school, its charnel driver still behind the wheel, trying to keep a low profile as he watched and waited. When the first bell rang, Jennifer, Adam and Emily all rushed into the school, anxious to make it to their respective homerooms before the final bell rang. Before it did however, the PA speakers crackled to life and the voice of Principal Wormkins rang out throughout the school.

"Adam Bombarell and Jennifer Summers, please report to the Principals office at once."

Immediately, Jennifer's heart sank. "Well, that’s it." She said. "We're history."

Adam nodded in agreement. "Yup. I guess news really does travel fast. We'll be lucky if all he does is suspend us. We could be looking at an expulsion here. See you later Emily."

As Adam and Jennifer turned and started towards the Principals office, prepared to face the music, Emily ran up fast behind them. "Wait, I'm coming with you!" She shouted.

At that, both of her friends stopped and stared. "What? Why?" Adam asked. "You don't have to Emily. Besides, you need to head to homeroom, you'll get in trouble otherwise."

"No, it's okay." Emily replied. "It's my fault you guys got into trouble last night. It was me that egged you on. It's the least I can do to help you guys out now. Don't worry, I've got it all figured out. Just follow my lead and you won't get expelled or suspended or anything!"

With that, Emily took off ahead of them, making a bee line for Wormkins' office. Adam and Jennifer exchanged confused glances, shrugged and followed her lead. Neither one of them had any clue what to tell the Principal, so if Emily had a plan, it couldn't be any worse than the awkward pleas for mercy either of them planned to muster... could it?
1153322121112121221221111111211121.title: Arrival

11533221211121212212211111112111211.content:
When they entered the office, Mr. Wormkins was pacing back and forth, looking like a nervous wreck. The Principal was a short, lean man, with a somewhat overly large head that served as the home of a bad comb-over. When he noticed that Adam and Jennifer had arrived he asked them to take a seat, but paused for a moment when he realized that Emily was with them.

"Miss Nurelli, I didn't call you to my office. Go back to class before your teacher marks you absent."

"Principal Wormkins, please... I know you didn't call me up, but I really think I need to be here." Emily replied, looking very concerned and distraught. "I was with Adam and Jennifer last night when... well, you know what happened. Though I didn't participate in what they did, I was a part of it, and they're both so nervous and ashamed... I really think they need me here right now... they need somebody to stick up for them."

"You were there last night in person?"

"Yes sir, Mr. Wormkins."

Wormkins took off his glasses for a moment and pinched the area where his eyes met his nose before replying. "Alright, fine. Remind to write you a note before I send you back to class. Now please, all of you take a seat."

With that, they all did as they were told, with Wormkins taking a seat behind his desk, and the 3 teens taking their seats in front. Emily sat herself down right between Adam and Emily, and a little in front of both. She planned to do the vast majority of the talking for the three of them. She didn't want her friends to get into any trouble, but she had an agenda to push, and neither one of them would like it very much. Still, it would be so awesome to see them both walking around naked in the school hallways, like something out of a dream! Plus, if she failed, she'd have to answer to her grandpa, and he didn't seem like the forgiving sort.

Wormkins was rubbing his temples for quite a few moments before he finally spoke. "I really don't know what to make of all of this. The whole thing is just so ludicrous! I know kids can get out of hand, get a little rowdy after a big game, but this?"

"Actually, Mr. Wormkins..." Emily interjected. "I don't think that has anything to do with it. Have you seen the video?"

Wormkins nearly choked before stuttering out "N-no, I haven’t, naturally, but I don't need to have seen it to know what happened. The video was all over youtube this morning. Administration keeps taking it down, but people just keep loading it back up under different names and headings. I've tried to complain, but apparently the posters are slippery little bas- er buggers and they know how to work the system."

"Y-youtube?" Jenny blurted out. "You mean we're naked on youtube!?"

"Yes, Youtube and dozens of other sites, from what I understand." Wormkins replied. "It's going to be all over the media before the day is out. One of my old friends at Channel 6 says they're going to be doing an investigative report on the whole thing, and bunch of the local newspapers are going to be running stories about how our school is out of control. You'd think the halls were flooded with sex and drugs! At least you would if you watched that video! They’re going to have my ass in a sling for this!"

"Well, that doesn't have to be the story, Principal Wormkins." Emily replied coolly.

"What do you mean?" the Principal asked.

"Well..." Emily continued "If you did watch the video, you'd know that Jennifer and Adam didn't start taking their clothes off because they were rowdy or hopped up on drugs. They did so to show support for their sister and mother."

"That's right..." Wormkins responded. "I couldn't believe that either. Angie Summers is a fine police officer, and Adam's mother a respected scientist. The two of them going to such bizarre lengths..."

"That's Z." Emily interrupted. "That’s what it does to people. Believe me, you have no idea what it's like..."

"And you do?" Wormkins responded, curiously.

"Er.. well.. I was there last night... I saw it firsthand." Emily said, stumbling, but then recovering quickly. "Miss Summers is an innocent victim in all of this, and Miss. Bombarell is just trying to help her out. Adam and Jennifer were both just so overcome with compassion that they wanted to show their support for their guardians, and this was the only way they could think of."

"Then they utilized extraordinarily poor judgment." Wormkins said, with an air of finality. "I can't be seen to allow my students to engage in illegal activity on school property without repercussions, no matter what the circumstances. On top of that, I'm not sure either of your guardians are still fit to take care of you after what I've see-- er heard about last night. Sex crazed exhibitionist drug addicts? As soon as I finish with you, I'm going to call protective services..."

"No!" Adam shouted nearly jumping up out of his seat.

"Yes, Adam." Wormkins replied, "that’s the proper thing to do. And the only thing I can think of to do with the two of you, is suspend you until further notice."

"Wait just a moment...!" Emily said, almost panicking.

"Yes...?" Wormkins replied.

"Well..." Emily began urgently. "If you’re worried about how this will look in the media... I have something I'd like to show you..."

With that Emily produced the letter she had been given this morning by her grandpa. In truth, she hadn't gotten around to reading it herself, but her Grandpa had given her the jist of it. Wormkins was not being amenable to her plans. She hoped that the letter would help her out.

All three students watched intently as Wormkins read the letter through. Adam and Jen were both feeling very uncomfortable. Neither of them had any clue what was in that letter, but they didn't want to take the wind out of Emily's sails if she had a plan that could get them off the hook. They watched as Wormkins’ face went through several stages of disbelief as he read. First, a raised eyebrow. Then a furrowed brow of confusion. Then wide eyed disbelief and frequent blinking, as if he couldn't believe that the words on the page actually existed. He read the letter through a second time, just to make sure he hadn't imagined it before replying. "Is this for real?"

"Mhm!" Emily replied. "And Adam and Jennifer are very adamant about it. It's what I was trying to tell you before. This whole thing doesn't have to generate bad press for the school. If we play this right, it can be a story of courage and hope!"

"It would never work." Wormkins replied in stunned disbelief. "It'd never work, it's scandalous, it's illegal!"

"Well, scandalous maybe... that’s for the media to decide... but Illegal, no. It's all in the letter isn't it? Public Nudity is totally legal in these parts, I've checked it all out! I could walk off school property right now, take off all my clothes, and walk home naked as the day I was born, and it would be totally legal! The only thing keeping Adam and Jennifer from following through with their pledge is the school dress code, which you can amend at a whim!"

Wormkins was biting his lip now. He was actually considering it. Adam and Jennifer didn't like all of this talk about public nudity. What the hell was Emily thinking? What the hell was in that letter!? But Wormkins shook his head.

"No... I don't know... it's just so... outlandish!"

"Well, think of it this way..." Emily replied. "You have two scenarios. In one of them, you can suspend Jennifer and Adam, and try to get them taken away from their legal guardians. In this scenario, the media is still banging on your door, and you'll still look ineffective and reactionary for letting this whole thing happen, and then punishing the victims. Or, you could take the more... progressive approach. Sure it's weird, but it's definitely not illegal, and if you play your cards right, you can come off looking like a forward thinking, open minded visionary instead of an embattled administrator caught with his pants down!"

Adam and Jennifer were stunned. They'd never heard Emily say anything like that before. They had absolutely no idea what she was talking about, but it sounded really damn good... and Wormkins was wavering. After a few moments of deep thought, he looked Emily in the eyes. Then he glanced at Jennifer and then back at Adam before rising and heading to the door. "You three wait here. I'm going to go have a little talk with Vice Principal Sofen. I'll be right back."

As Wormkins left, Emily cracked a broad smile that flowed from ear to ear, and unleashed a mighty fist pump to celebrate her victory. It took her a few moments to notice that Adam and Jennifer were staring at her like she'd just run over their favorite pet and then cracked a joke about it. Covering her mouth to stifle a laugh, Emily said at last "Okay, I can explain. It's all in the letter!"

With that, Jennifer snatched the letter off the desk, and side by side with Adam, she read it through from top to bottom. "Emily... I can't believe this!" Jennifer exclaimed.

"Hey, it's either that or suspension, right?" Emily shot back defensively. "Besides, you wanted to show your support for your sister right? This is the BEST way to do it! Plus, you'll be raising awareness about drugs in our community, and that'll look great on a college application, won't it?"

"But...but this says we're pledging to go to school bare butt naked for the rest of the year! That’s crazy!" Jennifer shouted.

"You said you'd be willing to do it last night!" Emily said, sounding offended "Or were you lying on the way back to your house? Talking the talk, but not prepared to walk the walk?"

It was Adam's turn to speak now. "She's right, Jen. It's... its crazy I know, but we do want to show our support for our families, right? What Emily said is true. This is our chance to turn a bad thing into a good thing. We can't let our personal modesty get in the way."

"Oh yeah? Speak for yourself!" Jennifer practically spat back.

Adam recoiled. Jennifer hadn't meant to hurt him with her reply but she had. The boy responded, "Well, if that’s the way you feel..."

"No... no, it's okay. I'm sorry." Jennifer said. "It's just... if we actually do this thing... we're both going to be buck naked 24/7 everywhere we go, no matter who's around or what we have to do for the rest of the year... I don't know if I can handle that..."

Adam reached across Emily's lap and rested his hand on Jennifer's. "Just like on the bus. We'll handle it together."

Jen smiled a sad smile as she gazed into Adam's eyes and thought about the future. It wasn't long before Emily pulled their hands apart and said "Okay, enough of that, glad to see the two of you are on board. I was beginning to think I did all of that for nothing!"

"It was nice of you, Emily." Adam said. "Weird of you too, but nice."

"Yeah. I was beginning to think you were trying to take advantage of me and Adam, but it's incredible that your agreeing to go through this whole thing with us. You really are a good friend Ems."

"...What?" Emily said, a stunned look upon her face as if she'd just been slapped in the head with a stop sign. "Let me see that!" Snatching the letter from Jennifer, she barely had enough time to read it and confirm her worst fears before Principal Wormkins returned with his decision. All three students fell silent. Their fate was in the Principal's hands now. After settling back down in his seat, he said:

1153322221.content:
Kevin lays alone in his bed, surrounded by darkness save for the dim glow of a nightlight that had remained affixed to the wall of his room since he was a baby. Truth be told, Kevin was a little old to have a nightlight, but it served as a reading lamp of sorts, at least that’s the explanation he gives his parents. Though Kevin does enjoy curling up with a good book before bed, the harsh truth of the matter was that he really was still afraid of the dark. Not deathly afraid mind you, it just made him feel... uneasy. The nightlight provided just enough light to make him feel comfortable, and if playing up his love of books was what it took to ensure him a good night's sleep, then he was more than happy to keep up the deception as look as he could. The alternative, having to admit to his family that he had yet to shed the most basic of all childhood fears, seemed far less pleasant.

As he turned to the next page of the book he had perched atop his chest, the door to his room came open, and in walked his older brother, Jason, the lower half of his body wrapped in nothing but a towel. The boys had shared a room for most of their lives, and Jason had just come from the shower. Without so much as a word, Jason headed for the closet, probably to grab his pajamas. Kevin wasn't wearing PJs himself. It was a warm night, so he had just decided to go to bed in his underwear. He wondered if that was weird. He knew his older sister, Julie, liked to sleep in the nude. Kevin had found this out for himself a few weeks ago when he accidently walked in on her while she was getting ready for bed. Julie totally flipped her lid, and Kevin had gotten into allot of trouble. He still thought that wasn't very fair. It's not like he meant to do anything wrong, and Julie should learn to lock her door if she doesn't want anybody to see her naked. His mom said it was just a phase she was going through, but that seemed to be her answer whenever Julie did something weird.

In any event, Kevin put his book down on the floor and pulled his covers over his head. Jason was about to get changed, and he had no desire to see his brother's naked butt. Kevin closed his eyes and started counting sheep. He had barely gotten to sheep 3 when a choked cry, followed immediately by the slamming of the closet door shattered the silence of the room. Shooting up to a seated position, Kevin looked around in a panic, and saw nothing. "Jason?" Kevin whispered without moving a muscle. No answer. After a few more moments of whispering and waiting, Kevin climbs out of bed and slowly creeps towards the closet to investigate. The light provided by the nightlight was dim, but it was enough for Kevin to see his way through the room. It was kind of a mess, and Kevin had to be careful not to step on anything too pointy with his bare feet. He could turn the light on of course, but something inside him told him not too. He was afraid of the dark, but now it seemed he was afraid of the light as well, or at least afraid of what the light might reveal after driving away the darkness. When he got to the closet, he found no trace of Jason except for the wet towel he had been wearing, now crumpled on the floor. Scratching his head, Kevin wondered what could have happened.

As he pondered the question of his disappearing brother, a low, menacing sound began to build from within the closet, like the sound of a rattlesnake's tail, slowly growing in volume and speed as dark, tendrils of shadow began to seep out of the shadows and invade the dim light. As the sound grew loud enough to hear, Kevin gaped in horror as he found himself nearly surrounded by the shadow tendrils. Unable to even scream, Kevin narrowly avoids the weaving shadows and bolts from the room in search of his parents.

Inside the closet, Herbert's hollow laughter echoed off the walls of his confined but infinite domain. This closet contained within it a pocket dimension, within which Herbert’s power was supreme. He could create and destroy, bend reality as he saw fit. It was his own little corner of Hell. He could leave the closet of course, and as an infernal spirit, he could assume any form he chose, but his physical forms could still be damaged or perhaps even destroyed. Within the closet, he could do as he pleased. He was God and the Devil all rolled into one malicious package, and poor Kevin was about to lure his unwitting family right into his clutches. "Come into my parlor..." Herbert said as he changed his shape to that of an enormous and hideous spider, his disgusting maw wiggling with joy as he continues to laugh while imagining all of the horrors he will soon unleash upon the innocent O'Conner family. As his laughter fades, so too does his spider form as he melts back into the darkness, becoming once again nothing, and yet, everything at once.

choices: She makes it to the Van

123312111111112211211112122.content:
A white van rolls to a stop on the very edge of the woods. The Channel 6 logo identifies it as a news van for one of the local TV stations. As soon as the van was parked, the back doors came open and two Channel 6 employees, one an overweight man with a grungy beard, the other a petite blonde female with short hair and a ring of metal studs circling the edge of one of her ears. The man wore a red baseball cap, a grey T-shirt, blue jeans and sneakers. The girl wore a black tank top, a black denim skirt and a pair of army boots on her feet. Her arms were adorned with a series of bands and bracelets, and she wore just a bit too much eye shadow. As these two exited the van, they began to gather up the camera equipment and unload it.

As they did so, the front door of the van came open and out stepped Sandra Cardinalis, top field reporter for Channel 6 News. With a lovely, curvy figure, a beautiful face, and long curly brown hair, Sandra was one of the best reasons to stay up and watch the late night local news. She wore a dark blue suit jacket and skirt combo over a white silk shirt and matching white bra and panties. On her feet, she wore blue high heels, and on her face she wore a look of impatience. "Come on people, let’s move it! Ralph, grab the camera, Meg, take whatever else we need, but only just. If my tip is any good, we'll need to move quickly." In short order, Raph and Megan got their shit together and followed Sandra into the forest.

Earlier that evening, Sandra had gotten a tip from one of her contacts at the local military base. Resources from all different branches of the armed forces were mobilizing on incredibly short notice to run "exercises" in an around a small, meaningless rural town. "Exercises" that involved evacuating said town completely with zero notification. To call it suspicious would be an understatement, but this was the sort of thing the military liked to do quickly and quietly. Tomorrow, when people start asking questions, the army will more than likely be long gone, and their official press releases will be sent to Channel 6 and every other news station. The newscasters will give the official explanation, and nobody will ever know what really happened. Not this time. Sandra was one of the few reporters at Channel 6 who really believed in investigative journalism. If she could pull this off and catch the army with its pants down, she'd have the opportunity to jump to the very top of the Channel 6 news team. Hell, she could even leave this dingy little berg behind and go national. The sky is the limit. If she can pull this off. If. And then she'd be able to rub her success right in the face of Susana Rallston, that dumb, bleach blonde, bimbo bitch who Sandra just knew fucked her way into her news anchor position back at the station.

Now deep in the woods, it seemed like the intrepid trio had been walking forever, when all three were suddenly brought to a dead stop, as camouflaged men with machine guns came out of the darkness and surrounded them. The three civilians huddled together as if for safety as Sandra pulled out her press pass and began to wave it around as if it were a flag of truce. "I'm Sandra Cardinalis, Channel 6 News! If I could just have a moment of your time..."

The squad leader, a Sergeant, stepped forward to deal with the civies. "Ma'am, I'm going to have to ask you to leave. This whole area is being evacuated, and we have orders to remove all civilians from the area." Not backing down, Sandra held up her press card, steady and still for the Sergeant to read "I'm with the press. I have a right to be here, and the public has a right to know what’s going on. Sergeant, if you could just give me an official..." Holding up his hand, the Sergeant stopped Sandra mid sentence and radioed his superior officer. "Sir, we have a local news team here who... Yes sir. Yes Sir. Yes sir, I understand, sir. I'm sorry ma'am, but you’re going to have to go. Either you leave now of your own free will, or we have orders to escort you away from the premises."

Sandra very quickly looked over her shoulder to make sure the camera was rolling. "Good boy, Ralph!" She thought to herself "I want all of this on tape. Even if we get booted, it's still a story!" The gutsy reporter continued to argue with the Sergeant, but only briefly. Their escalating words were drowned out, suddenly and painfully, but the night piercing sound of automatic machine gun fire. Immediately, the world around Sandra turned to chaos as the sergeant dragged her to the floor and told her not to move. As she struggled to get her bearings, Sandra’s eyes darted from side to side. She could see the soldiers forming a perimeter and taking cover. She could see Ralph and Megan, down on the ground just like her, trembling with fear. She could see the Sergeant yelling into his radio trying to get an idea of what was going on. But most of all, she heard, and felt the sound of bullets and explosions, and…something else… like a rapid chirping… coming from seemingly everywhere at once. Whatever was going on, it was certainly not a routine exercise.

The sound of screams drew Sandra’s eyes to her right, and it was then that she saw the mist for the first time. A massive green cloud was quickly making its way through the woods. It seemed like the whole forest was filling with the stuff, and as it did, the sound of bullets and explosions began to die down, drowned out by the sound of human screams and that bizarre chirping. As the wall of fog got closer, the surrounding soldiers began to pull on gas masks and ready their weapons. Just as Sandra was preparing for the worst, the cloud came to a slow and sudden stop.

One of the soldiers approached the cloud, his gun at the ready. Reaching out with his gloved hand, he brushed the mist. When he pulled his hand back, the glove was gone, and the frayed edges of his sleeve told him something about the nature of the enemy. “Hey, Sarge!” He called back, but he never got to finish his report. Without warning, something came out of the cloud, quick as a slashing sword, and tore the soldiers guts out. Screaming, the private fell backwards as his intestines spilled out of his body.

In a flash, his fellow soldiers were at his side, firing into the green mist, and Sandra, defying the shivering of her limbs and the whispered calls of her co-workers, found herself crawling across the dirt hoping to get a better look. The poor young man. He couldn’t be older than 19 and he was already dead. Whatever had hit him, it hit him good. It looked to Sandra as if his stomach had been cut open with a giant pair of scissors. It was fascinatingly gruesome, but it wouldn’t hold Sandra’s interest for very long. Suddenly, the chirping was back, louder than ever, and as the news woman looked on with widening eyes, the source of that strange sound finally deigned to reveal itself.

With a maddening, screeching sound, the beast emerged from the fog. The soldiers back pedaled quickly as the creature charged forward into their ranks. It didn’t get very far. Moments after showing itself it was riddled with bullets. Cracks formed in its slick black carapace, a bullet, a lucky shot, struck it in one of its leg joints, causing the slim, hairy limb to fly from its body, and, most horrifying of all, several shots struck it in its bulbous eyes, causing them to explode in a shower of green mucous. Rearing up on its hind legs, the ant flailed its limbs in impotent fury before crashing down to the ground, filled with lead and nearly dead. Before its life force was spent however, it let out a green liquid spray into the air, causing Sandra to bury her head in the dirt out of fear. She felt something splash against her back, and then a faint hissing sound, but no pain, just a cool October breeze on newly exposed skin.

Looking up at Last, Sandra was astonished to see what had become of the soldiers in front of her. Their clothing was torn and shredded, almost down to nothing. Many of their guns looked melted and useless, and one or two, including the Sergeant, were completely naked and weaponless. They seemed confused and disoriented, but that would soon become the least of their worries. Without warning, the cloud lurched forward again and began to swallow the soldiers whole. Screaming, Sandra rose to her feet, kicking off her high heel shoes in the process. Ralph and Megan had the same idea, and soon all three were fleeing back to their van, pursued by the quickly creeping fog.
123312111111112211211112122.title: Introducing Sandra Cardinalis

Looking down at her body, Sandra came to realize that the ant creature’s spray had torn her clothing up pretty badly as well, though not as bad as it had the soldiers. She was missing most of the back of her blazer, exposing her bra strap, and the back of her skirt was eaten down to the panties. She hadn’t escaped the spray either. The back of her skirt was eaten all the way through, and Sandra could see her bare, pale butt cheeks pumping as she ran. Sandra idly wondered if that was because the spray had eaten all the way through to her bottom, or if Megan had simply gone without panties today.

Just as her mind was beginning to make its judgment on Megan’s level of relative slutitude, Sandra heard a loud crash behind her, accompanied by a distinctive “Oh, fuck!” that could only have come from Ralph. In an instant, Megan was at Ralph’s side, tugging at his arm and coaxing him to stand up. Sandra briefly considered joining her, but one look at the approaching fog changed her mind. Making her decision, Sandra snatched up Ralph’s camera and continued on her way, running back to the van full steam. She heard Megan curse her briefly before being swallowed by the green smoke and the alien sound of the insect’s chirping.

As the van came into view for Sandra, she began to lose her race with the mist. She could feel it gently caressing her buttocks as it ate its way through her panties and started in on the rest of her skirt. Soon, her skirt had fallen away completely, leaving her bottomless, and she could seen thin tendrils of the mist whisping past her face. Soon, her entire body was consumed by the fog, save for her outstretched forearms holding the camera and its precious footage ahead of the dangerous vapors. Then, as suddenly as it had lurched forward, the mist stopped short. Sandra found herself running out ahead of the green cloud, buck naked from head to toe, save for the gold bracelet she wore on her right wrist. The slightly melted edges of which told her exactly how close she had come to losing her precious story. Not wanting to wait around and see how long the fog would idle where it was, Sandra ran ahead to the van. Throwing the door open, she threw the camera into the passenger seat, hopped behind the wheel, slammed the door shut and put the pedal to the metal. For all intents and purposes, it looked as if his best field reporter had just torn off all of her clothes and gone stark raving mad. “Sandra! What in God’s name is…!?”

“Never mind that!” Sandra shouted frantically, making no attempt to hide her nakedness as she placed the camera on the floor and bent over to retrieve the tape, nearly giving the security guard behind her a heart attack. Retrieving the tape from the camera, Sandra jabbed it into Vernon’s chest, causing her breasts to jiggle with the effort. She had to grab him by the chin in order to tear his eyes away from her chest and fix them on her own. “Listen to me, Vernon… you have to run this tape NOW!”

"...And so, with police combing the woods day and night, the search goes on for College Student Lisa Wagner. More on this story as it develops." Susana Rallston paused to smile at the camera after giving the grim news. Though a bit inappropriate, it was an award winning smile, nonetheless. With wavy blonde hair, crystal blue eyes, perfect features and a sing song southern twinge to her voice, if Sandra was one good reason to watch the local news, Susana was the main one. Well, Susana and her low cut tops. She wore a pink suit jacket with a buttoned down white shirt underneath. Her skirt matched her jacket, and the fact that she wasn't wearing a bra was fairly evident by the amount of cleavage peeking out from beneath the opened top buttons of her shirt.

Just as she was preparing to segue into the next story, someone pushed a pile of papers under her nose before disappearing off camera. Quickly examining the notes, a look of confusion followed by fear crept into Susana's face. Trying hard to compose herself, she put down the papers and once again faced the camera. "...This just in... shocking...shocking events taking place earlier tonight in the woods just outside New Bern Texas. There, members of the U.S. Armed Forces engaged in combat with a strange enemy that... just.. just roll the footage okay, Vernon?" Just then, the camera cut from the now perspiring news anchor and cut to the video from the woods. The camera was shaky, and the sound was a little off, but the horrifying events played out with cruel clarity.

Ralph had done his job well. Viewers of the late night news were treated to rather explicit footage of a young soldier being sliced to ribbons by an unseen adversary, and then, the horrifying revelation of that adversary’s true nature. After being cut to ribbons, the creature spews forth a green chemical, shredding the clothing of the soldiers and rendering their weapons useless. Then, the image becomes unreadable for several moments as the lens focuses on a blur of dirt and trees, before finally settling on the moving images of two women in badly torn clothing fleeing into the night. The footage had gone on the air so quickly that there was no time to edit it with the blurring effect Channel 6 would generally use to block out the sight of poor lost Megan's exposed ass, but right now, to anyone sane, that would be the last thing on their minds. The camera cuts out just about when Ralph collapses from exhaustion.

When the footage ends, the camera cuts back to Susana, looking like a deer caught in the headlights. Someone off screen whispers something to her about being back on the air and she shakes her head slightly to compose herself. Staring into the camera, she speaks "Well... There's no arguing with what we just saw… The ants... will soon be here. There's no stopping them...I mean, obviously, we all saw the same thing." It was about this time that that award winning smile came back to her face "And I for one welcome our new insect overlords! And, I would like to remind them that, as a local celebrity, I can be useful in rounding up others to toil in their sugar mines..." After that the camera cuts to a "Technical Difficulties" screen. The screen holds its static image for almost 10 minutes before the live feed finally starts up again, cutting back to Susana, smiling once again, holding the papers upright on her desk, blocking the camera's view of her chest. Her arms and shoulders now appear to be bare.

"False alarm everybody!" Susana began, mugging for the camera. "It seems we've all been the victim of a Halloween prank! The footage you just saw was put together by one of our more mischievous camera men. If you fell for it, don't feel so bad. Remember all of those people who fell for that old H.G. Wells broadcast, and actually thought the earth was being invaded by little green men? Well, we here at Channel 6 would like to apologize for scaring anyone out there in our audience, and wish you all a happy Halloween season. Also, as a side note, I would personally like to reaffirm my allegiance to the United States of America, and its human masters! I'm Susana Rallston, and this is Channel 6 news saying, goodnight!"

With that, she instinctively put down the papers in order to fold her hands as she always did while signing off. Unfortunately, this had the effect of completely exposing her bare breasts to the viewing public. Susana just sat there for 2-3 seconds, hands folded on the desk, smiling ear to ear with her beautiful tits on full display to anyone with access to a television set. It wasn't until someone shouted something from off camera that she realized her mistake. A shocked expression on her face, Susana grabbed a hold of her boobs with both hands and ran off screen, exposing her bare bush and luscious, perfectly tanned ass ever so briefly in the process. A strange chirping sound could be heard off camera right before the screen once again went to "Technical Difficulties."

Thirteen-year-old Kyle, twelve-year-old Jenny his sister, and their thirty-five-year-old mom Emily are going for a swim in the warm lake. Their car had broken down nearby for some unknown reason, and it would take the tow truck driver about four to five hours to get to them. The entire family is attractive, healthy looking and White with dark red hair.

While the family swims, they are unaware that they are being watched from afar. Antennas from two of the giant ant scouts are monitoring the three intruders closely. They are sending their observations telepathically to their queen and awaiting instructions. Behind the two scouts are seven nude humans in a trance like state. I want to run some experiments on some unaltered humans.”

“What kind of experiments do you have in mind?” asks the queen.

“I wish to observe humans in the act of reproduction, it’s fascinating to watch. In addition, I wish to study how wild humans will react to us and I wish to examine their natural anatomy and show my new ant students some wild caught humans.” He is not only the queen’s chief ant scientist but he teaches the curious, newly hatched ants too in an alien like classroom setting. “I also have a plan to end our protein shortage. We must start using humans more than we are which means expanding our hunting grounds close to the human colony (town) to acquire more living human meat. They are so tasty and fun to watch as they beg for their lives and are swallowed alive. I wonder how an unclothed human couple in the act of breeding would taste together.”

“Yes they are fun to play with, and I understand. I will allow it, but only if I get to watch?” the queen says as she orders her hunting parties to obtain the three family members along with any other unaffected humans they find.

Brainy says, “Yes my Majesty.”
