1233311.content:
Imagine, if you will, the difficulty you'd have speaking the english language without any lips. Try it for a second. Maybe pull your lips up to expose your teeth and try carrying on a conversation with yourself. Kind of rough, huh? Now, imagine for a moment that you don't have lips and your mouth opens horizontally rather than vertically. Also, the basic structure of said mouth is completely different, and you don't have a tongue. Put all of that together and speaking english would be a real pain in the ass, now wouldn't it? Now imagine the reverse. Do you think for a minute that any language designed to be spoken with such a mouth would feature words even remotely pronounceable by humans? The answer in this case is emphatically no, so I will not insult the proud heritage of our main character by trying to render his true name in anything close to base human english. Rather, we shall simply refer to him as Tom.

Tom, you see is a Mantid, from the planet Mantodea, a world far far away from our earth. These are not, of course, the real names of his species or his planet, but, again, the real names wouldn't do the likes of us much good anyhow. It would save an awful lot of description and exposition to simply say that Tom bears a striking resemblance to a 7 foot tall Praying Mantis and leave it at that. The Mantids of Mantodea are a proud and mighty race, known throughout the universe as deadly and fearsome warriors... or at least you could say that about their women. Tom, as you may have inferred from his name, is a male Mantid, and this, unfortunately, is bad news for any long term retirement plans he may otherwise have made in younger years. You see, the female Mantids of Mantodea are on average much larger than their male counterparts, and practice a form of sexual cannibalism that ensures that most males of breeding age don't make it out of the yearly mating season alive.

Most male Mantids resign themselves to their fate, and many even embrace it, viewing the fearless disregard for ones own life in pursuit of sexual conquest as the ultimate expression of manliness... but not Tom. No, Tom was one of the few, the proud... the cowards. The thought of a mighty female Mantid devouring his head mid coitus filled him with mind shattering terror, and as such, as he grew close to breeding age, he stole a space ship and fled the planet in disgrace.

On the run and on his own, Tom drifted, landing first on the planet Arcillo III, a wooded planet which was home to a colony of giant alien ants feared throughout the Galaxy for their ability to enslave other races to their will. Arcillo was a remote colony, however, far from the core of the Ant Imperium, and light on manpower... er... antpower. The Aphid like insects the Ants controlled were small and easily managed, and their insect overlords were fat, lazy and complacent... or so they were until Tom showed up. Hiding in the forests, he preyed upon the ants, becoming a legend and a thing of nightmares. This existence satisfied Tom for a time, until the ants began to organize against him. Fearing retribution from their superior numbers, he dug up his buried ship and fled the planet, eventually falling in with a crew of pirates with whom he had many adventures before they ditched him on Danar VII, taking with them his ship and his share of the loot from their latest campaign.

Penniless and mortified, Tom wandered into a bar and began working up a tab. He had long since turned to various kinds of substance abuse to improve his ever waning mood, so this was a natural and reflexive response to his predicament. Tom tried to chalk up his problems to the general anxieties and pressures of living in a cold and cruel universe without any true friends to depend upon, but there was a more specific issue at hand that was eating away at his insides, one he had been suppressing for a long time. Tom was horny as fuck. It had started to build as soon as he reached breeding age, and the need became stronger and stronger as time wore on, and lately, not a day went by when he didn't consider, even for a moment, returning to his home planet and certain death.

In such a state, you can imagine his shock when he looked across the bar and saw another of his species huddled in a dark corner. This was more than just another Mantid however, this was a male, like him! More than that, it was the oldest male Mantid he'd ever seen. He'd seen the ravages of age on females of his species, and this fellow had them all. The pale and faded carapace, the drooping antennae, the cataract and half closed, eyes, the slow and creaking limbs... here was a man who had lived long past his expected date of expiration, and Tom felt as if he was staring across the bar at his future self. If anyone could help him solve his current conundrum, it would have to be him!

Stumbling across the bar, Tom struck up a conversation with the ancient Mantid, hereafter known as Gramps, and the two became fast friends, regaling one another with their tales of travel and intrigue. Tom told him about the pirate life and about his time as the terror of the ants, and Gramps, laughing, told Tom of his time terrorizing the ant population in the Loram system, of his work as a mercenary, and of the 5 years he slave mined on Galgonet 7, amongst other tales. In time, however, Tom broached the question he'd intended to ask from the start. How did he deal with it? How did Gramps fight the urge to return to Mantodea for the mating season and retain his sanity all of these years. Grinning, as only a Mantid can, Gramps imparted upon Tom the secret of his mental and sexual health, and thusly, the secret of his longevity.

"Well, my boy..." He began. "I found the answer to that prickly problem very early on in my career. And it's a good thing too, because if I didn't, I probably would have ended up going bug nuts like you and heading back to Mantodea to get my head chewed off by the first big thoraxed slut I could get my raptorials on. Luckily, my merc work saved the day on this one. See, there's these aliens right... there kinda hard to describe. Humanoid, kinda, but they all have pale skin and weirdly divergent features and hair colors and the like. Klowns, they call themselves. Strange and creepy beings if you ask me, but damn smart. They've got science that looks like magic to ordinary folks like you and me. Thank god they never got into the Universal Domination game, because they'd give the Su-Ra and those fucking Slaver Ants a run for their goddamn money, let me tell you. But nah, they're not into empires and all that. They're out for fun. Fortunately, they all have a really sadistic sense of humor, which means that they occasionally need to outsource some muscle, which meant a really nice paycheck for me. I accompanied them on a number of expeditions, but the most important one was the mission to Earth. See, the clowns LOVE Earth, because the dominant species on the planet is a humanoid race of hairless apes that share a a lot of anatomical similarities with the clowns, but are primitive enough and ignorant enough about the nature of the universe to be real good sport for their brand of humor. More importantly though, and you may find this hard to believe... but they're actually kind of hot."

Tom recoiled in horror at this. Hairless apes? No fucking way! It made him sick to his stomach just thinking about it, but Gramps continued. "Don't knock it till you've tried it, son. They've got weird arms that end in pudgy little digits that are kinda gross, but they've got nice long legs like a lady Mantid. Well, they've only got two of them, but, really, beggars can't be choosers right? And the hair on their heads is kinda strange, but trust me, it ends up being real pretty once you're used to it. They're warm, and they're wet, they're too weak to put up much of a fight, and, let me stress this last part, they ABSOLUTELY WILL NOT EAT YOUR HEAD DURING SEX! That part is important."

Tom thought about it for a while. It still sounded pretty weird to him, but he knew a lot of aliens found humanoids to be universally sexy. He'd never really given it much thought, but he was running out of options. "Can you actually... like... breed with them?" Tom asked, somewhat sheepishly.

"Nah, we're too different genetically." Gramps answered. "But, this is where those ingenious little Klown guys come in handy. They thought the horror on the little humans faces was just priceless when I was fucking em, and they figured it'd be even better if I could actually knock em up. So they shot me full of this serum that rewrote some of my DNA and presto chango, I started getting em pregnant left and right!"

Shocked and amazed, Tom asked "Did they... did they carry them to term?" Gramps laughed in response "Hell if I know, the ones I knocked up got taken back to the Klown home world for study. Guess I probably have some kids out there somewhere, but I'm not too worried about that. I've lived a long and storied life my friend, and it was all made possible by a little intergalactic cum dumpster called Earth. Do yourself a favor kid. Go to the Klowns, get the shot, and then go to Earth. Trust me, you won't regret it."

At length, Tom agreed. Gramps even let him borrow his ship, and set up an appointment for him with his most trusted contact on the Klown World. Now thus prepared, Tom, his ship, and his loins, all set a course for Earth.
1233311.title: Praying Mantis

12333112.content:
Gramps smiled as he stared down into the bowl of fermented Zolan Chipper Blood between his forelimbs. That boy was going to do aaaaalright. He'd probably enjoy himself on Earth while it lasted. But, more importantly, he'd hopefully take the heat off of Gramps. The ones who were after him would be looking for a male Mantid in a Slorian Stealth Jumper, and that's a description that now matched Tom more closely than Gramps. He had been planning to ditch the ship eventually anyway, that he could dump it on a patsy was just good fortune. He dipped his head and slurped deeply from the cup, satisfied that his cunning had tacked another few years onto his own extraordinarily long life.

Thats when he saw it enter the room. Out of the corner of his eye, he saw what appeared to be a human female, with long brown hair, asian features and a slim and lovely build. He assumed she was a bounty hunter by the black tattoos around her eyes, and the gun belt that hung loosely on her waist (which was, incidentally the only thing she was wearing.) His eyes followed her as she paced barefoot across the shabby bar. By the time she sat her bare buns down on a stool in the back, Garmps head had spun around 180 degrees. She ordered a drink from the barmaid and rested her head in her hands as she waited for it.

He knew her type. She had probably been abducted at a young age, taken as a sex slave. Maybe a bounty hunter took a liking to her, bought her and taught her the tricks of the trade... yeah that made sense. That would explain the lack of characteristic human modesty. A girl like that... they're usually up for anything... WITH anything! Gramps had told Tom that he'd sated his lust all those years ago on Earth, but right now he could feel those old feelings coming back, and he knew what he wanted to do. "Ahh... it was good being alive!" He thought to himself, imagining all the poor Mantids who'd gone to their deaths midway through the loss of their virginity.

He approached the table. He was drunk and old, and a giant Mantis, but she didn't seem to mind. He was right about her, she was kinky! In no time at all he'd sweet talked her into finding a nice cosy place to spend the night together, which ended up being the alley behind the bar. Restraining her puny arms with his mighty raptorial limbs, he pinned her up against the wall as his lower legs undid her gun belt and cast it aside "No sense in giving her access to weapons if she decides to change her mind about this" he thought to himself.

The feeling of thrusting into her soft human flesh brought him back to the days of his youth and he thought about reviving a nasty little habit he hadn't told Tom about before sending him off. He didn't always do this of course, especially when the Klowns were pestering him for pregnant subjects for their experiments, but sometimes... he liked to eat the heads off the human girls just as he was finishing with them. It gave him a sort of perverse satisfaction to be able to repay the favor the females on his planet had paid to his his kind for so many generations, even if the payback was horribly misguided. Part of him knew it was stupid. There was hardly any law at all on this accursed rock, but cold blooded gruesome murder might turn a head or two. Plus, she appeared to be a bounty hunter. She was bound to have friends in the field, perhaps dangerous friends who were good at hunting people down. Maybe it would be best to leave this one alive. Then again, he was pretty drunk, and high on life... maybe he could indulge himself one last time...

He'd never get the chance to decide however. Without warning, the creature in his grasp changed shape, expanding outward, turning green, sprouting limbs and elongating until it was easily twice Gramp's size. Screaming in terror, Gramps grappled for control for a few moments, but to no avail. The creature reversed his hold on her and gripped him in it's own massive raptorial limbs and all he could do was struggle and scream as his twitching member remained trapped inside his former victim, gripped fiercely by something sharp and strong inside. The creature, if you haven't guessed by now, is a female of the Mantid species, but not an ordinary one. She (we shall call her Mandy) was a genetically altered hunter of fugitive Mantids, capable of changing shape and cloaking herself from detection. She'd been hunting Gramps for a long, long time. She'd learned long ago of his weakness for human females, and now that she'd finally tracked him down, she knew exactly what form to take to lure him in for the kill. Now, Gramps found himself face to face with the fate he'd run from for so long and every ounce of his being was fighting against it.

It wouldn't do him any good. As he shrieked and flailed, he felt the teeth close in around his trapped member, knowing that it would soon be severed from his body. "This is the price you pay for your cowardice, fugitive..." Mandy whispered to him as she opened and closed her mandibles experimentally in front of his face. "Cowards do not get to pass their unfit seed on to poison the next generation. All they get to do is live in fear for their long and wasted lives until we find you. You've lead me a long chase, coward, but you must have known it would end this way eventually."

She wasted no further words on the screaming wreck in her grasp. Tucking in, she slowly and methodically set about the task of devouring his head until there was nothing left to devour. She'd made sure to dispose of his lower parts as well before he could finish his intended task. When she was finished, she dropped the headless body on the ground, and shifted back to her humanoid form. It would be useful in her next mission she thought. You see, in addition to shapeshifting, there's another special ability imparted to Mandy through the miracle of genetic engineering. As Tom, Bubbo and Shorty crept silently through the woods, the silence of their creeping was disturbed by the sound of splashing water and the giggling of young humans. "Turn on your translator and have a listen, it's really not so bad once you get over how alien it sounds. Come on, lets go take a closer look."

As the trio crept closer to the human noise, the dark and shimmering lake came into view. In it's moonlit water swam 5 young nudist campers who had chosen a very bad night to sneak out of camp for an unsupervised skinny dip. The nude crew consists of two boys, Tommy and Stu, and three girls Heather, Molly and Sabrina. Now, naturally, skinny dipping was no big deal for a bunch of kids attending a nudist camp. In an instant, Tom was revealed for all to see, and the kids instantly screamed and began to swim for their lives in the opposite direction. Unfortunately, Miss Stack still had her back turned to the alien, but she knew that something behind her had spooked the kids, and so she turned to investigate. Doubly unfortunate, she was definitely not prepared for the sight of a giant praying mantis, and unprepared for fight or flight in the face of such a thing, she instead chose to scream. Triply unfortunate, Tom was just as shocked at being seen as she was to see him, and, in his shock, he reacted on instinct, seizing her in his raptorial limbs, drawing her in close and feasting upon her head.

As Bubo and Shorty run to their allies aid, Tom spins around looking nervous and scared, with Miss Stack's half crushed head between his mandibles. Even as blood was pouring out of her mutilated skull and running in red rivers down her body, she continued to scream and kick in a vain effort to stave off the weird fate that had befallen her. "What happened!?" Bubo shouted. "We weren't supposed to reveal ourselves yet!" "Mmff mmfo!" Tom mumbled before realizing that he was talking with his mouth full. With a simple application of pressure, he bit a chunk off of Miss Stack's head, silencing her screams and her kicking quite abruptly. After slurping up a bit of the mush that had been the woman's cranium, he let the body drop and addressed his friends. "I don't know! The cloaking device just gave out! What kinda shoddy merchandise are you guys peddling!?"

"The cloaking devices are foolproof! Let me see that!" Bubo said, irate. While examining the device, he muttered. "Why'd you have to go and eat her head for? We didn't even get a chance to have any fun with her!" Looking somewhat sheepish, Tom replied "I panicked! I eat when I'm nervous..." Sighing, Bubo replied "Crap. Looks like this thing shorted out. Oh well. Lets go find those kids before they raise the whole town on us..."

Meanwhile, in the Bombarell household, Adam Bombarell was right in the middle of a refreshing shower, when his privacy was startled by a rapid banging on the bathroom door. Shutting off the water so he could hear, he called out, only to be answered by the frightened voice of his mother. "Adam, open this door right this instant!" Monica shouted. "Mom, I'm taking a shower, give me a minute!" "Now!" His frantic mother replied. Now nearly as nervous as his mother seemed to be, Adam shut off the water and reached for a towel. He barely had enough time to wrap it around his waist before his mom came barging through the door, seizing him by the arm and dragging him outside, still soaking wet and wearing nothing but a towel.

"Mom, whats going on! Where are we going?" Adam shouted. "There's no time for that, we have to go!" Monica said in answer, shoving Adam into the passenger seat of her van and taking off without another word. After several moments of frantic driving and utter silence, the van had placed a lot of space between the beautiful doctor and the house, and Adam again raised his questions. Frustrated and not quite thinking clearly, Monica replied "Something bad is going to happen at the house and we need to be far away when it does. That will have to do as an explanation for now, okay?"

Adam was quiet for a moment before he remembered why he'd been showering up in the first place. "Jennifer and Emily were coming over to study with me tonight! They'll be at the house any minute! We have to go back for them!"

"Out of the question!" Monica replied. "If we went back now, we'd all be de..." She cursed herself for letting her fear get the better of her usually much more agile mind. "We'll all be in big trouble. We have to get out of town for now, it's..."

"So your just going to let them die!?" Adam cried. Stabbed thusly in the heart, Monica pulls over by the side of the dirt road and produces her cell phone. "Look, I'll call the sherifs office, alright? They'll send a Deputy over to check on the house, and she'll protect your friends much better than we could. Then we'll have to be on our way though, understand?"

Adam watched his mother dialing the numbers for a few moments before his eyes drifted over to the door. After making a split second decision, the door flew open and Adam jumped out of the van and began making tracks in the dirt with his bare feet. Monica had reacted just fast enough to grab onto his towel in a vain attempt to stop his flight, but ended up holding onto his towel alone, and watching her son's naked butt disappear into the wilderness. At the forefront of the awesome assemblage was the Secretary of State, Maxine Adeline, a beautiful brunette with short hair and green eyes dressed in a very smart looking business suit. The base had been mobilized due to a mysterious radar blip that NASA had determined could potentially be a UFO coming in for a landing at precisely this spot. Nobody really took the notion too seriously but they couldn't afford to ignore the possibility either, so the base was put on watch anyway, with the Madame Secretary sent to the scene to represent the government in the event of a first contact.

Nobody really expected anything to come of it, so imagine everyone's surprise when an honest to god flying saucer touched down right on the spot NASA had predicted it would. Guns were raised and orders issued to hold as the door to the ship opened and a squad of Martians exited and began making their way towards the crowd. Stepping out to greet the visitors, Maxine began to make bland pleasantries, but they were cut short when the Martian leader whipped out a ray gun and fired upon her, burning her clothes to cinders. As Maxine looked down at her naked body in shock, the Martian seized her and used her as a human shield as his men opened fire on the troops as alien commandoes poured out of the UFO. The battle was quick and gruesome, and in the end, only the martians stood. The Martians and Maxine Adeline.

As his slimy alien cock tumbled out into the oxygen, Maxine knew the answer to her question, but the Martian felt the need to rub it in. "I sense that you are a person of some importance on earth!" The Martian said, his words being translated from the Gnardish Martian dialect. "If you wish to live, you will show me the proper respect and supplicate yourself before your new..."

"Just a moment, please." Maxine said. As the startled Martian watched in confusion, Maxine reached behind her head, undid something and then, to the astonishment of all, peeled off her skin, revealing a green, scaly skinned, but definitely female reptilian humanoid underneath. The Martian commandoes drew their guns immediately, but their leader stopped them at once before muttering "What are you?"

"You first." The reptile said. "I take it you're a Martian, but I would like to know your name, seeing as how you stripped me and killed all of my men and all that." The Martian thought for a moment before replying "...Thog... My name is Thog. I'm a Captain, and this was supposed to be a scouting mission. When we tripped your radar, we came down here to eliminate the witnesses."

"That was stupid of you." The Lizard replied. "If you didn't show up, we would have written you off as a glitch in the system. Now there's a whole dead platoon to account for."

"Excuse me, who are you?" Thog interrupted, losing his patience.

"I am a reptoid from a planet near a Star the humans call Sirius. We've been infiltrating this planet's human civilization for some time now, moving them into position for our final strike. I hope you don't plan on interfering, because that would end badly for you."

"Bah!" Thog spat. "My people have bee preparing for our war with the humans for ages! This planet will be ours!"

"Not likely." Maxine answered him, cooly. "You haven't even made it out of your own solar system, and you expect to make war against an intergalactic empire? I'd speak to a supervisor before I did that if I were you, Captain."

"You expect us to just back down!?" Thog shouted angrily.

"I expect you to realize the gravity of your situation." Maxine replied. "I'm working this side of the street, jack. Back off and find your own planet to pilfer!"

Grimacing, Thog turned and conferred with his men for a few moments before getting back to his scaly captive. "I will... confer with my superiors about this. You will come with us."

"I will do no such thing." Maxine replied. "I have better things to do with my time than be held captive by an incompetent captain who bungled a simple recon mission. Like, for instance, cleaning up your mess, so that the humans don't realize whats happened, because that would spoil the element of surprise for both of us now wouldn't it? Plus, my people would be most displeased if you kidnapped me."

"... Fine, but don't go far. This is far from over." Thog replied.

"Well, I'm not going to get very far without my skin." Maxine said.

Frustrated, Thog fumed. "Can't you just put it back on?"

"Not without mechanical assistance. And you don't look like you have one of my transformation pods lying around on your ship, do you?"

Grumbling again, Thog reached into his utility belt and pulled out a holographic image inducer and handed it to the reptoid. "Press the button at the top. It will cover you with the most recently stored image."

Wrapping the wristwatch like device around her wrist, Maxine pressed the button and was instantly covered with a hologram of her human disguise as it had appeared moments ago when the Martians took the picture... naked. "Great, this complicates things..." She mused.

"Yes, sorry none of my men were able to get a picture of you with your clothes on before we disintegrated them. I'm also sorry that our hologram technology is so primitive that any attempt to put on clothing would disrupt the image and reveal your true reptilian self. So, if you want to look like a human, I'm afraid your going to be stuck naked for a while. That shouldn't be too big a problem for a superior being such as yourself though, should it?"

Maxine gave Thog an icy stare and said "Your fly is open." Grumbling, Thog zipped up and returned to his ship. Just as the UFO disappeared, Maxine began to wonder about her next move. She'd have to call high command of course... and come up with a story to tell the human authorities... at least all of the witnesses were dead.

It did feel good to have her human disguise on again. She hid it well, but it was humiliating to be stripped down to her scales. At least now, when anybody looked at her, it would be those meaty mammalian hooters they'd be gawking at, not her lovely lizard lumps. As she continued to ruminate however, a voice in the near distance broke her from her solitude. Climbing out from under a pile of charred skeletons, a blonde haired female private came running towards the secretary. "So much for 'at least all of the witnesses are dead.'" Maxine thought.

"Madame secretary!" The private squeaked. "Private first class Tanya Toulard reporting for duty! What on Earth just happened ma'am!? What are we supposed to do now!? Are you all right!? Would you...uhm... like something to wear?"

"Oh cosmos, it's one of THOSE humans!" Maxine thought to herself. "All of that information is classified at this time, private." Which was true, mostly because she hadn't finished making up her explanations yet. "Just sit tight while I make a few calls... actually be a dear and fetch me a radio."

Tanya was about to comply when she stopped and looked at Maxine curiously. "Uhm... you sure you don't want to borrow my jacket or something? You don't want to be in your birthday suit when the president arrives, do you?"

"The President is NOT coming here, and as for the clothes... err... I'd rather not. They might be contaminated."

"Contaminated?" Tanya squeaked again.

"This is going to be a long night..." The Reptoid correctly deduced.

125111.content:
As the two clowns moved into town, the first house they happened across was the slumber party house. If Captain Bozo was interested in seeing and studying humans, he was certainly in for a pleasant surprise. The Comedic Commandoes moved silently through the woodland area surrounding the house and quickly set themselves up behind a tree where they could freely observe the unlucky inhabitants of the randomly selected house.

"Wow, that’s quite a nice selection." Gyro commented, gazing through one of the home's glowing windows. "I think we're going to have a lot of fun."

Bozo squints at the house and then turns to look at his subordinate in confusion. "How can you tell? I can't see a thing from here!"

Gyro sighs before replying "Sir, if I may?"

"May what?"

Without waiting for a response, Sgt Gyro slaps the Captain in the back of the head causing his eyes to jut out from their sockets like a living Tex Avery cartoon character. The Captain is about to protest indignantly when he realizes that his popped out eyes now act as binoculars granting him telescopic vision. "Oh... thank you sergeant. That particular bit of intelligence had... slipped my mind."

With his newly enhanced vision, Captain Bozo could now see as far as his companion, and what he saw caused his tongue to roll out of his mouth in a fashion every bit as cartoony as his bulging eyes. Through the window, he could see 5 girls, Liz, Pepper, Jackie, Carmen and Alison all dancing to the same rhythm (though some doing a better job of it than others.) In surprise, the young Captain blurts out "By the soiled trousers of Paglion! They're barely dressed! Do all humans go about in this manner?"

"Not as far as I know, sir." The Sergeant replies, coolly. "I believe we've stumbled upon some kind of adolescent social gathering. Their lack of clothing implies that these humans are all fairly close with each other. Humans are normally reluctant to be this bare in front of strangers. Even though there's 9 of them, they all appear to be very young, and we've clearly got them with their guards down. Not to mention the element of surprise."

"9 humans? Where do you get 9 from, sergeant? I only see 4."

"Adjust your eyes, sir."

After a few moments of twisting his own eyeballs, Captain Bozo shifts around the visual spectrum, hitting upon night vision, infra-red and then varying degrees of X-Ray Vision until finally the walls of the house become as transparent to him as thin glass. With the walls stripped away, he can easily make out the other girls, Veronica in her chair, Crystal on the couch, Ayita on the floor and Rebecca upstairs taking a shower in the bathroom. Licking his ruby lips, Bozo continues to play with his ocular enhancements until all the girl's clothing has faded away, leaving everyone at the party as naked as Crystal, Alison and Rebecca in the Captain's eyes.

After a few moments, watching these beautiful young girls dancing or lounging around in the nude became too much for the novice officer. He wanted to have his fun and he wanted to have it now. Reaching for his weapon, the Captain began to rise, motioning for the Sergeant to follow him.

"I don't think that’s a good idea, sir."

"Why not? You said it yourself, they're small, inexperienced and we have all the strategic advantages on our side. Why not take them now?"

"Because they have one tactical advantage on THEIR side, sir. Numbers."

The Captain couldn't believe his enormous ears. It was his turn to roll his gruesome, cartoonish eyes. "Sergeant, I may have to report you to high command for cowardice. Do you honestly think any of those fragile creatures could pose a threat to the two of us?"

Maintaining professional composure, Gyro replies, "No, sir. But they are a lot for us to handle. If we storm the house, we risk losing a few of the humans in the confusion. We can't be every place at once after all. It only takes one human to alert the authorities, and then the cover for the whole operation is blown. Our people have been conducting these harvests in secret now for ages, do you really want to ruin all of that by jumping the gun on your first field op?"

After a moment's consideration, Captain Bozo chose to yield. "Alright then, Sergeant. What do you propose we do? Call for backup?"

"No, sir." Gyro replied. "I have a better idea."

With that, Gyro approaches his commanding officer and begins to push the buttons on his shirt. Each time he touched a button, it made a sound not unlike the striking of a letter key on an old type writer. After he was through with this, Gyro simply touched Bozo's belt buckle, pressing it as if it were a button. Bozo's head craned back and opened up like a pez dispenser. Printing noises began to emit from his open mouth as a colorful flier slowly made its way out of his body and into Gyro's hands. Upon seeing what his subordinate had written, Bozo smiled. "Do you really think they'll fall for it?"

"I think so, sir. They don't look all that bright to me." The Sergeant replied, making his way stealthily towards the front door.

"How can you tell?"

"Experience, sir. Don't worry, you'll get it eventually."

Stopping only briefly to pluck an adhesive booger from his bright red nose, Gyro attaches the flier to the front door and rings the bell before disappearing back to his observational spot. A few moments later, Liz emerges from the house and quickly looks around before grabbing the flier and heading back inside.

The clowns, for their part, simply watch and wait.

Inside, Liz returns to the group, flier in hand and a confused look on her face. Crystal is the first to speak up when she returns. "Wh-who was it?" she said, nervously. The cute Asian girl was of course, completely naked from head to toe as part of an initiation hazing ritual. When the bell rang, Crystal nearly jumped out of her smooth, bare skin, frightened that her so called friends were going to expose her to the lustful gaze of a stranger.

"I'm not sure..." Liz replied holding out the flier for everyone to see. "Looks like they left an advertisement though, 'The Circus Horrificus.' Does that ring any bells with anybody?" It didn't, but upon hearing the word 'Circus' Alison quickly bounced her way across the room so she could get a closer look at the flier. After giving it a once over, her eyes grew wide with wonder and she began to tug on the end of Liz's negligee while hopping from one bare foot to the other and begging "OhpleaseLiz! Come on! Let'sgotothecircus! It'll be sooooooo much fun! They'll be clowns and lions and tigers and cute little ponies! I've always wanted a pony! Do you think they'd let us ride the ponies!?"

Practically everyone in the room rolled their eyes. They were all a little old to be as enthralled with the circus as Alison seemed to be, but truth be told, Veronica, Ayita, Crystal and even Pepper were getting a little bored at the party. If it wasn't already so late, they might actually consider the circus a decent solution to their boredom, but as it stood, there was very little enthusiasm in the room for that idea. Alison kept on going however. "And look you guys, it's totally free for one night only! We wouldn't even have to pay to get in! Plus...HOLY SHIT! It says here it's clothing optional!"

That got a stunned silence out of everybody, Alison included. It was Jackie who first spoke up. "Whoever heard of a clothing optional circus? This must be some kind of joke." "Yeah, a pretty fucking weird Joke too." Carmen was quick to add.

"Actually..." Pepper began, her delicate fingers adjusting her glasses as she thought this through "Actually... it makes sense. Isn't there a nudist camp around here somewhere? That would explain why a circus would come all the way out here to do a show. They must cater specifically to a naturist clientele."

Alison's eyes lit up at the idea. It was as if Pepper had just proved conclusively that the Easter Bunny was not only real, but standing outside shitting out golden eggs with her name on them. As Alison began to beg Liz with renewed vigor, a devilish smile came to Veronica's face. Not long ago, Veronica had set her cousin Sara up with a job at the local nudist camp, knowing full well that the whole experience would be incredibly embarrassing for her. She had hoped to pay Sara a visit this weekend to observe her handiwork, rub it in, and maybe even take some photographs that she could use to haunt her cousin for the rest of her life. "You know, this party is starting to take a turn for the dull. Maybe Alison's got the right idea."

As Liz looked around the room, she wasn't sure from the looks on the other girl's faces whether or not they would support Veronica's suggestion or not. All eyes were on her.

Two of the strangest creatures ever to set foot in the miles of wooded lands surrounding New Bern are slowly making their way through the dark forested night. They are from different worlds, and travel on a ship full of alien thugs and criminals.
One looks vaguely like Peter Lorre in a funhouse mirror, with almost purplish skin. His head is huge, but he seems to get around well enough on his six strong, stubby limbs. One of his four hands is missing, in its place is a retractable robotic hand. The other being looks something like a reptilian pelican, wearing an eyepatch.

Neither is any brighter than the average human, but benefit from superior technology. They wear ragtag assortments of combat gear, and are also head-to-toe inside “plasma pods” (advanced otherworldly forms of our crude hazmat suits). As long as they aren’t doing anything that might require a large energy-draw, the two are practically invisible to most Earth creatures. Their presence might register with some of the lower life-forms, but not with this world’s highest life forms, the “Hu-Mans” that swarm the planet. Thus, with their plasma pods both protecting them from our feverishly living environment, and cloaking them in a sort of stealth-mode, the two nervously venture on through the loud, summer insect chorus of the Texas woods at night:

[Note: Their audio-gear allows them to communicate despite their differing races, and all that registers to human ears is a smallish electronic “popping”-sound after each aliens’ comments.]

“I’m telling you, Ywloon, I just want to stay in the ship until we’re off this slimy rock! [pop]”, says the large-headed mauve-skinned alien.

“Lygax, for the last time: I’m all with you on this run. We’ll play it strictly proto. Just ‘recon and move on’ is all I’m planning on doing. Circle the ship and secure a perimeter. I promise. Just...indulge me a bit. You know how I sometimes get those ‘good’-feelings? [pop]”, says the almost beaked-looking space raider.

“No-NO! Ywloon, I am staying within 10 clicks of the ship! It’s too dangerous on this festering damned shithole! That’s why so few space slavers ever venture this far out from the Galactic Alliance. You know that as well as I do. Let’s just protect the ship and get back off and away from this mudball. That’s all Captain Glorph is expecting us to do! [pop]”, implores the four-armed creature with the big ugly head, even as he hesitantly follows the storklike creature deeper into the brush.

“Come on, Lygax”, coaxes the stork-like reptile, “Where’s your sense of adventure? I’m telling you; on the way down I thought I saw something! Something which should by my calculations be just over there or so. Trust me, I’m with you 100%. Trying to wrangle up some humans from a herd is just too dangerous a risk most of the time. The beasts tend to be highly violent, though easily put down, when necessary. Still, they’re quite fond of their crude weapons, and if even one of their metallic shots manages to pierce these suits, we could be finished. But- unless I was suffering a touch of space-madness, I could have sworn I saw what looked like a whole enclosure of the most valuable human breeding stock, their newly ovulating females, naked and playing in the waters and resting on the grasses. [pop]”

Finally stopping in his tracks, big-headed Lygax yells, “You’re utterly mad! No! I’m not going another step out of the prescribed circle. What if they decide to leave us? You heard First Mate Ngumpt in the galley two parsecs ago: they’d love to cut some payload. What if he meant US?!? [pop]”.

But Ywloon the storklike lizard has already advanced on deeper into the thick plantlife of the forest, out of sight. Suddenly, Ywloon calls back, “Lygax! Come quick! You’ve got to see this! It’s just as I’d thought I’d seen on the screen briefly before our crash landing. They’re apparently sleeping. I’m telling you, if we play this right, you and I, and everyone else on the starship Jezebel will be able to retire from this hard life like Intergalactic Kings! [pop]”.

Cursing and grumbling that, “This is what the drone is for! Not us!”, Lygax lumbers into the thick foliage and soon arrives at the outer clearing surrounding a fenced-in perimeter. Standing proudly by, long beaklike maw curled in a sort of wicked ‘grin’, stands the tall Ywloon.

A bitter argument erupts between the two unsavory aliens as to whether they should shanghai a few of the hu-man female encampment for shipboard fun while under repairs, or simply let the whole thing go and report back to their vessel as if nothing happened. The air pops with the back-and-forth of their insults and arguments.

Unfortunately, neither Ywloon or Lygax had anticipated such a heated debate, nor that some of the hu-mans might be more delicately attuned to certain frequencies. Looking up, they are mortified to see that one of the young hu-mans is staring at them, a look of total terror on her face, right across from them inside the primitive fence!

“Okay then, what about just this one? Look at her! She’s adorable! [pop]”, argues Ywloon.

Staring at them, stock still in utter incomprehension, is beautiful, nude little 13 year old camper Trixie. Such is her total befuddlement at what she is seeing just outside the fenced in enclosure, staring back in at her, she still hasn’t thought to hide her ripe naked bod, or even find the air to scream.

“Nononono! See! This is why I hate going on maneuvers with you, Ywloon! [pop]”, complains the worried-looking Lygax, “You never fail to get us into deep space doo-doo. [pop]”. A look of strain appears on the overlarge face of Lygax, as his deep pinkish hue goes full purple concentrating his mental powers on the now stock still young hu-man, essentially ‘holding’ her in place while they hash out how to best handle the situation at hand.

Still pleading his case, Ywloon implores, “Just her then! Look at her! Come on, Lygax, stop from the straining for a sec and LOOK at her! You’ve got to admit, she’s a boinkable little cub. Multiple holes, trainability and multibly orgasmic, it’s no wonder they go for 20,000 Star Notes in New Bostonia! Come on! Have some fun with her while the ship is under repairs! That’s all I’m asking. How long has it been for you? That space port in Alglonkwa with those hairy Massamoanians? Now look at this soft, flexible little prize. Come on, Lygax. She’s already seen us! We might as well bring her in! [pop]”.

Lygax does take a moment to allow his right eye to pop open and gaze hungrily at the utterly fuckable female hu-man cub’s fine assets. His distraction is all it takes for the terrified teen to breath-in and begin to scream for all she’s worth.

“Oh, see! Now you’ve done it! We might as well snatch up the whole encampment and return to the ship as heroes, Lygax [pop]”, advises Ywloon, who has already used his stun-gun on the hu-man, knocking her out cold on the other side of the fence.

No longer having to fixate his mental energies on the hu-man breeder, Lygax is furious with Ywloon, “I just wish for once you would try to think. 125322211211.content:
"Rise and shine partner!"

"Wha-tha-who!?" Justin said aloud, genuinely startled by the voice inside his head.

"Calm down. It's me, Groot! From last night. You remember, don't you?"

"Err... yeah. Sorry. How could I forget?" Justin replied, trying very hard to think his responses without speaking them or moving his lips.

"That's okay. Come on, let’s go get some breakfast!"

With that, Justin felt his body move without his consent, tossing off the covers and hopping right out of bed. "Wait...wait...what are you doing!?" Justin's mind screamed. The alien didn't give him a chance to get dressed! What was he some kind of idiot?

"What?" Groot said without stopping, or yielding control. He had already made it all the way down the hall and to the stairs. As he descended, Justin continued. "You can't just walk around the house like this! We have to get dressed first!"

"Oh, don't be silly." Groot replied as he finished with the stairs and turned the corner, heading for the kitchen. "There will be time for that later, and I KNOW that we're both hungry NOW!"

Before Justin could protest any further, Groot entered the kitchen, yawning loudly. There, waiting on the table was a hearty breakfast of bacon, eggs and toast, and not far away, waiting near the sink with her back turned to the new arrivals was Justin's mother, Karen, wearing a pink bathrobe.

"Good morning sleepy head!" She cooed. "You're up early. Usually I have to go up there and drag you out of bed. What happened?"

Neither Justin nor Groot answered. Instead, Justin's body simply pulled out the chair and began to stuff it's face with food, paying little attention to the silver wear provided, and choosing instead to gobble the eggs up with his hands. While still chewing on his food, Groot said "Good food!"

"Why thank you honey, that's so... AAAAAAAAAHHH!"

Karen had finally turned around, and she nearly broke a dish when she saw her son sitting at the kitchen table, butt naked from head to toe, and eating like some kind of savage. In short order, Justin was being yelled at. The word "crazy" was thrown around quite a bit, along with orders and threats of all kinds. Groot was confused. "Who is this woman?" he asked from inside Justin's head.

"That's my mom! Jeez, don't you know anything!?"

"How in Golgon do you expect me to know? All of you humans look alike to me! Why is she yelling at us?"

Justin was flabbergasted. He was starting to think he was better off with the Captain. "She's yelling at us because we just walked into the kitchen with our balls hanging out!"

Groot seemed alarmed at this, and pulled his chair out a bit so he could get a good look at Justin's genitals. "I have no idea what you’re talking about. Your testicles still appear to be safely encased within your scrotum. It must be something else..."

"She's screaming because I'm naked you idiot! She's my mom! She's not supposed to see my dick!"

"Ahh, some kind of earth custom then?"

"YES! Here on earth, we don't just walk around the house buck naked!"

"Ahh, I see the problem. Don't worry, I'll handle this."

With that, Groot turned to look Justin's mom right in the eye, and said "Shut up, mother."

In Justin's mind, Groot was very pleased with himself. "See, problem solved."

"Oh, now you've done it...!" Justin replied. His mother had gone silent, but now her face was turning red. Justin hadn't seen her this mad since she saw his last report card.

"You... you little...!" She muttered, but before she could explode, Tina, still piloted by the alien captain, entered the room. He/she smiled instantly, aware at once of exactly what had happened.

"Tina, get out of the kitchen!" Karen cried. "Your brother's lost his mind!"

"I'll say..." Tina's voice said as the alien ad libbed. "He's doing that nudist thing he was talking about, right?"

"...What?" Karen blurted out, flabbergasted.

While the Captain distracted Justin's mom, Groot continued his internal dialogue with Justin.

"So, what do you usually do after breakfast?"

"Well, I usually wash myself up and head off for school. Course, I'm usually DRESSED already, but..."

"Okay, good. That's a pretty good excuse to get out of this house and away from your mother creature. She really is very annoying."

With that, Justin's body rose from the chair and headed over to the sink. Karen had left the water running, so Groot simply shoved his hands into the water and splashed it up on himself, washing the food from his face, wetting his hair and splashing some water under his arm pits before heading for the back door.

"Wait, what are you doing!?" Justin's mind screamed.

"Oh, right, of course... how foolish of me." The alien replied before turning right around. He went right back to the sink, scooped up some water and proceeded to scrub his butt before giving his cock and balls a quick rub down. "There. Squeaky clean." he said at last before rushing back out the door as Justin continued to scream in protest inside his brain.

Sometime later, Justin's nude body was walking slowly but surely down the long dirt road that lead to his school. The body was mostly dry now, but the voices inside were still arguing up a storm.

"I'm telling you, we need to turn back around, head back to the house and get dressed! I can't go to school naked! It's not going to work!" Justin argued.

"I don't see why not." Groot replied. "Your mother did scream a lot, but your mother isn't going to be at the school. Why would anyone else give you any problems?"

"Because... YOU’RE NOT ALLOWED TO WALK AROUND NAKED IN PUBLIC, YOU STUPID ALIEN!"

"Hey now, no need for name calling!" Groot wasn't exactly tops at HIS school back home either, so those remarks were starting to hurt. "I thought you said you just couldn't let your mother see your dick?"

"That's right, and I'm not supposed to show it to anybody!"

This left Groot more than a little puzzled. "Then.. how do you reproduce? In the dark?"

"Well... yeah, I mean sometimes... but you can show it to your girlfriend or your wife or whatever, just not in a public place...! That's illegal!"

"You humans are very very strange creatures." Groot decided. "Nevertheless, we've come too far, and I'm not turning us around now."

"Great, just great. Well, when they lock us away in the funny farm, don't say I didn't warn you. Fuck, might as well not even go to school now, we're never going to get there in time at this rate."

"I can fix that." Groot said, twisting Justin's facial muscles into a smug grin. Without any further warning, Justin's eyes went black, his skin tinted green, and his fingers grew to an inhuman length. With this transformation complete, Groot took off running like a madman, kicking up a cloud of dust in his wake as traveled all the way to Justin's school at superhuman speed.

When the two came to a stop across the street from the school, Justin was so amazed by what had just happened that he almost forgot about his predicament. "I...I didn't know you could do that!"

"There's lots of stuff that I can do that you don't know!" Groot said proudly. "Now, come on, let’s get you to school. You seem pretty ignorant, so this should do you good."

"I keep telling you, they're not going to let us walk around like this!"

"I think you worry too much."

"Fine, go ahead, see what happens."

And he did. Casual as can be, Groot walked Justin's naked body across the street, past honking cars and laughing students just arriving outside the school. Justin was absolutely mortified, and despite the fact that Groot was in charge at the moment, Justin's embarrassment showed through in the form of a full body blush. Noticing all of the commotion, Groot decided it would be best to go in through the back entrance, and so he and Justin made their way past the rear gate and into the school parking lot. There, just getting out of his car was Principal Wormkins, looking shocked, horrified, and eventually enraged.

"My, he certainly is using a lot of profanity..." Groot thought.

"Yeah, that's nothing. Wait till he calls my mom." Justin retorted.

"Oh, that will never do..." Groot said with an air of finality. With that, his eyes went black again, even as the rest of his body stayed the same, and he looked Wormkins right in the eyes. Much to Justin's astonishment, the anger and outrage quickly melted away, and suddenly, Wormkins seemed to forget what he was doing. After looking puzzled for a few moments, he smiled at the boy, waved, and told him to get to class before heading into the building like nothing had happened.

"What... what the hell was that!?" Justin queried.

"Hypnotic suggestion. I was always good at that, even back in school." Groot said, with great pride. "It works especially well on lower life forms. I guess you humans qualify."

"Great." Justin replied, glumly. "Well, you got lucky, but you can't just mind zap everybody who gives us a problem... can you?"

12532222112211212.content:
"SMAAAAAAAAAAAL TOWN TEXAS!" The Doctor yelled, leaping out of the TARDIS into the the quiet main street of New Bern. "I love small towns!"
"I thought you said it was an awful small town." The confused Rory said, walking out with Amy.
"I did! I did awful small town, but great small town. Little shops everywhere, everybody knows everybody! So empty! So quiet! So...homey." The Doctor began looking wildly around. "I wonder if there's a farmer? Small towns always have a farmer!"
"Doctor!" The unimpressed Amy said. "This place is boring, why did we come here again?"
"Come here?" The Doctor paused for a moment before realizing. "Right! There was a meteor here, that hit tonight,...er last night."
The Doctor looked up at the sky, it was bright an sunny with a crisp mid-fall breeze. Based on how the light was and the sound of the birds, it was mid-morning. The TARDIS missed the mark by a few hours.
"So what do we do?" Rory asked.
Before The Doctor could answer, they were interrupted by a police women.
"Can I help you folks?"
The Doctors eyes went wide with excitement. "A small town copper!" he said energetically suddenly shaking her hand. "Great to meet you! I'm The Doctor!"
"Angie Summers." The police women said, taking her hand away from the excited man. "You aren't from around here are you?"
"No!" The Doctor said. "We are visiting from...um..."
"England!" Rory said quickly.
"Scotland." Amy corrected.
"uh...OK." Angie said. "Well you folks be careful. There's some strange things going on in this town."
"Strange things? I like strange things. Strange things are what I'm good at...how strange? A meteor crashing strange?" The Doctor seemed to go from happy to serious with a few seconds.
"Meteor?" Angie said confused. "I don't know about that, but right now one of the local kids is missing. A teenage girl called Pepper, vanished into the woods last night."
"What do you mean vanished?" Amy asked.
Angie shrugged. "It's weird. She was at a slumber party, and according to one of her friends the girl-Pepper- went for a walk but when she came back she tried to have sex with any girl she saw. Supposedly she had no luck so she ripped off all her clothes and streaked butt naked into the woods and she hasn't turned up."
The three blinked in confusion.
"Stripped naked?" Rory said suddenly and Amy whacked him upside the head. "What? I'm just curious."
"I met you are." Amy grumbled.
The Doctor however shushed them. "You humans and your modesty, take off a shirt and suddenly it's the end of the world."
Angie stared at him. "Us humans?"
"Uh..I mean Texans. Yes that's it." The Doctor smiled. "Anyway you must be busy, Amy, Rory let's go."
The three took off down the street and Angie watched them go.
"I really need to get a transfer." She grumbled.

1253222222211.content:
The dull white glow of lit computer screens fills a dark, windowless room located several miles below the surface of Mars. Around these screens, Martian technicians work feverishly, sorting data and sending reports to other rooms just like this one hidden throughout the mighty red planet. The work they do is feverish, hurried, and not at all the norm. Tonight is a night of great importance for Mars. The planet's supreme leader lays dead, his ship only now returning from a savage alien world, their nearest neighbor, Earth, long watched and long feared by the Martian inhabitants. Today, those fears were justified... or so it would seem.

The sounds of feverish technical work steadily die down as the heavy security doors swoosh open behind the ring of workers. Heralded by two elite Gnard warriors, General Skulk, now acting dictator of Mars, enters the room and all of the technicians immediately rise to salute their leader. With a wave of his hand, the General accepts their respect and orders them back to work. Immediately, the technicians do as they are told and soon the room is once again alive with the sound of technical tedium. Flanked by his two bodyguards, Skulk approaches one of the technicians and takes his place behind his chair, looking over his shoulder at the data spilling across his screen.

*All dialogue translated from Martian (Gnardish dialect)


"Report." The words escape the General's mouth without apparent effort or concern. The technician he hovers over is quick to reply "We've intercepted the Supreme Leader's ship, sir. It will never make it back to Mars. The official reports regarding its destruction in the Earthling's New York City will not be challenged."

What passes for a smile comes to the General's lipless face. His grand deception was working perfectly. For years the "Earth Problem" had been a divisive issue on the red planet, causing the Martian peoples to divide themselves up into two distinct cultural tribes, the peace loving Paeecs, and the Gnards, the tribe of war. The Paeec's had always advocated a peaceful and open approach to establishing relations with life on Earth, while the Gnards, noting mankind's own warlike tendencies, had long sought an aggressive approach to the "Earth Problem" advocating the total enslavement of the human race at best, and it's utter extinction at the very worst.

Despite the fact that the Martians designed and stockpiled an arsenal of fantastic weaponry more than plentiful and deadly enough to end any threat the Earth and its inhabitants might pose, the Paeecs had always applied just enough political pressure to keep the Gnards and their warmongering at bay. Now, with the much beloved Supreme Leader, a Paeec himself, dead in the wake of his much lauded first contact mission, the peaceful opposition has finally fallen silent, allowing General Skulk and his Gnard followers to take the lead in pushing for war. There were still however, a few loose ends that needed tying up. Speaking again, Skulk would ask, "New York City. Everything there went according to plan?"

"Yes sir." The technician replied. "The bomb our commandoes planted went off as planned. Human news agencies are blaming international terrorism, as expected. Any investigation into the matter by the Paeecs will lead to nothing once we’ve decapitated the human high command during the invasion."

"The Paeecs won't be asking any questions. Not for some time. When that time comes, they'll only be able to find the answers we've prepared for them. That leaves only one last issue. How goes operation Quiet Night?"

Bringing up real time footage on his screen, the technician shows his General what he seeks, the small scout ship landing on the outskirts of New Bern Texas, where the treacherous Gnards had misdirected their "beloved" supreme leader. Of all the possible outcomes, this was surely the best: the leader and all witnesses dead on arrival. Everything that followed had been child's play. Experimentation on live human subjects had always been forbidden by the moral majority on Mars, but now, it was an essential part of the war effort, and a convenient way to remove the only other witnesses to the true circumstances of the Supreme Leader's death.

"Everything is going as projected sir. Our ships easily slipped past all forms of Earthly detection technology, and the ship's signal jammers are keeping the targeted humans from spreading the news of their discovery. Our science agent, Lux Or, and the commando team we provided have just disembarked. They are currently scanning the perimeter and awaiting your order to proceed."

It is all that the General can do to suppress an evil laugh. Killing the Supreme Leader had been a necessary sacrifice, for the good of Mars and its future safety and security, but the idea of a pack of miserable Earth vermin killing one of his people, let alone their honored leader, was enough to move him to spiteful contempt. They would be appropriately rewarded for the part they played in his little game, Lux Or would see to that. With a nod, the General would give the order. After relaying the order to Lux, the technician would look back up at his General and proclaim "Operation: Quiet Night is underway."

12532222222111.content:
--Outside New Bern Texas, Earth--

Dilbert Smith was now back in his home, staring at the telephone in his hand and trying to figure out why he wasn't getting a signal. As he scratched his head in befuddlement, his daughter stood behind him, still clad in only a towel, which she clutched to her front with both hands leaving her still wet and shiny rear end completely exposed. She was bouncing up and down on her heels waiting for her father to finish with the phone so she could call her boyfriend and tell him what happened. Her eyes were wide and bright and her body was so filled with energy that she couldn’t help herself. When she couldn't contain her excitement any more, she tapped her father on the shoulder, causing her towel to slip, briefly revealing her right nipple before a quick adjustment had it hidden again. "You done with the phone yet, Pa?" Christina said in a sing song voice "You been hittin those buttons for an awful long time."

Distracted, Dilbert barely acknowledges his daughter as he responds "It aint workin sweetie. I've been trying to get through to the Sherriff’s office for ten goddamn minutes! Wendy, come in here! The phone's still dead!" Soon, Dilbert's loving wife Wendy enters the kitchen with two cell phones in her hands. "The Cells are out too! I tried to call my mother a minute ago and I couldn't get through either." Excited that she had something to contribute to the conversation, Christina pipes in with "Oh, my cell was out too! I tried calling Jerry on it before and I just thought I forgot to charge it again!"

"Christina!" Wendy exclaimed in a disapproving tone, "What are you still doing walking around the house with your fanny hanging out! Have you lost your sense girl? March your butt right up those stairs young lady and get dressed!" Before Christina could respond, Jimmy comes storming down the stairs with his laptop in his hands, while proclaiming loudly, "Hey everybody, the internet's down! Think that alien ship might have been radioactive or something?"

As the Smith family exchanged worried glances and murmurs of panicky pseudo-science regarding radioactivity gleaned from the many terrible movies they'd all consumed over the years, Jimmy glances his sister's way, and blushes when he realizes that she hadn't bothered to change out of her birthday suit yet. Before anyone could notice the second peak he snuck, a loud crash at the front door grabs everyone's attention. Amidst gasps of shock and surprise, the room is soon filled with Martian commandoes, small, green skinned creatures with bulbous, veiny heads, skull-like faces, large eyes and skinny frames contained within green body armor and a glass bubble surrounding their heads. In each of their clawed hands, they carried a ray gun, with each nozzle aimed squarely at a member of the Smith family. And just their luck, Pa had left his shotgun in the living room.

The Martian Squad leader barks orders, but they are soon drowned out by the sound of actual barking, as Rex, the family dog comes charging into the room to attack the intruders. Before he can pounce on any of them however, one of the commandoes responds with breakneck speed, targeting and firing with his gun, the death ray flying forth and searing the flesh from the dog's body in mere seconds, leaving little more than a smoking pile of bones, guts, fur and blood in its wake. Jimmy cries out in sorrow as he watches his dog being barbequed right in front of him. Tears in his eyes, he charges at one of the Martians, even as his father tries to reach out and stop him. As Jimmy raises the laptop over his head, preparing to bring it crashing down on the fragile looking glass bubble that protected the head of the Martian who had killed his pet, one of the commandoes responds no less quickly than the first, striking Jimmy with a shrink ray. Their commander, Lux Or, wanted the humans alive after all. The Smith family watched in horror as their youngest member quickly shrank out of his clothes emerging only moments later, less than three inches tall, and naked as the day he was born. Fittingly, his mother snatches him up from the floor, weeping and holding him close to her chest for protection.

When the Martians once again advance menacingly, the Smiths give themselves up, with Dilbert and Christina both raising their hands over their heads, and, when Christina raises her arms, of course, her towel drops to the floor for one last time, causing her lovely breasts and still damp bush to spring into view. Within moments, the Smith family is marched out of their home single file, with Dilbert in the front, followed by Wendy, holding her tiny, naked son to her chest, and Christina bringing up the rear. As they march out of the house and towards the landed space craft, Christina could swear she heard the aliens behind her laughing and cracking jokes to one another as they repeatedly poked her in the ass with their ray guns, less it seemed to get her to move faster, and more for their own amusement. As they departed, one of the commandoes left behind an incendiary device that would start a blaze to reduce the house to ashes. In the eyes of the rest of the world, the Smith family was gone, claimed in their home one night by an unexplained fire.

When they finally reached the ship, they were marched up the landing ramp and huddled into a laboratory. There, Dilbert and Wendy were relieved of their clothing and the entire family was shoved into a jail cell where they were instructed to sit on a cold metal bench. When they did so, they were shocked when mechanical shackles reached out from the wall and snagged their wrists, pulling their arms back and holding their hands behind their backs. Wendy was so shocked that she actually dropped Jimmy, and, unable to catch him in her hands, she did her best to catch her tiny falling son... right between her legs. And there the Smith family sat, naked and cold on a metal bench behind metal bars that seemed decidedly low tech for aliens so advanced. Jimmy, for his part was not bound by Martian chains, but found himself embarrassingly entangled in his mother's pubic hair.


It occurred to Jimmy that in his shrunken state, he could slip right through the bars, but that probably wouldn't stop the Martian guards watching over them from stepping on him once he got through. Before Jimmy could work through that tiny hole in his tiny escape plan, the Martian science officer, Lux Or graced the family with his presence. Standing before the family, with nothing between them now but metal bars, the Martian scientist spoke through a device of his own invention intended to bridge the language gap between man and Martian.

"Greetings Earthlings," He began, "Can you understand my words?" When each member of the family nodded in turn, Lux nodded and continued "Excellent. Though I do not foresee much use for this device in the coming days, one cannot overlook the possibility that we may have to communicate with you people on occasion. For this reason, I think it's important that we maintain a healthy dialogue throughout your stay here, simply to work out any potential problems with my design. I am Lux Or, chief expeditionary science officer of the Martian Army and one of my planet's top experts in the field of theoretical human biology. Today, we will be putting much of my theoretical work into practice. I'm certain that you all have questions, so please, by all means ask away before we get down to business."

Given free rein to speak, the words came fast and furious. Dilbert shouting at the alien to let them go, Jimmy doing his best to back up his dad, Christina loudly asking for some kind of clothing (whether or not she was protesting too much was debatable, even to her. In her mind, she was sure that she wanted to be any place but here, but something about the weirdness and danger of it all combined with her total exposure and vulnerability... it was making her body kind of hot..) but Wendy, with tears in her eyes, asked with the most passion and humility that her son be returned to normal size.

Lux Or was quick to strike down most of their questions. Of course the Smith's weren't going anywhere. They were now the property of the Martian military, to be disposed of when they had outlived their usefulness, but never set free. Clothing was equally out of the question. Considering the invasiveness of the procedures Lux intended to inflict upon the poor naked humans, attending to their meaningless sense of modesty was impractical and frankly the farthest thing from Lux's mind. As he saw the looks on the human's faces when he issued his answers however, Lux quickly decided that he enjoyed watching their nude bodies squirm. Wendy's question did have some merit however. The Shrink ray had never been tried on a human being before, and it was interesting to see that it had only shrunk the boy's body and nothing else. It might be informative to see if the boy could be re-bigulated, and most of the tests he intended to conduct were designed to be used on normal sized humans anyway. On the other hand, Lux Or is kind of a prick, and leaving the boy tiny and helpless for the remainder of his life has an appeal all its own...

1253222222211111.content:
"What are you going to do with us!?" Christina shouted, struggling desperately against her bonds.

"Silence, Earthling! If you think your shouting will accomplish anything aside from exacerbating my anger, then you are sadly mistaken!"

It was true. Lux Or was growing weary of their constant complaining. He didn't mind the screaming. He had virtually no sympathy or compassion for these pitiful lower life forms. But it WAS growing annoying. It wasn't so much the sound as it was the banal subject matter they chose for conversation. "Let us go!" "What are you going to do with that!?" "Don't hurt me!" "Ahhhh!" Not an original thought or interesting notion in their hard little heads. This whole experimentation process would be so much less tedious if his subjects weren't so dull.

Then, a thought occurred to him, and that dangerous smile came back to Lux Or's face. As the two Earthlings continued to shout at him, he called for another one of his experimental weapons, this one very similar in design to his memory eraser. The only difference being that this ray gun comes equipped with a thought projector, allowing Lux Or to replace the memories he takes away with new ones of his own creation, essentially allowing him to reprogram any human being at will... if it works. It could just turn them into vegetables. "Oh well." The Alien thought "All for science!"

With that, he opened fire on the nude and bound teens, bathing their bodies in a flickering blue light. They screamed at first, their eyes blinking rapidly in response to the strange light, but eventually they settled down and started to relax as the layers of their minds melted away into soft clay for Lux to remold in any manner he chose. With a smile, he began to construct for the humans an elaborate alternate history of their lives. They would no longer remember their life on Earth. Where they lived, their friends at school, even their parents. It was all gone. Instead, they would now believe that they had both been abandoned as young children, and rescued by the benevolent Martian scientist Lux Or. He raised and educated the two of them on Mars, treating them like prized pets and using them as laboratory assistants and occasionally test subjects, which neither of them ever minded. They just loved to be helpful, and they loved Lux Or like loyal little puppy dogs.

When the process was complete, Lux Or turned off the gun and hid it within his cloak. Within moments, the two humans began to slip out of their trance-like state and look around with mild confusion. There to greet Lux Or on the red carpet, accompanied by his own guards, is General Skulk, Supreme Dictator of Mars.

"Hail Mars!" Lux Or shouts, saluting his superior.

"All hail!" The General replies.

Smiling, Lux turns to his captives and commands them, "We are in the presence of the ruler of all Mars! Show your leader the proper respect!"

"Very well. It's not like we don't have enough firepower to do things the old fashioned way." The General said. "I assume everything went according to plan?"

We collected DNA samples from the parents and the children, so if need be the parents can be resurrected for future experimentation, but I don't really foresee the need. We'll have all the test subjects we need very soon."

"Indeed." The dictator smiled. "We fly tomorrow at dawn. Tell me... this brainwashing effect, can it be reversed?"

"Oh yes!" Lux Or responded eagerly. "Absolutely. And the brainwashing process should be even easier the second time, if my theories are correct. Why do you ask?"

"I would like to speak to the real Christina and Jimmy one last time before I wash my hands of them forevermore."

"Of course." The General did as the scientist advised, and now at last, he was ready to speak to his captives.

"Today is a day that has been a long time coming, a day I have long thought inevitable. There are those on Mars who once disagreed with me, and never in all of my life have I taken less joy in being right. You do realize that you had a chance, don't you? Speak up, what are your names!"

Sputtering to answer, the two nude earthlings gave up their names all to quickly. The General continued.

"Christina and Jimmy. Well, Christina and Jimmy, there were those on Mars who once believed that humans and Martians could live together in peace. I knew that that could never be. Peace is not in the nature of you creatures. At the cost of all else, you rose above all other species on your world, separating yourselves from the beasts with clothing, custom and technology, and no creature of that kind could ever settle for being anything but the master of their environment. It was inevitable that we would one day come in contact with one another, and inevitable that we would come into conflict. I know this, because I understand human nature, and I understand human nature, because it is not much different from our own, simply a bit more...primitive. Yes, that's the word. Our august leader came to you with open arms and peace on his lips, and, reacting with fear, you cut him down. You proved me right, you filthy little beasts, and now, your entire race will pay the price!"

"But... but... we didn't know! I thought they were out to get me!" Christina blubbered.

"I didn't even know what was going on! I just ran outside and Christina was all naked and wet and crying about how the aliens were trying to abduct her and put her in their space zoo! We were only defending ourselves!" Jimmy protested.

"Exactly the reaction I expected from ignorant savages." Skulk retorted. "Baseless suspicion and over reaction. You have sealed your own fate. Do you want to know whats going to happen now? I'll tell you. Tomorrow, our ships set a course for Earth. You have seen the extent of our technology. Your pitiful forces will be no mach for us. We will destroy your militaries, kill your leaders, shatter your society and drive you all back to the stone age! Then, we shall unleash upon the Earth unspeakable horrors, the likes of which no living being can endure! In time, the remaining humans will beg for their own surrender, and we will gladly give it, under the condition that they become our eternal slaves. Or not. We may simply decide to exterminate you. Martian cities will rise up from the ashes of humanity, and and no one will even remember a time when the humans of Earth were anything else but our naked slaves. Believe me, for what you've done, you deserve everything your going to get. I've said my peace. Lux, you may return them to their ignorant state if you wish. I have an invasion to lead."

To their surprise, the ship is still fully functional, except for the ship’s main engines. They could repair them, but it would take time, maybe several weeks.
