141.content:
(Originally authored by faith)

There’s an urban legend going around. It jumps from mouth to mouth, changing each time it gets told. To outsiders familiar with this sort of thing, the legend sounds like an odd variation on the Bloody Mary myth. But this one has the sad distinctions of being true.

The story goes something like this (which plenty of details added or changed to suit the teller). Jenny Mcfaddon was the daughter of a poor farmer in a nameless colony raised in the 1600s (a colony occasionally said to be on the very ground the town now rests). The story goes that a group of Jenny’s best friends were caught in a strange ritual and rounded up by the local magistrate. They were asked to confess their sins, and confess they did. They said that Jenny, an easy scapegoat, was a witch. Every night she would dance naked in the fields, singing songs to the devil. She had compelled them night after night, slipping into their dreams and forcing them to perform terrible acts. Sometimes they would awaken, miles from home and not a stitch of clothing on their person. They had all sold their souls at her behest.

The truth was, Jenny was a shy and modest girl, the very Puritan ideal of virtue. On the other hand, her friends had all long ago made pacts with dark things that had been there longer than the Europeans. Jenny, much as they liked her, was far too pious for their circle. So they incensed the town, driving it into a mob. Jenny was seized and a confession demanded. She stated she didn’t know what the magistrate was talking about. Enraged, the town’s people stripped the frightened girl naked and dragged her red faced through the streets. A stockade was hastily thrown together, and Bare Jenny was locked in place in the center of town. For a long, cold week she sat miserably in the stocks. Towns people would stop to taunt, curse, spit out or simply leer at the poor naked girl.

Finally, the magistrate had had enough. He came with a mob, bearing torches, hay, and oil. He demanded a confession. Jenny again refused. He proclaimed that she would then burn for her crimes. They say that as flame touched wood, her friends came forward, smiling and snickering at her fear and embarrassment. They began to join hands and circled the burning fire, the town folk unseeing. As they circled the stockade like a may pole, they began to softly whisper.

“Jenny Jenny, you’re a witch! Jenny Jenny, without a stitch! Jenny Jenny, face so red! Jenny Jenny, now your dead! Jenny Jenny, on the fire, Jenny Jenny, we’re all liars, Jenny Jenny, fare the well, Jenny Jenny, down in hell!”

Jenny, the rumor goes on to say, cursed them as she burned. Forsaking virtue, she promised vengeance on all of them. Of course, its just a story. But they say if you stand in a dark room, staring in a mirror, and softly sing the coven’s little rhyme, Bare Jenny’s ghost will come to you. Why you would want to be haunted by a vengeful, sorrowful spectre is anyone’s guess, but she’ll come all the same, and she’ll haunt you forever.

Occultists refer to poltergeists as ghosts that died under circumstances of intense emotion and traumatic experiences. These spirits are awash in the emotions that overcame them at the moment of death- metaphorically drowning in these feelings until they are an all consuming obsession. Some ghosts can be put to rest if unfinished business is settled or something important to them is destroyed. Jenny, on the other hand, only wants to inflict as much shame and embarrassment on the living as she can. She particularly fixates on young women, because they remind her of the friends who betrayed her. Like many poltergeists, Jenny can move objects with her mind and often manifests as strange or violent noises. By far her favorite technique involves stripping a victim naked and tossing them into situations that will cause the most shame and embarrassment possible. Like the witch she was rumored to be, Jenny can slip into dreams and torment a subject there. She’s also capable of possessing a person outright, and can choose to cause them to black out or be completely aware of their actions but totally unable to stop themselves from being compelled like her puppets. Jenny, unlike some ghosts, doesn’t haunt particular locations- she haunts people. She can follow the one who calls her anywhere, and can torment them at any time. She can also latch on to anyone her summoner knows or meets while Bare Jenny haunts her, so long as that person comes within a few feet of a mirror or falls asleep.

Bare Jenny is a pitable figure, as much a slave to her own emotions and curse as any of her victims. A kind hearted, demure girl (one that reminds Jenny of herself) might hear a soft weeping or an whispered apology moments before her clothes are torn to shreds and she is forcibly exposed to as many people as possible. On the other hand, a spiteful cold hearted woman will feel only cold, hateful vengeance from Jenny. At her calmest, Jenny can seem lucid and even friendly, but this is merely a calm soon to be drowned in a storm of shame and helpless anger.

People say that fire can drive Jenny away temporarily. But when the flames die down or her chosen victim(s) stray into the darkness beyond the fire, she’ll be back and well and truly enraged. There might be a way to permanently destroy or banish her, but if one exists it will have to be discovered by the ones she haunts.
141.title: The Tale of Bare Jenny

1411.content:
(Originally authored by faith)

Duality is the cornerstone of the world. Not many people see it, of course. They take their world for granted, take for granted the pieces that allow them to thrive. But for everything that exists, there must be something that stands parallel and opposite it. Darkness waits and the edges of every light. Good walks beside evil. Yin and Yang constantly dance around one another. Life is the opposite of death. Without one, the other becomes meaningless.

Perhaps this is why there are two sides to every mirror. Its a well kept secret, of course. People use them every day, happily grooming themselves in front of the glass. Sometimes a person will simply stare, admiring themselves, indulging in a bit of vanity. Some even come looking for solace, staring at their doppleganger looking for a meaning or calming raw emotions.

How many would stop and stare, do you think, if they knew the mirrors can stare back?

Jenny lives in a place that is nowhere. Some might call it purgatory, though she couldn't say for sure. It is a place of silence, of perfect blackness that goes on forever. Jenny can slip into dreams, but she can never truly sleep. Hanging in the perpetual midnight of the not-world is the closest she comes, content to be forgotten and to avoid remembering.

But the voices come, sooner or later. Some hesitant, frightful, meekly whispering. Some mocking, confident, unbelieving. But they come all the same, intoning the little rhyme are her betrayers. And as the words trickle in, memories begin to bubble up. Deep, all consuming humiliation in front of townsfolk long dead and passed on to other rewards. Betrayal like a knife through the heart. Jenny opens her eyes, and begins to walk. The whispers lead her on, the world slipping and swirling in the dark. Flickers of light rise and fall, images bending and melting like the warp of a funhouse mirror or tumbling sharply like the turn of a kaleidiscope. Jenny comes at last to the edge of this not-world...to the border on the far side of a mirror. She can see the silhouette of someone, staring at her from a darkened room. And then, the figure in the living world flicks on a light switch, and Jenny sees for the first time the face of the one who called her. This is the one that awakened her memories anew...this is the one she will heap her torments upon.

But who is it?
1411.title: Should someone call Bare Jenny?

14111.content:
Crystal stood before the mirror, unconsciously chewing on her bottom lip and shifting her weight anxiously from one foot to the other. She was supposed to be standing with her hands at her sides, but without her conscious will, they had drifted together, coming to rest nervously over her bare crotch. The other girls, the more sympathetic ones anyway, told her that she'd get used to being naked before the night was through. "It's just us girls right?" "Make it to morning and you'll be just fine!" But she wasn't "just fine." She was naked, she was scared and she wanted to go home. There was little chance of that however. She had come this far, and now, she had reached the final part of her initiation.

As Crystal fidgeted nervously in front of the mirror, the other girls began to fill up the room, all of them scantily clad, but definitely more modestly covered than Crystal herself. The cute Asian girl tried not to pay too much attention to the reflection that stared back at her from Liz's full length bedroom mirror, but she simply couldn't help it. The other girls had all commented on how surprisingly large her breasts were. There was a subtle undertone of racism inherent in that observation, Crystal knew, but she was hardly in a position to say anything about it herself. She just wanted to make it through the night and be accepted into the group. Looking at her reflection though, she had to admit, she had a really nice pair of knockers, and they looked especially good right now, all pushed together by her arms. It almost looked like she was deliberately posing, she noticed with a blush.

Soon enough, the other girls had all arrived. Liz approached Crystal from the side and gave her hand a light disciplinary swat, sending her arms back to her sides. Pepper was going around the room lighting candles in strategic places while Jackie stood awaiting orders by the light switch. The other girls, Veronica, Ayita, Carmen and Rebecca, all took positions around the room, forming a kind of disjointed circle around Crystal and the fateful mirror before her. When all of the candles were lit, Pepper nodded in Jackie's direction, and soon, the room was plunged into darkness, save for the small, dim candles, and the eerie orange light they produced.

Taking one of the candles in her hand, Pepper stepped to the front of the group, placing herself between Crystal and the mirror. Lifting the candle up to her face and leaning forward towards the other girls accomplished two things. Firstly, it cast her face in a creepy orange glow, tiny shadows obfuscating odd parts of her features, making her appear strange, ominous and not at all like the chipper, kinda nerdy thing that Crystal had just begun to get to know. Secondly, it caused the back of her shirt to lift up just a bit, exposing the bottom part of her pale freckled bum cheeks. Pepper was aware of her exposure, but knew that her body would block the view of her reflection from the other girls. She had not the slightest inkling that, somewhere in time, someone was watching her impiousness and gnashing her teeth.

"Hearken to my words, ye faithful and ye fearful." Pepper began, fighting back a mischievous grin. "For tonight, we tamper with forces both ancient and terrible. Nearly 400 years ago, on this very spot, there stood a town. Though not a single brick or stone remains today, it was here, as sure as night follows day. In this town long gone, an innocent girl was put to death, Jenny Mcfaddon, accused of witchcraft by her so called friends, who were guilty as sin themselves. Stripped naked and dragged through the streets, Bare Jenny, as she came to be known was tortured and humiliated for days and days, until her stubborn refusal to admit to her crimes earned her a place on the stake.

As she burned, her wicked friends emerged from the crowd and taunted her as she slowly turned to ash. Some say the girls really were witches, and that their final taunts were malevolent spells woven to torment Jenny even beyond death. Others say that Jenny swore vengeance in her final moments, rejecting salvation and taking as her own the ways of the Devil. They say many things, but what they ALL say is this: Jenny did not die with her body. She did not die with her friends, and she did not die with her town. Long after everything Jenny had ever known was torn down or turned to dust, her spirit remains, bound to the earth by some dark powers with one purpose and one purpose only: to take her unholy revenge on living girls."

At this point, Pepper could no longer contain her smile, but when it finally arose, it did nothing more than chill Crystal further. She had heard the story before, or at least a version of it. She hadn't really paid it any mind. Crystal wasn't the sort of person who liked being scared. She closed her eyes during scary scenes in movies and did her best not to upset those around her, be they living or dead. The rational part of her brain was telling her that there was nothing to be afraid of, that the story wasn't true, and even if it was, there's no such thing as ghosts or curses. Everything else, from the irrational part of her brain down to her bare, trembling toes, bought it all hook line and sinker.

With her wicked grin now in full bloom, Pepper continued "They say that Jenny can be summoned to the earthly plane by reciting the taunts of her wicked friends in front of a mirror, in a dark room. If you call her, she will come, and reign unspeakable humiliations upon you for disturbing her slumber. We know this to be true. Two years ago, our friend Alison stood in the very spot where Crystal stands now, and we all recited the chant. Before that night, Alison was a normal girl with normal ideas about sex and nudity. After that night however, she changed. She became the Alison you know. Slowly, over time, her skirts got shorter, her underwear became a forgotten extravagance... and she started to have her... accidents..."

Crystal's eyes went a little wide at this. That would certainly explain a lot. Of all the girls at school, Alison always dressed the most provocatively. She wore the shortest skirts, and some of the girls and guys even whispered that she never wore panties underneath. The very idea both shocked and intrigued Crystal, but she never had the courage to check and see for herself. And then there were the "accidents." Alison seemed to make a habit of exposing herself over and over again. "Accidentally" allowing her skit to blow up, mooning all of the cars outside of school, her boobs "accidentally" falling out of her tube top, flashing the football team, "accidentally" wandering into the wrong locker room after gym, "accidentally" streaking during the big game, and any number of naked escapades were all attributed to Alison, but Crystal never really believed the stories she heard. She'd have been expelled long ago if they were true, she was sure of that. More importantly, she couldn't believe anyone would do any of those things voluntarily. Strange as it may sound, spiritual intervention made more sense to Crystal than any of that, even if she wouldn't admit it to herself consciously. She just kept repeating to herself in her head "It's only a story, it's only a story..."
14111.title: An Invited Guest

choices: Crystal, naked and huddled in the corner in a fetal position
The front door wide open, and Crystal nowhere to be seen
141111.content:
Pepper continued. "Many experts of the occult have spent a great deal of time determining what is fantasy and what is reality regarding the legend of Bare Jenny. Unfortunately, the only way to obtain true knowledge of the occult, is to put theory into practice, and that is what we're going to do here tonight. 2 years ago, we proved through Alison that Bare Jenny's spirit could be invoked through a simple chanting ritual, with all of her vengeance focused on the girl at the center of the circle. Alison herself could not be here tonight for that very reason. She knows the power of Bare Jenny, and she never wants to touch it again. Now, we will put another part of the legend to the test. Some versions of the story claim that if any young girl dares to speak the rhyme before the mirror totally naked, then Jenny will wreak an even more terrible vengeance. Some say that the curse will extend to all of her friends and family, her children and her children's children. Some say that bare Jenny will step right out of the mirror and strangle her on the spot. Still others say that whoever dares to speak the rhyme in the buff, will never wear clothes again."

When Pepper finished her last sentence, Crystal began to hear a low rumble from outside the room. It was most assuredly the sound of thunderous storm clouds gathering overhead, Crystal told herself, but it sounded like something else. It sounded to her like something of immense power pressing up against a fragile door, the once strong materials straining against the pressure, and bending inward, ready to burst. On the verge of tears, Crystal could finally take no more. "Come on Pepper.... this... this story can't be true! I know your trying to scare me, but..."

"Now now, Crystal." Pepper replied, pulling the candle down away from her face. "We're here to experiment. That's the beauty of the science of the occult. All we have to do is try. If you’re right, nothing will happen. If the legend is true however... well, you'll have made a great sacrifice in the name of human knowledge!" Crystal was starting to breathe heavily now, looking around the room for some kind of sympathy. "Oh, come on you guys... don't make me do this! It's just stupid! Let's go back downstairs and do something else!"

It was Liz who spoke up this time. "It's too late to back out now Crissy. You're sooooo close to being one of the gang. If you walk away now, the whole night will be for nothing. You'll have to call your mom, and she'll come by and pick you up. Then, she'll drive you back to your boring, nowhere life and you can go back to being the boring nowhere person at our school with no friends. It's your choice, but if you really think this whole thing is 'stupid...'"

Crystal bowed her head in shame and defeat. "Okay. Okay, I'll do it." Pepper smiled and stepped away from the mirror to take her place in the circle. As she passed Crystal, she put a hand on her shoulder and gave her a firm squeeze. "It seems rough now..." Pepper thought "...but its all fun and games. We'll all laugh about this, years later." As Pepper drifted by, Crystal could have sworn she heard a whispered word of sympathy. It didn't sound like Pepper though. She wondered where it could have come from. Her mind was playing tricks on her, she thought.

As the circle was complete, the girls began the chant. "Jenny Jenny, you're a witch! Jenny Jenny, without a stitch! Jenny Jenny, face so red! Jenny Jenny now you’re dead! Jenny Jenny, on the fire! Jenny Jenny, we're all liars, Jenny Jenny, fair the well, Jenny Jenny, down in hell!"

As the final word slipped from Crystal's quivering lips, the low rumble in her ears split to a deafening crack as a flash of light poured into the room, and the steady chanting transformed into a chorus of girlish screams. As the other girls staggered and shrieked, Crystal's wide eyes remained glued to the mirror, and, for a split second, she saw a different pair of eyes looking back at her instead. The image of a young girl, naked, with messy brown hair and pale, worn features filled the looking glass, staring at her with sad, angry eyes. In a moment of pure, unthinking terror, Crystal found herself screaming louder than all of the others and fleeing the room. She bumped into someone on the way out, but was too distracted to notice who it was.

It didn't take long for the other girls to recover, and soon the lights were back on, and conversation ensued. "What the fuck was that!? cried Carmen in disbelief. "It was just lightning, obviously!" Pepper replied with hasty reason. "Where's Crystal?" Ha ha! She bolted!" laughed Veronica, lounging a the foot of Liz's bed. Before anyone could say anything else, Alison came stumbling through the open door, buck naked as usual. Her hair was dyed dark black, and her naked flesh was covered in almost movie quality zombie makeup. "What did you guys do to her? She hit me like a runaway train!" the naked zombie bimbo announced.

"Well, I guess she's initiated!" Liz chuckled. "Let's go downstairs and give her all of the good news." And so, the girls followed Liz downstairs in search of their friend.


When they get downstairs they find...
141111.title: Or is it?

choices: Two of her friends with a flashlight and an umbrella
1411112.content:
All 8 girls stood together, staring in disbelief at the front door. The heavy door was wide open, swinging back and forth slowly even in the violence of the breeze, giving each young girl a glimpse of the torrential downpour that had erupted out of the clear black sky mere moments ago. Crystal was nowhere to be found.

"Oh God... you don't think she ran out into that mess do you?"Rebecca blurted out, her voice filled with worry.

"Well, I don't see her hiding anywhere else, do you?" was Liz's annoyed response. "Well, there's only one thing to do. We're going to have to go out there after her."

After a few murmurs and grumbles bubbled up behind her, Liz turned and directed her attention directly at Veronica. The dark haired beauty was quick to take the opportunity to speak. "You want us to go out there in THAT mess?"

"We can't just leave her out there!" Carmen protested, loudly.

"I know, but do we have to go out there and find her ourselves? I mean, none of us know this area too well, even in the daylight. Running around aimlessly in the dark in the middle of a lightning storm is a good way to get half of us lost or killed! The smart thing to do is call the cops, and have THEM look for Crystal." When she finished making her point, Veronica crossed her arms over her ample chest and waited for Liz's rebuttal.

"Oh, sure, call the cops, great idea Veronica. Then they can call Crystal's mom and tell her how they found her. Are you going to explain to that old worry wart prude why Crystal was running around outside, buck naked in the middle of an electrical storm?"

A little embarrassed, Veronica looked down at her bare feet for a moment before looking up and making a new suggestion "Uhm... couldn't we just bribe the cops? I've got my check book in my bag."

Liz sighed and looked out the door, worry and resignation creeping into her voice. "No go. Deputy Angie's the officer on patrol tonight. She's not the bribing type. Anymore bright ideas?"

Trying to pretend the previous exchange hadn't happened, Veronica smiled and replied, "How many umbrellas do you have?"

And so, the girls scattered about the house, preparing to venture out into the cold stormy night in search of their lost, naked friend. In the course of their preparations however, strange things started to happen. For starters, Liz couldn't get back into her room. When all of the girls exited hastily, someone must have slammed the door, inadvertently locking it. Liz briefly entertained the idea of borrowing her sister's clothes, or even her mother's, but it seemed that all the upstairs doors were closed and locked, aside from the bathroom. Even stranger, the closet door where the other girls had put all of their clothes upon entering the house was stuck shut. No matter how hard the girls pulled, it was as if some invisible force held the door hard and tight.

Nobody could come up with a reasonable explanation for these strange events, but in the end, there wasn't much time to dwell on them. Crystal had already been out in the rain and the cold for too long. If they were going to fix this mess themselves, they were going to have tohead out into the downpour dressed as they were. With all of the girls gathered in the living room, Liz returned from her searching bearing 3 umbrellas and 5 flashlights. Addressing he troops, Liz began, "Okay, there's not enough umbrellas or flashlights to go around. I figure we can double up on the umbrellas, and one group will just get stuck with one flashlight rather than 2. That means 2 people have to stay behind to watch the house and mind the phone."

In an instant, Veronica and Jackie both raised their hands, looking for house duty. Veronica did so in part to remain consistent with her earlier objections to Liz's plans, but also, she just generally made a habit of avoiding manual labor at all costs. Jackie, for her part detested the idea of parading around out in the open dressed in only her pristine white undergarments (which would surely become virtually transparent in the rain.) Also, she could only imagine the mess that would become of her hair in such a downpour. Unfortunately, it was Liz's job to disappoint one of them. "Sorry, only one of you gets to stay. We can't have Alison walking around made up like a zombie nudist in the middle of a spooky storm. Trust me, the locals around here aren't too bright. They're liable to think she's the real thing."

In short order, Jackie and Veronica engaged in a deadly game of rock paper scissors, and Veronica proved the victor. So it was that Veronica chilled out on the couch while naked Zombie Alison went up stairs to the bathroom to soak in the tub and scrub away the makeup Pepper had so diligently applied to her. As planned, the other girls broke up into teams of two and ventured out into the night in search of their missing friend.

Meanwhile, out in the storm, Crystal had finally stopped running. Out of breath, soaking wet and shivering, she hugged herself in a vain attempt to strangle away the cold. Why hadn't she stopped running sooner? She had been scared out of her wits no doubt, but the moment she saw that girl in the mirror, it was as if she lost all control over her body. When she reached for the doorknob, she had wondered what she was doing. When her body first felt the sting of the midnight shower, her mind cried "Stop!" but her body simply wouldn't listen. Was she really that scared? Was it even possible to be that scared? She had never really done anything that outrageous before... “maybe this is just what adrenalin feels like?” She thought to herself.

As she slowly began to regain control of her body, Crystal looked around in an effort to determine her location. Immediately, her eyes were drawn to a nearby house. It was too small to be Liz's house and the lights were on in the living room. It was at this point that Crystal remembered that she was naked. Her entire body filled with nervous electricity as she bolted for a nearby tree for cover. How far had she run!? Fear began to creep into her chest and seize her heart in its icy grip. How far was she from Liz's house? She didn't know anything about the area, and it was mostly woods in all directions! She could wander around all night and still not find her way back, and she couldn't ask anyone for help without strangers seeing her naked!

Her choices seemed clear. Try and retrace her steps through the mud and hope to find her way back to Liz's house, or knock on the door of the house before her and hope that the occupants are understanding and friendly. She dawdled briefly with the idea of creating makeshift clothing out of the leaves of the tree, but found it impossible to get the things to stick to her body. If they didn't simply slip off of her slippery skin, a sudden stiff breeze would tear them off and carry them away. It was as if God was torturing her. If only she knew.

Suddenly, her desperate work was interrupted by a bright light shining behind her. Startled, Crystal turned in a flash only to see...
1411112.title: A Dark and Stormy Night

choices: Crystal knocks on the door, comitting herself to the mercy of the O'Conner boys
Deputy Angie catches herself a streaker
14111122.content:
Squealing with embarrassment, Crystal frantically covered her enormous tits and scampered away like a scared deer. Getting caught by the police was the last thing she wanted to happen. Aside from the damage a criminal record would do to her reputation, she just knew her mother would kill her! She'd never see the outside of her house again!

Behind the wheel of her car, Deputy Angie sighed and shifted her vehicle into gear. "Another teenage prank. Must be one of Liz's friends. She aint from around here, that’s for sure." She thought to herself. "Cute butt. Girl could do with a little more time in the sun though." And with that, the chase was on. Crystal Zigzagged from tree to tree, hoping to lose Angie in the low visibility of the rain soaked night.

She was running out of steam quickly however. Still exhausted from her earlier sprint, she knew that she couldn't evade the authorities forever. Sniffling and wheezing in the cold, she realized that she had only one option: throwing herself upon the tender mercies of strangers. Spying the front door of the O'Conner place, she made her final decision and took off at a run. Every step of the way she wondered if she was making the right decision. A part of her rebelled at the very idea of arriving on a stranger's doorstep buck naked and having the audacity to ask for help. But something inside of her spurred her on. It was a strange something that spurred her on. She didn't know where it came from, and she definitely wasn't sure if she liked it, but she listened none the less.

Inside the O'Conner home, the two O'Conner boys, Jason and Kevin sat in the living room playing video games. They were up way passed their bedtimes, but mom and dad were out for the night, visiting relatives in the city. Their big sister Julie was supposed to be babysitting them, but she had fallen asleep upstairs in her room with a pair of headphones over her ears and a thick, locked bedroom door between her and the rest of the house. So, lacking proper supervision, Jason and Kevin had snuck downstairs to spend the night basking in the glow of their PS3.

Of the two, only Kevin had seen a live nude girl before. And even then, it was his sister. Julie had taken to sleeping in the nude of late, (a practice she was continuing at this very moment) and she had forgotten to lock the door to her room, allowing Kevin to accidentally stumble in and catch her in the buff. As far as seeing naked girls go, Jason and Kevin both agreed that that embarrassing incident didn't count. How shocked they would be then if they only knew that at that very moment, a beautiful, desperate and naked teenage girl was heading right for their front door.
14111122.title: A police car

choices: Follow Crystal and her houseguest through the woods
stick with Angie and the O'Conners
141111222.content:
(Originally authored by faith)

"Oh, I don't think so." Angie said smugly, shifting gears and slamming on the accelerator. This was far from the first prankster who thought they were being clever trying to use the heavy tree cover on the winding nature of the roads in the neighborhood to outmanuever Angie and her police car. Angie had proving them wrong down to a science by this point.

The police car's headlights vanished for a moment, plunging Crystal into darkness. This was both a relief and a terror, because while her body was no longer illuminated for the whole neighborhood, the sudden loss of bright light was, in effect blinding her. Still, the welcoming light of the doorway was coming closer all the time....

Angie's car roared out of nowhere, squeeling to a halt in front of her and cutting off her straight shot to freedom. Crystal skidded to a halt as Angie got out of the car. Shaking slightly, she turned to flee back into the woods. And then she lost track of her surroundings, falling into a darkness deeper than the surrounding night.

Angie stalked around her car, her stride filled with authority and the promise of heavy reprisals. It was a stance and a demeanor Angie had spent years perfecting. Truth was, Angie was one of the most kind hearted, good natured cops in the town. Really, she found Liz and her little circle of snobbish but harmless friends a little amusing. But putting a little fear of god into the silly girls tended to go a long way- a person's own dread of what kinds of punishments Angie could lay down tended to do 90% of her job for her. Most folk, be they adults or kids pulling silly stunts, became incredibly meek when the boot of Angie Summers came stomping their way. So, as usual, she walked with an air of malice that was all but non existent in her day to day nature.

But what she found at the end of her flashlight's beam gave her pause. Crystal stood with her back to her, ramrod stiff, her head tilted entirely to the ground, her hair spilling over to cover her face. She sobbed softly to herself. Angie raised an eyebrow. 11th hour theatrics weren't uncommon in these situations, but this was a particularly sudden 180 from the embarrassed terror she'd seen a moment ago. Why wasn't she running?

"Why?" Crystal whispered, a voice that carried an odd accent and heavy tone of sorrow.

"Stay where you are." Angie ordered.

"Why?" Crystal asked again, not registering the command. "They never listen. They condemn...and they stare. Why? No one helps. No one hears. They look...always looking. Stop! Stop!"

"......." Angie paused. This....felt wrong. Very wrong. She'd been assuming this was a prank, some stupid kids getting caught in their hazing rituals. But Angie could think of other reasons a little girl could be running through these woods terrified and naked. None of the other scenarios she could come up with were anywhere remotely as pleasant an explanation as children's pranks.

"All right. Listen. I want you to turn around and come with me. We'll go to the station and we can sort this out. I'll get you some spare clothes and you can tell me your side of what's going on." Angie offered, walking closer.

Crystal turned slowly, awkwardly, dragging her body along as she did. Water slid from her nude form as she did so. Angie took a step back. There was something wrong here. For a moment she wondered if this wasn't part of some prank after all- try to spook the cop that catches you. But no...there was a difference between acting like a freak and something physically being wrong with a person. Angie had seen enough crazies and intoxicated fits to know there was something seriously off here.

"I remember the magistrates." Crystal announced softly.

"All right. You stay where you are." Angie said, dropping a little more of her 'bad cop' voice on the girl.

"They never hear. They ask questions, they make demands. They never listen. Only condemn. Condemn. Strip you down and let everyone see! I remember the magistrates."

Crystal began walking forward slowly. Angie held her ground, even as better instincts began to scream at her to run or draw a weapon. With her hair plastered over her face and her asian heritage, Crystal was reminding Angie uncomfortably of certain late night foreign films she and her sister liked to watch- foreign films about cursed video tapes and vengeful spirits that invariably get made into mediocre American horror movies....

"And when they're done- when they've wrung their dignity from you, when there be nothing but blush to your cheeks and cold air on your skin...then they come with fire and hate...then you burn. I remember the magistrates." Crystal said.

"That's enough!" Angie said, stepping forward. "I don't know what's going on, but I'm tired of standing out in the rain gabbing with a naked girl! I promise we'll sort all this out as soon as we get to the station. We just-"

Crystal finally looked up at her. Her eyes burned with a reddish orange glow, like the bright light of a stockade that had become a funeral pyre.

"Never again." Came the whisper.

Angie went for her weapon then, sensibility finally losing out to pure instinct. But even as she grasped it, she felt it yanked out of her hand, along with the flashlight. She backed up a step as Crystal reached out a hand. She felt a button come undone on the top of her uniform. She turned to run, just as she felt her belt loosen and her pants fall to her knees, tripping her.

"Never again." Crystal whispered. "This time, its your turn."

Something flew through the air, like a little bat, wrapping itself around Angie's left arm. Her eyes widened as she felt the click of her own handcuffs firmly lock around her left wrist. Then the world seemed to spin out of control, as she felt herself lifted bodily into the air, a thousand hands seeming to pull at her clothes, boots, pants...even her underwear! She tried to scream, but all that came out was a meek little 'eek!' as Crystal stared.

____________________________________________________________________________ _____________

A soft knock came to the door of the O'conner house. The two boys walked cautiously to the door, worried that their illicit gameplay had attracted one of their neighbors. The sight that awaited them was worth the risk, though. There stoof Deputy Angie Summers, her 21 year old body completely exposed. Her hands were held above her head, constrained by her handcuffs to a low hanging rafter of the front porch. Each lovely ankle was likewise contained in a pair of handcuffs (Angie always carried some spares in case she had to break up one of the not infrequent barroom brawls on the edge of town) fastening each leg to opposite ends of entry way.

"C-could I get a little help please?" She whimpered as the two boys stared at her. The two exchanged glances, and as one retreated into the house to retrieve their video cameras. An event like this needed to be put down for posterity!

Unseen, a shadow slipped off the porch and retreated into the woods. There were others deserving of her attention right now. And this time, it would be there turn.
141111222.title: Deputy Angie catches herself a streaker

1411112221.content:
Bare feet plodding slowly but steadily through the thick mud, Crystal's body made its way deep into the woods. To anyone who knew her of course, it would be clear that, though the lights were on, if anyone was home, it certainly wasn't Crystal. With her head tilted slightly to the side, her rain soaked hair clinging to her pale moon colored body in odd, untamed ways and her arms hanging loosely at her sides, she had the look of a walking corpse. Most of all however, though her face was cloaked beneath the veil of her dark hair, her eyes burned with a smoldering hatred that Crystal herself would be emotionally incapable of summoning. Her progress, though hampered by short limbs and deep mud, was swift. She moved with a purpose as sharp and as strong as the blade of a headsman’s axe.

Suddenly, a light pierced the darkness. Then another. Slowly, the thing that wore Crystal's skin turned its head in the direction of the lights before ducking behind a tree. From this hidden vantage point, she would stalk her prey unseen. She did not yet know who it was moving about in the dark, but whoever they were, they would soon feel her wrath.
1411112221.title: Nude Hunter, Clothed Prey.

14111122211.content:
As Crystal's eyes watched from a safe hiding spot, Liz and Jackie slowly came into view. Each girl had their own flashlight, but they were sharing the same umbrella, each one constantly jockeying for a better position beneath its cover. By the looks of it, neither one was having much luck. The wind was erratic, blowing the rain any which way at any moment, and both girls had received a healthy dose of H2O, rendering their meager clothing clingy and all but transparent.

"This was a dumb idea Liz, a really dumb idea.." Jackie grumbled.

"Well, what were we supposed to do Jackie? Just leave her out here!?" Liz shot back, defensively.

"Running out into a storm in our fucking underwear? Dumb. That's all I'm saying." Jackie replied, an air of dismissal in her voice.

"Well, it's not MY fault somebody locked the door to my room on the way out! Crystaaaaal! Crystaaaaal! Come on girl, where are you?"

Crystal's body watched and listened as they argued in between shouting their "friend's" name. There was fear in Liz's voice, but she was not afraid for Crystal. No, the only thing she was afraid of was getting in trouble, with her parents, the authorities, whatever. The angry spirit that filled up Crystal's body knew the type. She thought herself beyond reproach, beyond common decency. She believed that she could have her fun at the expense of another and get away with it, but now that the possibility had arisen that she might have to take responsibility for her actions, a tiny bit of fear had crawled into her soul. And Jackie was no better. All she cared about was herself. She cared more that she was cold and wet, and that her hair was a mess than she did about her friend's life and safety. They reminded her so much of the girls from her own town that it made her burn for revenge.

"Crystaa-- shit!" Liz cut herself short. Her flashlight had just gone out. She smacked it, played with it a few moments, but there was no reaction. It was dead. "Goddamnit! Lousy batteries... I hate this town!" Liz exclaimed in exasperation.

As Jackie scanned the area with her flashlight in the opposite direction, she heard Liz's voice... at least she thought it was Liz's voice, say "Jackie, gimme your flashlight!" The sound was small, almost a whisper, and it sounded only within Jackie's own ear. This was the last straw. Turning to face Liz, Jackie spoke in anger "Oh, so you want my flashlight now too? It's not enough that you drag me out into a storm, and then hog the umbrella THE WHOLE TIME now you want my flashlight too?"

Taken aback, Liz once again responds defensively "What's gotten into you? Jeez Jackie take a chill pill! I don't want your stupid flashlight... but even if I did, it's MY flashlight and it's MY umbrella too!"

Crystal's lips were drawn back into a cruel smile as the war of words between Jackie and Liz quickly escalated. Soon enough they were pushing, shoving, scratching, pulling, fighting for control of the flashlight and the umbrella. It wasn't hard to orchestrate. A whispered word here, a telekinetic shove there. They were both such greedy and self important things... so ready to strike out at another for their own benefit, so ready to forget a friend... so like...

All of a sudden, the smile left Crystal's face. It faded momentarily and gave way to a grimace of confusion. "How did I get here?" Crystal thought as she frantically took in her surroundings. She could hear the sounds of a struggle nearby, and soon, a flash of lightning illuminated for her the sight of Liz and Jackie grappling in the pouring rain, the umbrella and the flashlight discarded to the wet earth. She tried to cry out, to get their attention, but was silenced by the booming crash of thunder that followed the bolt of a moment ago.

In that brief flash of light however, Jackie had looked into Liz's eyes and seen within a reflection. Her brow furrowed for only a millisecond as the reflection changed to a face as frightening as it was unfamiliar, and then, just like that, Jackie had left the building. With a sudden burst of strength, Liz was hurled to the ground, landing butt first in the mud. More shocked than hurt, Liz looked up at her now seething friend and could not find the words. Jackie was bigger than her, sure, and more athletic... but the strength she had used only a moment ago... it was almost... superhuman. Liz quickly decided that a diplomatic solution was in order. "J-Jackie... just take it easy. I'm sorry, okay? You can keep the flashlight just... just calm down."

But Jackie wasn't listening. She didn't respond, didn't say a word. Rather, as Liz watched in disbelief, Jackie reached up with one hand and tore her own bra off of her chest. Then, hooking a thumb on each side of her white panties, she quickly stepped out of them and cast both wet garments aside. Another flash of lightning briefly illuminated Jackie's now fully nude athletic form as she stood over the terrified and speechless Liz. "You're not sorry." Jackie growled. "You're kind is only ever sorry for themselves. No, you're not sorry yet. But you soon will be."

Liz yelped as Jackie advanced on her, turning over onto all fours and trying desperately to scramble to her feet before her enraged former friend could get a hold of her. 14521.content:
A cool wind blew through an isolated, star blanketed pumpkin patch. It was October 31st, Halloween night, and, amidst the vines sat a single, solitary figure, Jimmy Smith, dressed as a pirate. There he sat, for hours on end, keeping a strange, silent vigil, hoping against hope that this year would be HIS year. His silence went undisturbed for some time, until finally breaking under the sound of approaching footsteps.

Jimmy's eyes lit up and a smile flared across his face. Could this be it? Was this the year!? Jimmy stood and spun around in an instant, only to be disappointed by the sight of his older sister Christina, dressed in a sexy Catholic Schoolgirl outfit. "Oh... it's just you." Jimmy said dejectedly before sinking back down to the ground.

"Well, of course it's me, who else would it be?" Christina said, bewildered. "What are you doing out here anyway, aren't you going to go Trick or Treating?" Jimmy didn't even bother to turn back around. "Nah, that’s okay, you go on ahead. I've got... things to do..."

Getting suspicious, Christina decided to press the issue. "What on Earth could you possibly have to do out in the middle of a pumpkin patch on Halloween night?" Jimmy was silent. "Come on, tell me!" Christina cried out. "If you don't, I'll go get mom, and we'll see what she thinks about all of this."

Sighing, Jimmy realized that he had no other choice but to come clean. "I know you’re gonna laugh but... I'm waiting for the Great Pumpkin."

There was a slight pause, as if Christina couldn't believe what she had heard. Then, she burst out laughing. "See! I knew you'd think it was stupid!" Jimmy cried. Between laughs, Christina managed to blurt out "Well of course it's stupid! The Great Pumpkin? Come on!"

"He'll come, you'll see!" Jimmy replied, angrily. "And when he comes, he's going to reward me with presents and Halloween cheer, and you’re not going to get anything!"

"Okay, okay, whatever..." Christina began, collecting herself and wiping the tears from her eyes. "I'll tell you what I will have though... a bag full of candy. See you around little bro!" With that, she turned to exit the pumpkin patch, but ceased her progress when the ground beneath her began to shake. "Do you feel..." She said, turning slightly to look back at her brother, but it was too late. The shaking turned to quaking and soon neither of the Smith Children could stand on their own two feet.

As the Earth rattled beneath them, they watched in awe as the vines parted, and out of the dirt arose a giant green stem, thick as a tree trunk, followed by a round, segmented orange shell, wider by far than their father's pickup truck. As the orange shell continued to rise, two carved out triangles, blazing with light revealed themselves, succeeded by a wide, gaping, furnace-like mouth, until finally a giant Jack-o-Lantern stood before the Smith Siblings, grinning jovially. Giant arms and legs of woven vine sprouted from the ground in quick succession, and soon, the strange creature hoisted itself up upon them, standing 25 feet tall.

"It's... it's the Great Pumpkin!" Jimmy said, smiling from ear to ear, childlike wonder written across his face. If she were a little less scared, Christina might have screamed, but as it was, she remained completely paralyzed by fear. Looking down at the two mortal creatures at his feet, the Great Pumpkin grinned and spread his arms wide "HAPPY HALLOWEEN!" he bellowed, the sound of his grand voice vibrating through the Smith Siblings, causing Jimmy to fidget giddily with glee, and Christina to tremble in terror.

"This is the first time I have been awakened in oh, I don't even know how long!" The Great Pumpkin said, stretching his leafy arms experimentally. "Arise, my children! Your long sleep is finally over!" This time, it was both Smith kids who reacted in shock, as the sound of movement and crunching spread throughout the Pumpkin patch. Pumpkins all around them were wiggling and shaking, and as the Smiths watched in amazement, they sprouted eyes and pointed teeth and began to chatter away to one another like old relatives at a long overdue family reunion.

The Great Pumpkin was so pleased with himself that he almost forgot about the two young humans beneath his feet. Soon, however, he remembered. "Oh, I'm sorry kids!" He said, apologetically "I almost forgot all about you! Thank you both for awakening me! It was your pure faith that made all of this possible!"

"No problem!" Jimmy said, rising to his feet. "I always knew you were real, I always knew!" Christina rose after him, taking him by the hand. "Let's go Jimmy, let’s go right now..." "No way!" Jimmy replied, pulling his hand away from his big sister. "I've waited all my life for this! I finally get to meet the Great Pumpkin, and now he's going to give us both Halloween presents!"

"That’s right!" The Great Pumpkin bellowed. "You've both been very good, and this is the most sincere Pumpkin patch I've seen in years and years! Hmmm... but what should I give you?"

As the Great Pumpkin pondered this question, the Pumpkin's beneath the Smith kid's feet began to Jibber and laugh until one of them, shouted out "Hey, boss, how about a pair of panties for the girl! I can see clear to China from down here, she's goin bare beaver!" Christina blushed furiously and tugged at the edges of her skirt, but it did little good. The Pumpkins all had a worms eye view, giving them a perfect upskirt vantage point. Expecting to rendezvous with her boyfriend Teddy later tonight, Christina had hoped to surprise him by going commando, but that was a secret to be kept for him and him alone, and certainly not a field full of smart allecky pumpkins!

The Great Pumpkin laughed warmly. "Oh, don't pay any attention to them little girl! It's perfectly natural to be a little naughty on Halloween. Here, you get a pogo stick!" As if by magic, (scratch that, it actually was magic) the Great Pumpkin produced a pogo stick out of thin air, raising a roar of laughter from the Pumpkin gallery. Receiving the gift, Christina looked it up and down before muttering "Uhm... thanks."

"What do I get, what do I get!?" Jimmy repeated, jumping up and down with excitement. "Hmm..." The Great Pumpkin thought for a moment. Then, with a wave of his hand, he produced a chest of genuine gold doubloons. "There you are Jimmy, a real life treasure chest to go with your pirate costume!"

"Wow, cool!" Jimmy exclaimed before opening the box and digging through the gold with greedy fingers. Forgetting herself for a moment, Christina blurted out angrily "Hey! How come he gets gold and I get a freaking pogo stick!?"

With a hearty chuckle, the Great Pumpkin did his best to reassure her. "Oh, it's not so bad little girl! Try it out, you'll see how much fun it is!"

Looking down at the toy, Christina thought for a moment, shrugged and then decided to hop on. After a few moments of bouncing, she actually started to smile. "You know... this isn't half bad!" She said, giggling. The Pumpkins in the patch were giggling too, for every time Christina bounced, the back of her skirt flew up, giving them all an even better view of her naked ass.

"There must be like a million dollars in here!" Jimmy speculated. "I can't wait to show mom and dad!"

"Of course!" Shouted the Great Pumpkin. "Your mother and father! Take me to them! They deserve presents too for raising such wonderful children!"

And with that, they set out towards to Smith family residence, Jimmy running ahead, the Great Pumpkin taking long strides with his giant legs, and Christina and the Pumpkin Patch kids bounced along behind. "This is it, this is the place!" Jimmy called out as the house came into sight. The Great Pumpkin smiled warmly and then stopped in his tracks, the smile on his face drooping into a horrified, quivering frown.

"NOOOOOOOOOO!" The Great Pumpkin cried out, falling to his green knees.

"What... what’s the matter?" Jimmy stammered, fear creeping into his voice for the first time tonight.

"What have you done... what have you done!?" The Great Pumpkin wailed as he scurried across the dirt on his knees. Reaching down with his massive hands, he scooped something up off of the Smith family's front porch. Cupping it in his hands, he held it out in front of Jimmy to see. It was a Jack-o-Lantern.

"What is the meaning of this, Jimmy!?" The Great Pumpkin said, his voice full of hurt and disbelief.

"I--I--I... it's just a Jack-o-lantern sir... just like you! Everyone has them on Halloween!"

It was about this time that Christina and the other pumpkins finally caught up. Now, bouncing in place on her pogo stick, Christina shot Jimmy an admonishing glance before shouting "Oh, what did you do now!?"

Close to tears himself, Jimmy tried fruitlessly to explain himself to his folk hero "But I don't understand! What’s wrong with Jack-o-lanterns? They're just like you!"

"NO!" The monstrous Jack-o-Lantern replied, rising back to his feet "Nothing like me! I am a creature of magic, made possible by belief and ancient witchery! These... these things are little more than desecrated corpses! How could you!?"

"I--I--" Jimmy stuttered, unable to find an answer.

"Druids!" The Great Pumpkin shouted in answer to his own question. "The ancient Druids would conduct atrocities such as this as part of grotesque ceremonies meant to bend my power to their will! Hundreds of years ago their magic laid me to rest, their spell weakening only now, but still their crimes live on in you!"

"N-no!"

"Silence! You are all children of the Druids! You keep their barbaric rituals alive, long after their natural death, and now you shall pay the price!"

With a wave of his hand, the Great Pumpkin casts a spell of vengeance on both of the Smith family children. Before she can leap off and run, the handle bars on Christina's pogo stick come alive and wrap around her wrists and ankles, binding her and transforming the toy into a kind of torture device. With every bounce, she travels further and further from the ground, causing her to scream in terror.

Jimmy fairs little better, as the chest of gold before him springs open. The gold inside melts into liquid, and tendrils of searing hot metal lash out and seize him by the arms, dragging him inside and slamming the lid tight.

Hearing the commotion, Dilbert, the children's father rushes outside, shotgun in hand. "Daddy! Daddy, please help!" Christina cried from up above as Dilbert stopped dead in his tracks, his heart seized by confusion and horror.

"Mortal fool! You shall share you're offspring's fate!" The Great Pumpkin threatened in his now cruel voice. Taking aim, Dilbert let off several shots, none of which did any discernible damage to the magical spirit before him. Taking in a deep breath, the Great Pumpkin leaned down and breathed a torrent of fire down upon Dilbert Smith, leaving only a blackened skeleton in his wake.

"Dilbert! Dilbert, what on earth is going..." Wendy Smith stopped at the back door. She was wearing a Halloween themed apron over a white T-Shirt and jeans, and in her oven mitt protected hands, she held a steaming hot pumpkin pie, fresh from the oven.

"GRRRRRRAAAAAAAAAAAAAAHHHH!" The Great Pumpkin howled furiously as he seized the screaming Wendy Smith in his hands and tore a hole through the back of her house with his monstrous hands and squeezed his way into her kitchen. His giant head and arms made for an uncomfortable fit, but the raging spirit was determined enough to see his revenge through anyway. Bit by bit, he tore away the screaming woman's clothes until she was utterly naked and at his mercy. Placing her on top of a wide cooking pan, he tied her down, and sprinkled her with confectioners’ sugar before sliding her into the searing hot oven. Only the closing of the heavy metal door could silence her screams, and even then, only just.

Crawling out from inside of the house, The Great Pumpkin spots Christina, still bouncing up and down on her pogo stick, and still screaming for help. Beneath her, the Pumpkin army rallied around, screaming cruel and crude remarks at her while peaking up her skirt and spitting pumpkin seeds at her at high velocities, taking bets and scoring points for bull’s-eye shots on her butt cheeks, pussy and asshole (in order of ascending points.)

Snatching the sniveling girl out of the air, the Great Pumpkin stared at her with his fearsome, glowing eyes and whispered "And now, for you..."

__________________________________________________________________

Sometime later, a group of Trick or Treaters arrives outside of the Smith family home. Their farm was isolated, but they always gave out lots of treats, and most people in the area did their pumpkin shopping right here on their farm, so it was a well known spot, and well worth going out of your way for the extra goodies.

As the tots and their parents approached the door, an older boy, by the name of Teddy, dressed as Frankenstein's monster tried to make his way through the crowd. He had a date with Christina Smith tonight, and couldn’t wait to see what "special surprise" she had prepared for him. As Teddy tried to get through, the parents talked amongst themselves, not paying much attention as the kids were greedily pushing forward, digging their grubby little hands through a Pirates treasure chest, seizing at the special "Pirate blood candy" within. When Teddy finally got through the kids, he prepared to ascend the stairs to the front door, stopping in his tracks only when he saw what awaited him at the top of the stoop.

There sat Christina Smith, motionless save for her roving, terror filled eyes. She was buck naked from top to bottom, but that was nowhere close to the most alarming thing about her appearance. She was missing both her arms and legs, cut off at the shoulder and upper thigh her wounds seared shut as if by fire. But even that was not nearly the most shocking thing about her. A long, thick candle was buried deep inside of her, burning from within, causing her skin to glow and a horrid, unearthly light to shine out of her perpetually open eyes and mouth. She could not move, she could not speak. All she could do was cry bitter orange tears, and squirm uncomfortably. She felt no pain from her wounds, truth be told, no doubt some magical mercy produced by the Great Pumpkin before he departed, but she could feel the cold hard stone to which her naked butt cheeks were glued, and she could feel the thick candle in her ass, and it's mystical flame endlessly burning her insides, and she could feel the eyes of her once eager boyfriend upon her, widening in horror.

A freshly baked pie was cooling on the back window. Beyond that, a charred skeleton was strung up on a post, keeping a silent vigil over the now vacant pumpkin patch. Beyond that, a pogo stick continued to bounce up and down, with a teenage girl's limbs still attached to it. And, beyond that, the Great Pumpkin overlooked a small town, his legion of Pumpkin followers crowding around his feet, their appetites wet for revenge.

Pepper’s metal bikini clinked and clanked as she danced, wiggling her hips with great enthusiasm, if not great skill. She was doing her best to imitate the alluring movements of a professional belly dancer, and while she wasn’t exactly successful, she was certainly having a lot of fun trying, and the other girls were laughing right along with her. Pepper was dressed up as Princess Leia, but rather than wearing the drab white dress from A New Hope, or any of the various utilitarian uniforms Leia had worn in the other movies, Pepper was dressed as Leia had been when she was a captive of Jabba the Hutt in Return of the Jedi, which is to say, hardly dressed at all.

Pepper normally wasn’t what you’d call an exhibitionist, but she loved Halloween and it always brought out a slightly mischievous streak in her. Ever since she first saw Return of the Jedi, all those years ago she had secretly fantasized about wearing something as daring and exotic as Leia’s slave bikini, and it had taken her this long to finally work up the nerve. The outfit was little more than a skimpy plastic bikini top and an ornate metal belt supporting two flowing pieces of burgundy material, one covering her crotch and the other her butt, leaving her legs and thighs almost completely exposed. And that was what made the outfit so alluring, the tantalizing possibility of indecent exposure. The outfit kept everything covered that needed to be covered, but just barely, and the slightest slip could reveal far more than any PG rated movie would likely be willing to show.

While putting the costume together, Pepper had briefly considered going commando underneath. The thought of being so close to total exposure was frightening, but also intoxicating, and Pepper had allowed her mind to dwell on these thoughts more than once, while safely nestled under the covers of her warm bed, with the door to her room tightly shut. As time drew closer and closer to Halloween her fantasies became stronger and stronger with each passing day, but at the appointed hour, fear won out over fantasy, and Pepper slipped a daring little G-String on under her costume. 151212123.title: One of the outsiders

151212124.content:
Franklin is, if anything, a very pragmatic person. While he did value his entertainment, he also knew that he would have to make things more manageable with this group, and, if at all possible, make some progress on some of his projects.

To this end, he decided that he would let someone or something else lay claim to some of these women first in order to demonstrate to them that they will follow his instructions the next time he issues a command.

"Since it seems that you all are barely capable of following the most basic of instructions, I will make tonight's entertainment an educational experience. I want you to listen very closely, none of you will move from your spot. If you do, Fred here will make sure I know that you are incapable of following directions and I will make sure to reward him properly."

Franklin heard a few gasps from his captives, which reassured him that the point had been made.

Franklin was about to leave the room, but realized who he was dealing with, "Fred, if any of these girls move from their spot, I want you to tell me. Once I finish the preparations, I will make sure you get to pick from any of them that move to have for yourself."

Fred could barely contain his glee upon hearing this. Franklin would have warned him against making untrue allegations, but so far, Fred had not demonstrated the intelligence necessary to demonstrate deceit, so he went about his way.

The Doctor had many experiments outside of the Dimensional Transporter, many of them involving studying various forms of monsters and creatures that the public was not aware of. Franklin decided he might kill two birds with one stone by introducing one of these specimens into the holding cell. Most of his specimens would take one, maybe two, of the captives for themselves before leaving back for their own containment areas which were customized to be more suitable for each specimen according to their own needs.

Another thought occurred to the Doctor. His assistants had for some time grown more and more agitated on their assignments. Despite their numerous shortcomings, they had done well tonight. Maybe it might be worthwhile to reward each of them with the spoils of their own work? Obviously he would want them to treat their captives gently, they would be kept for further experiments later, but it might be worth it to show some gratitude now... if for no other reason than for it to be repaid at a later date.

The Doctor pondered his choices. He would get his entertainment, make an example to those that remained, and either make progress in one of his experiments or spend a couple of captives to gain some loyalty.

Decisions, decisions...

Two hundred kilometers above the surface of the moon, on its dark side, there is a sudden bright flash of white light unseen by any of the surveillance systems on Earth, and as soon as the light fades, a large mechanical like object suddenly appears. This mother ship is the size of a modern day Navel Destroyer. It is dark green in color, and cigar shaped. This probes mission to this unexplored solar system is to investigate evidence of life, to collect living specimens of various species, study living specimens, vivisect some of them, and deliver its report, along with the remaining living specimens to its point of origin.

The probe 28 immediately scans all of the planets and moons of the Sol system, and finds common uninteresting microbial life on the worlds we call Mars, Europa, Ceres, Io, Ganymede, and Enceladus. It sent out smaller probes to collect the simple specimens from those worlds. However, the third planet from the sun contains lifeforms that are by far more interesting. The third planet contains a rich biosphere, and has massive lifeforms readings. There is even evidence of intelligent life on that world. The Probe knew this by intercepting various signals coming from that world. It knew these signals are not natural, but artificial in nature. It attempts to decipher these primitive signals, but it could not, except for the radio signals. After several hours of studying these radio signals, it now understands many of the native languages spoken, the native name of the planet Earth, and its approximate technological level. It also knows the dominate species is called humans, and they are aggressive, but it still does not know what they look like.

Probe 28 cloaks itself, and heads to the planet cautiously. The Probe easily passes through the human satellite that surround the planet undetected, and enters its atmosphere. It is a warm starry night, as the now invisible alien craft safely lands in a clearing of a lush forest. The Probe takes samples of the air, water, and soil. It then begins the process of gathering samples.

Probe 28 or 28 scans the area around it and notices eight quadruped animals in the act of consuming some plant life. As they eat, 28 carefully moves or hovers over the ground, getting closer to them, as it gets its long, grasping tentacles ready. Meanwhile, the seven deer and a lone buck are eating shrubs when they feel something strange in the air, something watching them. They look around, seeing nothing, and smelling nothing around them. However, they do hear something soft, but artificial, like a soft humming coming towards them. They can also feel a soft vibration on the ground nearby as well, nothing loud or alarming, but soft, barely noticeable. A few seconds later, all of the deer can feel cold, invisible, metal like snakes securely wrapping around them. These tentacles are strong as they securely wrap around them, but they are not tight. Twenty-Eight did not want to hurt its specimens, at least not yet. It quickly, yet gently pulls all of the scared animals into the craft. It cleans them up, taking some quick samples from them, and begins to interrogate them in several languages. After attempting to make contact them, asking them, “Are you humans?” it realizes they are not humans.

It temporarily reduces all but one of them in size, and stores them in a cage, in suspended animation, their bodies frozen in time. It takes the lone deer, and places it on a table. Small robots enter the room, as an invisible force holds the terrified animal down. Then it lets out a sound of pain as it is vivisected, or dissected alive. As it studies the poor animal, it discovers that this mammal is a protein-based lifeforms. After taking several organ’s, bodily fluids, and other samples, the dying animal is tossed into the probes refueling room, still alive. Probe 28’s refueling room is like a stomach, and one of 28’s fueling options is bio-fuel. As the animal dies, acid fluids into the room, dissolving it down into protein, then robots clean up the examination room, as 28 continues on its way. Probe 28 captures several hundred other animals, both big and small, repeating the same process. When…

…………………

Probe 28 has several intelligent, curious living robots on board, and it is a living machine as well. There may, or maybe not be an alien creator on board? It will study any captured humans both physically and physiologically. It might even enjoy looking at the naked human body, as a work of art?

A few days before Halloween, a small group of adolescent girls are currently walking up a lonely trail; towards an eerie old castle like structure that the locals think is abandoned, but haunted. This castle is sitting on a hill, next to lake, surrounded by some tall trees, and there is a full moon out tonight. As the light of the moon engulfs these five girls, we see that all of them have lovely, feminine bodies that most adult women would kill for. These girls are heading toward this castle for an initiation ritual. The group’s sadistic fourteen-year-old leader Liz has ordered the four lowest ranking girls, if they want to be a part of her click, or stay a part of her click, to spend the night in this old haunted castle. Normally, it would be hard enough to spend the night in this scary place, however, Liz in her sadistic way, made this task even harder. As they approached the main door of this castle, Liz orders all of these still fully dressed girls to stop.

As Rebecca, Pepper, Crystal, and Ayita suddenly stops at the door, followed by Liz, they all look around in alarm, all except for Liz. Liz licks her lips evilly, and says in a wicked voice, “Ok, unless you’re stupid, you all know why you are here. This place used to belong to some made scientist named Franklin, who was imprisoned many years ago for performing ungodly experiments on people, and some people even died from those experiments. Some people say that the ghosts of those he murdered still walk those halls. Some people say the creatures that he made still walk those halls, and some people say that his henchman, an evil dwarf still walks these halls. Some people even say that the doctor himself, escaped from a psychiatric facility for the criminally insane a few years ago. Some say.”

Before she could speak any further, Pepper buts in, “Yes, we all know the stories behind this haunted house. Could you please give us the supplies, so we can go threw with this stupid stunt!”

“Very well,” Liz said with an annoyed smile. “Here are the rules, you must stay in this house the entire night. I will be watching you from my house with my binoculars, along with Veronica. If you should leave for any reason, you will automatically be kicked out of our click. I will come and get you around seven in the morning, at witch time you will be able to leave, if you’re still alive! Now here are your only supplies, some drinking water, a little food, a red marker, and two plastic flashlights, that’s it! Also, you must go threw the entire castle, room to room, and place a big red x, using the maker that I gave you in each of the rooms.”

“What if there is an emergency, or something. How can we get a hold of you,” Pepper asked?

“Just flash both of your lights threw one of the first floor windows in Morris code. I believe Pepper knows it, but do it only in an emergency, or else,” Liz replied firmly!

“Or else what,” Ayita said sarcastically?

“All right, I was going to make you girls stay the night in your underwear, but after that last comment, I will make you all spend the night in the nude. Now get naked, take off every article of clothing,” Liz said while licking her lips, enjoying the fact that Ayita would get the blame for this.

As the three girls looked at Ayita angrily, they reluctantly complied, knowing full well that to refuse Liz would mean immediate banishment from the most popular group at school. In addition, there were far worse things that Liz could make them do, like run into the boys locker room at school, naked, or make them sunbath in the nude, close to the local prison. Anyway, as the girls stripped off everything, Pepper stands before Liz naked, points to her glasses, and says, “Can I at least keep these on?”

Liz looks Pepper’s nude body over, licks her lips, and says, “Well, I guess so. I wouldn’t want you to fall down a basement and get hurt now, would I?”

Now wearing only her glasses, Pepper followed by the other three girls, prepares to enter the creepy old house. Liz, using a special skeleton key, opens the main door of this castle, and the four girls enter, completely naked. As the four girls walked naked into the darkness of this haunted house, they all naturally started to cove their private areas with the only things they had, their hands. Liz then places the small bag of supplies into the dark room with the girls, and closes the door. After Liz securely locks the front door, Liz puts all off the girls clothes into a plastic bag, and walks away, smiling wickedly. Now alone Ayita, Crystal, Pepper, and Rebecca turn on the two flash lights they found in the bag, and walk around the dark room, naked as the day they were born. As the girls walk around the dark living room, they begin explore the castle, armed with only two flashlight, and a red marker. They left the food, and water in the living room.
