15131.content:
After a brief argument, the girls decided it would be best to split up to cover more grounds. Ayita had thought it a silly idea, but Pepper was convinced that Liz would soon be returning with Veronica, Jackie, Alison and Carmen in toe, with all sorts of nasty plans at the ready to scare and humiliate them, and Pep wanted to explore the house in total as fast as possible before they got there. Since the group only had two flashlights, the girls split into two groups, Pepper with Rebecca and Ayita with Crystal.

For Pepper and Rebecca, the ordeal had not been too bad so far. The house was certainly dark and creepy, cobwebbed, and crawling with critters, but Becky was a brave and level headed girl and Pepper was of the sort to actually find the home's gothic atmosphere somewhat enchanting. So far, the girls had visited and marked a few bed rooms, a bathroom and a long and surprisingly narrow hallway with nothing more to complain about than a stubbed toe and a few spider webs in their hair. Well, that's not entirely true. As they entered the next room, Rebecca was in the process of complaining quite a bit.

"I am going to need a total tetanus shot when we get out of here! This place is filthy!" Becky said, pausing in the doorway to lift up her foot for closer examination, finding it's sole blackened and dirty beneath the flashlight from less than half an hour's worth of treading barefoot upon the unswept floors of the house. "Ugh!" She grunted in disgust.

Pepper couldn't help but admire the natural athletic grace her friend possessed. Watching her nude form impeccably balanced on one foot without even a hint of the trembling shakiness she knew would result from any attempt on her part to duplicate such a feat made her proud of the friends she'd made since joining Liz's clique. Well, proud of befriending Rebecca at least. In truth, the more Pepper got to know some members of the group, the more she came to realize that many of the negative things she imagined about "popular girls" from the outside looking in were actually very true indeed.

"Awe, quit complaining!" Pepper commented jokingly "This place is so cool! It's like being in the Adam's Family's house, or the set of an old Universal Monster picture!"

Dropping her foot back down to the floor, Becky dropped her hands to her hips and regarded Pepper sarcastically. "Weirdo." She said, shaking her head. As the two girls giggled, Rebecca shined her flashlight into the room and Pepper gasped at what she saw.

"IT'S A LIBRARY!" She practically squealed. Rebecca did not share her friends enthusiasm. All she saw were the broken windows, the rocks no doubt responsible for said broken windows, the shattered glass on the floor, the dead leaves strewn about the room from the twisted tree swaying just outside the window in the october breeze and the creeping vines which, having scaled the walls of the house, had crawled in through the broken window to claim the far wall of the room for their own. No, Becca was too concerned about setting foot in this disaster area of a room to care one iota about the shelves of books lining it's walls. "I can see that..." was all she could muster in response.

"Oh, gimme that!" Pepper said, snatching the flashlight from her friends hands and scurrying over to the shelves. "Hey!" Becky shouted as she saw Pepper's bouncing butt disappear into the darkness. Luckily, the moonlight pouring through the window made navigating the mess manageable. Tiptoeing carefully, Rebecca made it over to a table low enough and sturdy looking enough to lean on while she watched her friend gush over the ancient tomes lining the walls of the long forgotten room. Sighing, she said, "Find anything interesting?"

Scanning the stacks, Pepper nodded and replied distractedly. "Mostly Encyclopedias and Medical Journals it seems. A few obscure science books, and some weird occult looking stuff I might just have to snatch on our way out... and... oh... hey this is weird..."

"What?" Rebecca asked.

Plucking a book from the shelf, Pepper answered "The Necronomicon?"

"What's a Necronomenon?" Came Becky's response.

"No, no, Necronomicon!" Pepper corrected, flipping through the book with manic curiosity.

"What's that, like a convention for necrophiles?"

"...It's a book from out of Lovecraft."

"Lovecraft... like, Cthuhlu and junk?"

"Yes exactly." Pepper answered. "It's a book he made up for some of his stories. It's not supposed to be real."

"Well, maybe somebody made their own Necronomicon as a joke."

"I don't know... this thing isn't even written in English..."

"What's it written in?"

"Arabic... I think... I'm not sure. I can't make heads or tails of it. This is so weird!"

Reaching back on the table, Becky's hand made contact with something cold and metallic. Turning around, she saw a silver candelabra, and beside it a small book of matches. "Hey!" She exclaimed. "Now THIS could actually be useful!"

As she turned around however Pepper replaced the Necronomicon on the book shelf, saving it's strange mystery for later and plucked from the wall another book, this one titled "The Secret Doorway." As soon as she tilted the book away from the wall however, the whole book shelf swung around, centrifugal force tossing her into the secret chamber behind as the bookshelf swung back around to stand exactly as it did a moment ago with only Pepper's nude body conspicuously absent from the scene.

--

Meanwhile, downstairs, short and stubby fingers grasped a carton of milk and plucked it greedily from the fridge. Ralphus was a dwarf, dressed in shabby clothes with an ugly face hidden mostly behind a thick black beard. His master had forbade him to drink from the carton, but his master wasn't here right now, was he? No, his master was busy in the basement with his latest acquisition, a young blond camper they'd captured together in the woods. But did Ralphus get to enjoy the fruits of his labor? NO! "Get out of the Lab Ralphus, I had no further need of you tonight!" The doctor had commanded. Once the girl was stripped naked and strapped securely to the slab, all of a sudden Dr. Franklin wants to be alone with his work? "What a crummy boss!" The dejected dwarf mused to himself as he sipped rebelliously from the forbidden carton.

The sudden sound of approaching voices however, shattered the privacy of his thoughts to pieces. Spitting a mouthful of milk all over the fridge, Ralphus dropped to his hands and knees and scurried under the table just as Ayita and Crystal entered the kitchen. Shining the light on the far wall, Ayita stated "Kitchen. Great. Come on, lets get this over with. mark the wall so we can get out of here." Ayita was still a little upset about the groups decision to split up, and she was even more upset by the fact that she had gotten stuck with Crystal. Crystal was a sweet girl, but she was the lowest girl on the totem pole, and it burned her that the two white girls just so happened to team up together and leave her to fend for herself with the newbie.

"No problem Ayita!" Crystal exclaimed, eager to please. "I'll just... EWWWW!" Crystal practically shrieked.

"What, what!?" Ayita shouted in concern.

"I stepped in something wet!" Crystal replied.

Shining the light upon the floor, Ayita squatted down to investigate. "It's milk." She deduced. Looking up, she immediately saw a look of dawning fear spreading across her friend's face, and was quick to produce an explanation. "It's probably from Liz or one of the other girls. Pepper might be right about them trying to scare us."

"...And they're going to scare us with milk?" Crystal said, incredulously.

"Maybe they spilled it by accident. You know what a klutz Alison is. Let's not get all bent out of shape about this, alright?"

A ghost of a smile appeared on Crystal's face. "No use crying over spilled milk, right?"

Beneath the table however, the dwarf smiled much wider and much more full as he watched Ayita's beautiful brown butt bobbing before his greedy eyes. his spirits dipped for just a moment as she rose to her feet, causing her ass to rise up and out of his view, but he quickly crept forward on his elbows to stair up lustfully at the two naked teens, capturing a worms eye view of everything between their legs.

"That's the spirit!" Ayita said, cheerfully, glad to see something other than nervous fear coming from her companion. "Now, come on, lets mark this room and move on. I bet we can finish our half of the house way before Becky and Pepper."

"You think so?" Crystal queried.

"I know so. You think those pale faced, pale assed white bitches can beat the minoriteam?" The two girls shared a laugh, but beneath the table, the dwarf was suppressing his. The master had denied him a part in the fun tonight, but now he had two new opportunities of his own.

So far, their weekend camping trip had been a bust. Mrs. Harper decided to try a detour on a small road through a desolate stretch of road to get them to the campground quicker. That was hours earlier. Now hopelessly lost at night in a blustery lightening storm, they follow the dark, twisting road to what appears to be an abandoned mansion in the middle of nowhere.

The troop of seven girls and one adult consists of:
Adult: Mrs. Janice Harper (28) Tall, athletic, gorgeous.
Senior scout: Sara (16) Bright, beautiful, capable.
The Six Cadets (ages 11-14):
Mandy (14) Clumsy but cute.
Trisha (13) Foxy little hottie.
Jasmine (12) Slender. waifish beauty.
Ginger (12) cute, curvy red-haired country girl.
April (11) Spoiled, rich little "princess"-type.
Nina (11) Tiny, wide-eyed urchin.

(I purposefully didn't flesh them out much to allow other writers to jump in with their own ideas of the girlscout troop)

KRA-POW!
"EEEK!", screams a chorus of shivering young girlscouts huddled together under the awning in their scout uniforms and rain ponchos.
"Wow! T-That one was close!", is all their pack-leader, Mrs. Harper can manage in response to the lightening strike that seems to hit the tall spire atop the place and disappear within.
"Oh, God! That was in my nightmare, too!", shrieks Jasmine, throwing her hands up in despair that they won't seem to listen to her fears of the place.
Nervous little Nina, already terrified by the storm and the old dark house in the woods and of Jasmine's stories that she had a dream of all this and that it's an evil place, actually wets her panties at the sudden strike.
None of the other girls notice though, as they are all scared out of their wits by the windy, chilly, unexpected lightening storm upon them.
"Jasmine, I don't want to hear another word about this dream you had last night. Got it?", and Mrs. Harper fixes her with a stern glare for a second before continuing, "Okay, here's the plan girls: You all stay here on the porch, while I go inside and look around. Are we clear? Don't leave the porch until I come back. As senior Scout Sara is in charge while I'm gone".
Jasmine starts sobbing uncontrollably, "Don't go in there...pleee-".
"Jasmine, I MEAN it! Zip it!" - and flashlight in hand, their only adult guardian, Janice Harper, quietly creeps inside the dark, boarded-up old manor, saying, "Don't worry girls! I'll only be gone for a minute or two".

Only it wasn't a minute or two. It was ten minutes. Then twenty. Then thirty!

"Let's just go back to where we wrecked the RV and wait there!", pleads Jasmine over the quickening storm winds, "Please, Sara!".
"NO, Jasmine!", Sara sternly rebukes her, "We took it to a vote, and the whole pack wants to go inside and look for Mrs. Harper! I'm not even sure we could find our way back there in this storm. Not with the compass and even our cell phones all acting up for some reason. Now let's go in and find her and then we can decide whether we should stay the night or leave.".

And inside to their peril go the girls of Honeysuckle Pack, to search for Mrs. Harper:

info.brief_description: As Halloween draws near, something evil lurks in a small Texas town...
info.description:
This interactive was originally created by Sandman (aka Giant-Man, aka Dr. Strangelove etc) and recreated with his permission, and with special thanks to one dedicated reader and former contributor, who had the forethought and discipline to back up and save all of our contributions. Thanks also go out to Faith, WYSIWYG, Airk, Seeker of darkness, Doomsdaycomes, Vienna Sundae, Michael Jackson, Huz, Kuddles, Robin, Evil dude, Steve ~ Friction, Grizzly95, Stefene, Wraith1113, Rockdog, MM1, KrystalLover, Mbu17, MacdaddyG, Texienne, James Marcus, JStein, SergeantC, Acorn, Zack12, seawolf147, Raven1234, Bucket, kzf, Zendle and theseeker for their help in making this story grow!

Good evening boys and ghouls. My name is Snoogins, and I will be your host this evening. Let me take this opportunity to thank you for clicking on this interactive, and welcome you into the strange and intriguing world that lies within. It is a world of deep woods and old legends, murky lakes with hidden secrets, haunted castles and cracked tombstones marking empty graves. It is a world where monsters lurk around isolated camp grounds, stalking their naked prey. Where Mad geniuses indulge their own perversions in the name of science. A world where the dead may rise again and take their revenge upon the flesh of the living. A world where visitors from space can open human eyes to the infinite expanses of cosmic horror that lay beyond.

Let me also take this opportunity to offer you a warning. These stories are not for the faint of heart, nor the easily offended. They are not for those with overly impressionable... or overly serious... minds. But if you enjoy a little horror or science fiction mixed in with your erotica, then come right in and have a seat. We've been waiting for you.

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

A small community is located in the middle of the woods of eastern Texas, near Houston, just outside a slightly less small town called New Bern. Something is lurking in the forest and it comes by to investigate the people, or perhaps it lands near by in the case of an alien, or perhaps a mad scientist just happens to live close by. This sort of thing happens more often than you might think...

Rules; I will allow almost anything, especially if the story is good. That said, here are a few things to avoid: Poop and pee, feet worship, weight gaining, unbirth and cock-vore. Now, there's nothing wrong with any of these fetishes, but they each have plenty of interactives devoted completely to their devotees, and this one is a bit more broad in scope. I may allow a little of any of those things in a story, but if they start to dominate a storyline, I'll have to correct the issue. Likewise, if any of those fetishes come out of left field (i.e. if a character, apropos of nothing, decides to become obsessed with any of those above fetishes to the exclusion of all else) it will also be dealt with. Also, try to keep the character ages within a reasonable range. Aiming for teenagers to middle aged here for the most part, and avoiding children and the geriatric. If you want to make a contribution, but your worried about its content, feel free to send me an e-mail. I'm always happy to listen.

All chapters must be at least five sentences long, unless it is leading up to something and please, try to use proper spelling and grammar. I'm not asking anyone to break out an English textbook, but just try to avoid the text messaging shorthand. U undorstand? k thnx! No ending the story line until at least twelve chapters into it. Ending a story is a big deal. Lots of people like to play in this sandbox, and when you write an ending, your putting away some of the toys. That said, endings are perfectly fine, and even sometimes necessary for a good story, but there will be quality control. In other words, if you're going to write an ending, make it a good one.

And of course, the issue of mortality. The evil creatures in this story can die, along with the humans. In addition, good characters such as angles, space rangers, or other positive beings can be introduced into the various chapters of this story, and they too can die. Gods, monsters and men, die together in the end.

Thing's I will allow in this story include but are not limited to: vore, mind control, magic, time stopping, aliens, time travel, robots, monsters, anthro's, ghosts, invisibility, giants, shrinking and all manner of public nudity and humiliation. Also, just about anything you can think of to throw in, so be creative. If you're uncertain about adding something strange, as I said above, shoot me an e-mail and I'll get back to you.
